What does that actually mean? Well Corning® Gorilla® Glass 6 (the latest version of the stuff most smartphones use) has a rating of around 680HV, while sapphire crystal has a rating of somewhere over 2000HV. So the coating on your watch case will be somewhere between the two, and many times harder than standard 316L stainless steel.
What does the hardening cost?
The hardening process costs an extra £40 on top of the price of your watch. When you order your Nanok just add an extra £40 to your pledge, we'll be in touch at the end of the campaign to confirm your choice.
Why an option rather than a default?
The coating process costs more and it takes a bit more time. We don't want to raise the price and increase the lead time for people that aren't interested in the additional long-term protection. It'll take around a month longer to deliver your Nanok if you go for this option, but the result will be a watch tougher than any made from standard 316L steel.


We're offering three strap options for the Nanok so that you can make it work for you from day one. We'll also be making further options available via our store in the future so that Nanok continues to adapt to your style. Or, of course, you can pick up a strap from your retailer of choice, there is nothing proprietary about our straps. 

1) Pick one from our choice of two genuine leather straps, included in the base price. Available in grey or black and handmade from vegetable tanned leather, these straps are the best we've found at any price point. Comfortable, soft and light, the leather strap can dress up or down easily depending on your day.

2) A 316L stainless steel H-link bracelet with ratcheting clasp, available for an extra £30. H-link bracelets hold their shape really well, resulting in a solid, high-quality feel. Ratcheting clasps help ensure that whatever the size of your wrist, you can adjust the bracelet perfectly. The bracelet features all solid links, of course, and tapers from 20mm at the lugs to 18mm at the clasp.

If you'd like both a leather strap and the bracelet that's fine, just add £35 to your pledge.

story:
We are young team of experts in the area of textiles and we decided  to present you an amazing product, which will definitely embellish your  everyday. 

 

  • We made a special permanent repair KIT, for repairing all kind of clothes on your own. 
  • FIXRIP Box contains most advanced technical materials, which are in use in textile industry around the globe. 
  • With FIXRIP patches, you are able to repair your favourite clothes  in less than 1 (one) minute. You can save your precious time and money,  because there is no need to visit the tailor or buy new clothes. Let us  keep our precious clothes and save our planet a little bit.
  •  Clothes will again look fabulous and you and your kids will love them even more than before!!!  
 

HOW YOU DO IT? 

It is simple. All you need is FIXRIP Box with scissors, ironing paper and wooden cube...and of course steam IRON.  

Take the damaged clothes and choose your favourite patch from box.   

 

If you repair damage on the inner side of the clothes, you need to take  the patch from the column named INNER SIDE TEXTILE PATCHES. 

 If you repair damage on the outer side of the clothes, you need to  take the patch from the column OUTER SIDE TEXTILE PATCHES or from FUN  PROGRAM. It is up to you... ;)

 If clothes are in bad condition, then you can fix the damage with  both type of the patches. Firstly, put INNER SIDE PATCH on, then turn  the clothes on the outer side, and put OUTER SIDE PATCH on.  

CLOTHES ARE READY TO USE ;) HAVE FUN AND ENJOY WITH FIXRIP BOX...

 

 ***LET'S LOOK TOGETHER POSITIVE INTO THE FUTURE*** 

 THANK YOU SO MUCH FOR SHARING OUR PROJECT AND HELPING US BRING IT TO LIFE!!! 

Risks and challenges

story:
Redefining Comfort for Moms

The worlds FIRST quality robe designed for the expectant and new mother, our MOMMY BROBE delivers! Made from luxurious Modal cotton, this versatile robe bodes a flattering fit and provides both comfort and support for both mom and baby. The hook and eye, super supportive nursing bra makes for easy access during nursing and, it's detachable, to take you through the day!


What We Need

The Brobe needs AT LEAST $10,000 to further our start-up journey. The Mommy Brobe is the perfect garment to sell in major retail stores however, coming up with the large production cost upfront can be a challenge being a small business.Thats were you can help. By purchasing the first Mommy Brobe we will be able to order larger quantities which in turn lowers our production cost. Lowering the cost will lower the wholesale price and the larger retailers are more willing to buy.  We were able to start with a very small quantity of Mommy Brobes to get us started but they are going fast so order your's today on Indiegogo.  


Dallas Market Center's National Contest


Standard Hospital Gown or Mommy Brobe Support?

Which would you prefer?  This speciality garment offers support to new mothers because they need both a speciality designed bra for easy nursing and a soft comfortable robe.  Here is what you've been looking for fashion meets function, the perfect gift.

Choose Your Color

Get in fast on the new pink and grey colors.  We just got them in and they're hot!

Nursing is Easy with the Mommy Brobe

The hook & eye, supper supportive nursing bra makes for easy access during nursing, and it's detachable, to take you through the day!

If you pledge for a Mommy Brobe you will receive an e-mail asking within a day or two to confirm your size and color.

After you support us, we would LOVE if you could help spread the word on your socials. Email, Facebook, Twitter, Pinterest.... Whatever you prefer.

We can be found on FACEBOOK, TWITTER, PINTEREST and WEBSITE.

And please feel free to reach out to me at aschickel@thebrobe.com

Your Pledges Support

A portion of your pledge(5%) goes to pre-mature babies in need of breast milk.100% of financial donations to the Mothers’ Milk Bank at Austin are used directly for the Charitable Care or Research Programs. All operational costs for the milk bank are supported through processing fees paid by hospitals using donor human milk for their infants.

"By offering to donate a portion of all sales to the Mothers’ Milk Bank at Austin’s Charitable Care Program, Ms. Schickel and everyone who purchases the brobe will literally be saving lives of tiny infants. 100% of all donations to this program directly provide donor milk to these medically fragile infants regardless of their insurance coverage or family financial resources. There is nothing more precious than the gift of life for the smallest of us."~ Kim Upgrove, Executive Director Mothers Milk Bank Austin

Lounge in Style & Comfort

Testimonials

"I use my Brobe ALL the time. True confession. I have slept in it quite a bit. Not like quick naps.. More like "there's no way I'm walking over there to put on jammies!" type of sleeping in. Plus the bra is so comfy I take it out of the robe and Wear it during the day"

"My Friend Angela gave me the Mommy Brobe as a shower gift. Oh My!!! This is a must-have for every new mom. It's soft, comfortable, and has all the perfect features. Thank you! "

Gift Certificate

If it's easier to send a gift certificate, we have those too!!! Let your special mommy order her own favorite color and size.

Sizes

We Support  the Mother's Milk Bank.

 And here is why....

One in eight babies is born preterm. Human milk is especially important for premature or sick babies, who are at 10 times the risk for devastating intestinal infections if they are fed formula instead of human milk.Fewer than half of moms who deliver a baby prematurely are able to provide their babies with breast milk. Through donor milk, these preterm babies are still able to receive the benefits of breast milk to help them grow and thrive. 

  • In 2012 the Austin Milk Bank provided milk to approximately 1,800 babies
  • In 2012 they provided milk to 100 hospitals across Central Texas and 20 other states 
  • In 2012, 589 women donated milk. Ideally they need to screen and approve 700 donors in 2013 to meet the growing demand. 

For more information go to: 
http://www.milkbank.org/milk-banking/how-it-works

Shipping

Select your Brobe pledge level by choosing the SHIPPING DATE first and then the COLOR. Notice that you must get in early to receive your Mommy Brobe by September 15th - and there are a limited number available in each size. The next shipping date will arrive by December 5th in time for the Christmas holidays. If you have any questions about shipping, many answers are in the FAQ or feel free to email or Facebook us. If you’ve moved to a new place, don’t worry, we will let you change this information up until your Mommy Brobe is ready to ship. We hope you are thrilled with your Mommy Brobe and look forward to exceeding your expectations.  

The Mommy Brobe Story

Hi, my name is Allison Schickel. The inspiration for the Mommy Brobe came to me in 2002 after having my first daughter Mackenzie. I was lucky enough to have enough milk to nurse my newborn however the new overwhelming size of my chest was not all that well, comfortable. I was very self conscious about people coming in and out of the hospital room to visit the new baby while I was wearing those oh so attractive gowns. Not much changed after we took the baby home. It was a struggle everyday to find anything that was soft, flattering, supportive and made me feel beautiful. Women want to feel attractive not only for their partner but for themselves as well. I was tired of spending a crazy amount of money on nursing garments that were cheaply made, not stylish and quite frankly not very supportive of the new milk maids. I wanted a nursing garment that I could continue to wear while loosing my baby weight and even long after I stopped nursing.

I started searching for a comfortable robe with a front-opening bra inside to give me maximum coverage and support during my maternity. Nothing online or in stores matched my idea of a fashionably luxurious maternity garment. This launched my mission to give moms the ultimate robe.

Please help me in my mission to make the journey into mommy-hood more enjoyable. What I can promise you is a product that was created by a woman for women, designed with personal touch and great service before and after receiving your Mommy Brobe. If good fortune shines our way during this crowdfunding campaign, I will most certainly bring you many more wonderful garments designed for lounging, workouts, swimwear and most importantly (support THE GIRLS) fashion that supports women. Please share the Mommy Brobe with your friends and family. Thanks so much for your support!

One Last Laugh If You're Still With Us! (Alternate Video Ending)

story:
Short Summary

King Ham x Da Bald Goddess AKA "KH x DBG" is a fashion line started by two very close college friends who are both chasing their dreams. Brandon Ham (King Ham) and Chantel Watts (Da Bald Goddess) have been in the talks for a while of starting a up a clothing line where both the Brooklyn and Queens natives world's collide and create a great outstanding Urban fashion line that reflects both of their personalities and interests. A clothing line like never before, one that they hope will change the fashion world forever. 

Funding 

The only things that Brandon and Chantel has to offer is amazing sketches/drawings of their clothes and accessories and is in need of funding to make their clothing line come to life. 
The funding will cover everything from t-shirts, hoodies, pants, hats etc to meeting with local print shops getting they're clothing completed as well as more arts and crafts for designing. Every Penny, Nickel, Dime, Quarter and or Dollar donated will be extremely appreciated and put to great use. 
Impact

This clothing has a lot of inspirational and motivational pieces that are not only great to wear but enjoyable to wear. Brandon and Chantel look to start a movement not only with their movement but starting with themselves showing people that it is okay to follow your dreams, don 't afraid to take that risk and most importantly DO NOT be afraid to inspire someone to inspire someone else.

story:
Founder and Designer 

KUDZ is a Shona name meaning Glory.  KUDZ Footwear is something that has been a dream since my childhood when I started sketching KUDZ designs.  I am an ambitious designer with hopes of putting a comfortable product out directly to the consumer. I studied Art at Goldsmith University London and took online Designs classes by Marc Ecko and Staple Design. I have also worked in GEOX which was an experience that allowed me to identify what type of footwear provides full support and durabilty. With your help, I can bring KUDZ to your feet.


High Street Research at Student Makers Market


KUDZ shoes are designed through a process of draft sketching, rendering and modelling to create a stylistic product that is functional, versatile and comfortable. 

KUDZ shoes are crafted from of high quality materials,taking time selecting the best leather to ensure premium goods for our customers.  

We use full grain leather to give our shoes a unique natural look which provides a smooth texture and extra comfort. 


Vision 

We need your support to bring these designs directly to our customers and establish a brand that will leave a mark in the footwear industry. 

Our mission is to provide fitting shoes to the world, made from the finest leather material making them functional, versatile and comfortable. We proudly work with factories which are implementing healthy working environments and improving the lives of  their workers .

We have spent a year prototyping and perfecting premium trainer designs. With your help we can finally bring this amazing product to market. We want to bring a classic touch to footwear where you can feel that time was taken in manufacturing and the right material was picked out using a simple and stylish silhouette. 

Indiegogo is an international platform and it is only right that KUDZ, a brand that has grown from Zimbabwe  to Botswana and now in the UK, should launch here. 



 

Features

-   Suede upper

-   Vulcanised sole construction

-   36 mm off-white rubber soles

-   Gently  padded tongue

-   Cotton  and Leather lining

-   Increased heel support

-   Leather covered insoles

-  Colourful and well designed packaging


What will your contribution do?

Help cover the minimum cost of production/delivery for 100 pairs of the KUDZ Spheres (UK Sizes 7-11)  in one colour way (BLUE). 

  • Cover the cost of packaging for all KUDZ shoes produced through this campaign.
  • Cover the cost of storage and postage for shoes to contributors. 
  • All orders placed on the Spheres will be delivered even if goal is not reached. By starting with a low goal, the risk of being like many other footwear campaigns which  fail to deliver even with large amounts raised, is greatly reduced. 
  • Help cover the cost of the sample development production for the KUDZ  Shinga women`s line pictured below. 



Testimonials

"Really like the Kudz shoe. It feels comfortable and is good quality. The design is simple yet stylish, suitable for all." - Sarah - London 


"Refreshing, authentic. They show versatility as they appeal to both sexes." - Ronan - Botswana


"They were comfy and I liked that they were suede, very easy to dance in." Zalika - Nottingham 

Risks and Challenges 

The obstacle remains that in creating and shipping shoes I have to manufacture offshore. This creates uncertainty and potential problems when the shoes can't be monitored and take time to arrive.  Utilizing Indegogo will allow me to build the brand without any complications in needing to recoup my money as fast to continue to manufacture. 

My biggest worry is requesting you to give and then not being able to fulfil the project. I would hate this to be one of those projects that makes it's supporters wait, and wait, and wait. 

Using the Indegogo platform gives me the chance to have a team that will support me and allow KUDZ to grow.


Share

Please help spread the campaign of KUDZ Footwear even if you can't give a contribution.  spreading this page via all social media platforms and through family and friends!
Thank You

story:
The McClintock Project:

  • My name is Aaron McClintock, I am 24 years old and I have always had the vision and dream of becoming a professional motocross racer. It has been a long and humbling journey but I feel I am finally on the brink of my dreams becoming a reality. The video above pretty much covers everything.  Me and fellow racers/film makers Dylan Wineland and Connor Barnes are attempting to race a handful of AMA Pro Nationals this season in hopes to achieve the goal of racing with best and to make a unique follow up to "The McClintock Project" 
  • I am traditionally not one to ask for much help but in this case, time is of the essence and funding the journey is a bit of a challenge. Any contribution is so greatly appreciated and I can promise you that I will pour my heart and soul into this experience hoping that you will know you made a difference.

What We Need & What You Get

  • All donations go immediately into the gas tank or towards race fees. I have enough for 2 of the 12 rounds so far but I am shooting for six. It will cost between $500-$1000 per round depending on the destination.  
  • If you are a business owner and donate I will put your logo on my bike and helmet and hopefully I will give your business deserved exposure at the races and in the follow up video. Email aaronmcclintock620@yahoo.com for more on representing you. 
  • Thank you for your time and consideration.  Wish us luck!

story:
QuickZip: The Original Hole-free Belt That's Made in America

In 2009, Steinhausen developed a revolutionary belt that:

  • Has no holes
  • Doesn't wear out
  • Adjusts 1/4" at a time
  • Adjusts with a click of a button or cinch of the belt without having to unbuckle your belt
  • Provides the ultimate comfort
  • Is made from genuine leather
  • And is manufactured in America

When I began the project, I was told I would never be able to manufacture the belt in the United States. I was told the materials weren't available and neither was the skilled labor needed. After nearly two years of research and sourcing, Steinhausen produced the first American made QuickZip Belt using Italian leather. A few months later the first American made QuickZip Belts were available with All-American leather!

Steinhausen initially produced thousands of men's belts in a variety of colors and leather grains. The belts are made in Los Angeles, California using leathers from the United States and Italy. The QuickZip Belt has since been knocked off, copied (like so many great products are), made overseas, and sold/marketed under a variety of names with a variety of stories. Still, nothing comes close to the quality and lifetime guarantee of the original QuickZip Belt by Steinhausen!

What We Need & How You Score

We are looking to produce more of our traditional belts as well as launch additional belt styles with a variety of leathers and a smaller width belt designed for women:

  • We are looking to raise $10,000 to make more of our existing QuickZip Belts as well as to begin making women's styles and sizes
  • The belts will always be made in America!
  • We have sourced environmentally friendly and sustainable leathers, including vegetable tanned leathers and even salmon farmed leathers!
  • Greater economies of scale are possible with higher levels of funding, which would lead to lower costs and more affordable belts for everyone
  • Even if f we don't reach our goal of $10,000 we will manufacture a lower volume of QuickZip Belts with the funds that we do receive

How you benefit is tremendous:

  • The Ultimate comfort with instant resizing of your belt in 1/4" increments
  • Gain or loose weight without your belt holes tell on you
  • Fashionable, top quality feathered edge belts
  • A belt that truly lasts a lifetime and is guaranteed for the life of the belt
  • Style, style, and more style. Plus, you are getting the original, made in America hole-free belt!
  • All contributions come with added benefits that will help you feel good and add some luxury to your life
  • Support American jobs

Reduced Waste

I also plan to use funds over the $10,000 goal to start utilizing a process that takes the scrap leather that is left over and pieces the leather together into strips that can be used for more belts. This process is a complex one, but I now have the ability to do it at a reasonably affordable rate right here in Los Angeles! This leads to a greater percentage of our leather being used and much less waste.

Usually only 80-90% of the actual cowhide can be used in making belts. This will lift our utilization to over 96% I will also utilize the remaining scraps to make watch straps for Steinhausen's leather watch bands and wallets. My ultimate goal is to utilize as close to 100% of every cowhide!

Here are some of our genuine leather exotic prints made in America from American leather. These are several of the exotic leathers that I am looking to launch if I can beat our $10,000 goal. These simulated exotic leathers are made in Florida from American cowhide.

Other Ways You Can Help

Maybe you can't contribute money, but that doesn't mean you can't help support American manufacturing jobs!

  • Please help us get the word out by sharing on Facebook, Twitter, your blog, or even good old fashioned talking with your family at dinner.
  • Indiegogo has a variety of share tools available to make sharing easier!

Thank you for your support!

story:
365 Jewelry Designs

    My name is Jeanne, I want to make a difference.  Last year I turned 50, and although I love my job as a chiropractor, I knew I wanted the next 50 years to be different.  In August, I heard Blake Mycoskie, founder of TOMS shoes speak at our church.  He challenged everyone to " Start Something That Matters".  To make a difference.
     
   An idea popped into my head to design necklaces that have meaning.  I realized that all the people who had received free shoes and vision care must have felt loved at that moment.  Since I was sitting in church, I realized God loves us 365 days a year.  So do our pets . And for most of us, someone else loves us too, a spouse,child, friend, etc. 

   My idea was to use the design 365 on a sterling silver disc for a necklace.  I want everyone to ask someone who is wearing it, "What does the 365 stand for?".  Above the 5 will be a heart--meaning someone loves them 365 days a year, or a G, representing God, or the picture of a dog--our dogs love us unconditionally every day!

The Impact

   I want to be able to donate 25% of the profits to fund charitable organizations such a cancer research and pet adoptions.  I have a love of dogs and am a leukemia survivor.  I had a stem cell transplant in 2001 and later relapsed.  I am currently in remission and on a drug called Gleevec which was funded by ccharitable donations.  More money is needed for cancer research, to help people with pancreatric and other hard to treat cancers.  They don't have a drug like Gleevec.


What We Need & What You Get

    I need $5000 to get the necklace manufactured and into the market place.  I plan to use social media and a website to sell the jewelry.  I am a hardworker and know the value of a doller. I started my chiropractic practice  virtually from scratch, and through hard work and frugality made it a success.  Your money will not go to waste.  Even if I don't reach my goal, the money will be saved until my goal can be reached.  I am resourceful. I will not give up.  Someday when you see a 365 necklace on someone you will be able to say you were part of the start up!


Other Ways You Can Help

Please pass this on to anyone you think may be interested.

story:
Short Summary

TREnDS spreads the message that all women are uniquely beautiful. The goal is to help members discover their own individual styles and make the voice of teens heard by the fashion industry.

TREnDS is hosting an inaugural full-day workshop and fashion show in downton Toronto to spread and strengthen the message of TREnDS, help women gain confidence and knowledge through practical and theoretical workshops and a fashion show to help women embrace their beauty, both inside and out.

The event targets 250+ teens and the women who influence them in Ontario and Quebec. You, as a partner, will be able to help empower these women.

The event will take place on May 23, 2015 at the Sheraton Centre in Toronto Hotel.


What We Need 

A full-day ticket to this event costs $150. The price is set to cover our costs only. We want young girls and women of all ages to be able to take full advantage of our workshops, talks and Mother/Daughter Fashion show.   Many families, especially those with more than one girl, have expressed their desire to attend but are unable to do so, because of the cost.  

We are trying to raise funds that will go directly to offset the cost of the tickets so more people will be able to take advantage of this worthwhile event.  For example, for every $50 we receive we can sell a ticket at $100.  If excess funds are received we can give additional discounts to families with more than one child.  

The Impact

TREnDS hopes to equip young girls and women of all ages to challenge the media and culturally driven tendencies towards the objectification of young women, particularly in the fashion and entertainment industries. By donating, you will be helping in this mission.

Other Ways You Can Help

Help us spread the word! Email your friends and family about our event and join us on Saturday, May 23, 2015 at the Sheraton Centre Hotel in Toronto. Join us for the full day event, or in the evening for our Mother/Daughter Fashion Show! For more information, please visit:

www.trendsfashion.ca

story:
Recent Press:

                                       

"Whether you use the ChargerGenie as a central location for the kids video game outlets or for your business travel, life with cords just got a lot less confusing."

- The Crowdfund Mafia

                                                                                                                                 "Normally, you would stuff your electronic devices into a purse, sack, or some sort of bag, and then carry a power strip separately. This project simply puts them together."

                                           

"5 Lessons Learned on Entrepeneurship from the founder of ChargerGenie."

                                       

 "In addition, ChargerGenie has been certified in the U.S. and Canada by the leader in safety certification, Underwriters Laboratories (UL)."

                                       

"I’ve left enough power cables behind at airports and hotels to be a wee bit curious about the ChargerGenie..."

                                                

"For anyone who's ever struggled to find a place to store and charge all their  mobile devices, two sisters have come up with a solution, and they're introducing it to the world on Indiegogo." 

 *****************************************************************************************************************

 Stop looking for gadgets all over your home -- and never leave another charger behind!  

What is ChargerGenie®? 

ChargerGenie® is a simple solution to a new age problem.  With ChargerGenie® you can organize all of your electronic devices and their chargers by storing them in one simple bag.  And here's the kicker --'THE BAG' PLUGS INTO THE WALL!  That's right, you plug your devices into the bag and the bag will fully power and charge them for you.  It's the ultimate, fully mobile charging station/tote-bag. 

Design, Functionality & Benefits

  • Organize, Travel and Charge

  • The first time ever that a powerstrip & storage compartment are united 

  • 6 Power Outlets and 2 USB Ports, 125V 15A 1875W

  • Organizes and stores: personal electronic devices and their chargers like iPad Mini, Kindle, Nintendos and accessories like ear-buds, headsets, game-cards, memory cards & sticks and much more

  • Smart upside down outlets to accommodate most of today's chargers

  • UL® certified - This is a big deal! UL® sets the standard in product safety testing so you can rest assured that ChargerGenie® is safe for you and your family. It's also so unique that UL® had to create new amendments to standards to include testing for fabric flammability & water leakage

  • Durable, lightweight and designed to attach to the handle of most rolling bags or pack easily into a suitcase

  • Saves time, money and the inconvenience of replacing lost chargers and gadgets   

 What this Means to You

Now you have a great all-in-one solution to organize your electronic life in-home or on-the-road!  With ChargerGenie® you can end the frustration of searching your home or hotel room for all of your 'stuff' and never leave another charger behind.  ChargerGenie® saves time and money -- which we believe makes for a happier you!

In-Home or On-the-Road

When at home, use ChargerGenie® to organize and charge your devices and de-clutter your life.  When it's time to travel, simply pick up ChargerGenie® and you're ready to go!  It slides right over the handle of most rolling bags and packs easily into any suitcase. Stop searching and make that flight on-time!

What Can I Keep in my ChargerGenie®?

It's great to organize and store lots of stuff like: phone chargers, iPad Mini, Kindle and other eReaders, personal gaming devices such as Nintendo, Sony PSP, LeapFrog,   Ipod/iPod Touch and the multitude of chargers that came with the devices you own.  It's also great for keeping your accessories such as earbuds, bluetooth headsets, SD Memory cards, flash drives, game cards, collapsable head-phones and more in one convenient place.   

ChargerGenie® evolved from Real Life Experience of Founder/Inventor Jeannie (aka "Genie")

As a working technology executive with plenty of gadgets, Jeannie spent her fair share of time in hotel rooms and on the road where she realized that finding a place to charge and losing chargers were a big problem.  Even in modern hotel rooms, the outlets were never ample enough - especially for family vacations. Tired of tripping over power-cords, crawling behind nightstands and charging her phone in the bathroom she began to carry her electronics in a plastic bag and kept a power-strip in her luggage. The plastic bag was soon replaced with a more durable canvas tote and she wondered "Why the two had never been joined before?." After much searching, she couldn't believe it had never been done --and ChargerGenie® was born!  Meet Jeannie (aka "Genie") in the video! 

 *****************************************************************************************************************

Meet the ChargerGenie® Users: Which "Genie" Are You? ...

 *****************************************************************************************************************

 1) Busy Moms: Do you have a lot of gadgets and games to organize in the home or on trips?

    

_____________________________________________________

2) Students: Do you have too many roommates and too few outlets?

    

_____________________________________________________

1) Road Warrior: Do you work at a home office or on-the-go? 

 

 

____________________________________________________

4) Traveler: Stuck in the airport?  Turn that one outlet into 8 charging ports and make a friend by sharing your power!

 *****************************************************************************************************************

ChargerGenie® is Safe and has already achieved prestigious UL® Certification in USA & CANADA!

Underwriters Laboratories Inc. aka UL® is an independent, not-for-profit product testing and certification organization and internationally recognized as the gold standard in product safety. The United States government classifies approved UL® testing laboratories as Nationally Recognized Testing Laboratories.  ChargerGenie® has spent the past 2 years undergoing, rigorous flammability, shock, water leakage testing and more and has been fully UL® certified. It's also so unique that UL® had to create new amendments to standards to include testing for fabric flammability, water leakage and more. TakeCharger founders have invested over $50K into the UL® process to ensure ChargerGenie® was a product safe enough for their family and yours!

 

 

*****************************************************************************************************************                  

 About US:

TakeCharger LLC is the manufacturer, supplier, and e-commerce vendor of ChargerGenie®. ChargerGenie® is the first patent pending storage compartment and power strip in one! Jeannie DeSanctis founded Take Charger LLC in 2009 to create ChargerGenie®. Jeannie, a tech executive, carried a ziplock bag and a powerstrip to solve the lost charger, no outlet problem. These were the early seeds of ChargerGenie®.  This isn't Jeannie's first time at innovation.  As the founder of mRocket, Jeannie developed and launched the first mobile shopping application in the United States and has had an extensive career in the digital and mobile industries.  

Co-Founder Laura Dugan has had an extensive background in pharma/biotech and electronics sales.   

The diverse skill-set of the two creates a winning team!

Fun Fact: Laura and Jeannie are sisters!

*****************************************************************************************************************

Schedule

July - IndieGoGo Campaign

August - Manufacture

September - Ship to USA

October - Deliver to Customer

*****************************************************************************************************************

 FAQ

Question:  I know sometimes on crowd funding sites the product never gets made.  Will I definitely receive my ChargerGenie®?

Yes! ChargerGenie® is already being manufactured and soon shipping to the USA to our E-Commerce fulfillment partner, Fulfillrite in Lakewood, New Jersey. TakeCharger LLC has invested its own money to make the product before launching on Indiegogo so ChargerGenie® has been de-risked to ensure every ChargerGenie® order would be fulfilled.

Question:  Why is ChargerGenie® plugged into a wall and not a battery pack?

Answer: They do different things. ChargerGenie® stores and charges all types of devices so you would keep your portable battery charger in your ChargerGenie® when it's not in use.  While portable battery charges are useful and improving, they have capacity limits and the more powerful ones are expensive ranging in prices from $40 for a simple phone top-off device up to $200 for one that will add 5 hours to a tablet.  The portable battery has to then be charged itself.  ChargerGenie® delivers a powerful 1875 watts and can fully charge and power 8 devices at once including a laptop.  ChargerGenie® is light weight and at $49.99 MSRP delivers great value.  When on the road, you can carry your portable battery with you and when you return to your hotel or home - charge and store it in your ChargerGenie®.

Question:  Can I order this product outside of North America?

Answer:  ChargerGenie® has UL approval in USA and Canada.  We are not currently shipping outside of North America. 

**************************************************************************

*****************************************************************************************************************
Schedule
July - IndieGoGo Campaign
August - Manufacture
September - Ship to USA
October - Deliver to Customer
*****************************************************************************************************************
 FAQ
Question:  I know sometimes on crowd funding sites the product never gets made.  Will I definitely receive my ChargerGenie®?
Yes! ChargerGenie® is already being manufactured and soon shipping to the USA to our E-Commerce fulfillment partner, Fulfillrite in Lakewood, New Jersey. TakeCharger LLC has invested its own money to make the product before launching on Indiegogo so ChargerGenie® has been de-risked to ensure every ChargerGenie® order would be fulfilled.
Question:  Why is ChargerGenie® plugged into a wall and not a battery pack?
Answer: They do different things. ChargerGenie® stores and charges all types of devices so you would keep your portable battery charger in your ChargerGenie® when it's not in use.  While portable battery charges are useful and improving, they have capacity limits and the more powerful ones are expensive ranging in prices from $40 for a simple phone top-off device up to $200 for one that will add 5 hours to a tablet.  The portable battery has to then be charged itself.  ChargerGenie® delivers a powerful 1875 watts and can fully charge and power 8 devices at once including a laptop.  ChargerGenie® is light weight and at $49.99 MSRP delivers great value.  When on the road, you can carry your portable battery with you and when you return to your hotel or home - charge and store it in your ChargerGenie®.
Question:  Can I order this product outside of North America?
Answer:  ChargerGenie® has UL approval in USA and Canada.  We are not currently shipping outside of North America. 
**************************************************************************

story:
Hi!

My name is Sophie Kula. I am a young Polish fashion designer. 

You can check out my works here : www.facebook.com/Sophie.Kula 

as well as what inspires me here: www.sophiekula.tumblr.com


photo : Marek Mulenko www.marekmulenko.com



I recently got an invitation to present my collection at an exhibition during Haute Couture Paris Fashion week in January.

It’s a big chance for me to present my work and spread some colours Internationally. But financially it’s something I can't afford on my own! 

That’s why I'm asking for your help.

    

  
photo : Marek Mulenko www.marekmulenko.com


Sweet Memories

In Paris I would like to show you and the Fashion world my new collection ‘Sweet Memories’. 

The Collection is inspired by warm childhood memories: innocence, cartoons, sweets, toys ,moments of my life. Repeating patterns on a perfect white background, using wheels and colored pinstripes, ended by sparkling sequins, plastic studs and stars.

To made this clothes I used silk and cotton. 

The Polish premiere Collection „Sweet memories” was during Final Competition Elite Model Look in Warsaw in August 2013 


photo : Izabela Sawicka www.facebook.com/pages/izabela-sawicka-photographie


ART GEORGIA exhibition

The Société Anyome agency in Paris is inviting young fashion designers from Eastern Europe twice a year. It's big occasion to show their (hopefully including mine) new collections to international stylist, buyers and journalist. 


The event is organised during the most important Fashion Week - Haute Couture. It's a moment where the whole fashion world meets in Paris. 

The Organizator Sofia Tchkonia says:

“The aim is to show the countries, rich in culture. Through art and fashion. To build the bridge between fashion and art professionals and young talents. Give visibility and support and break boundaries.
The concept is to create a relaxed atmosphere for fashion representatives, boutique and speciality fashion buyers, selected VIP’s, socialites, journalists, stylists, magazine representatives, fashion and art professionals.” 


Costs:

The funding I am asking for will be used for the following: 

Participation in the exhibition (entry fee)
Preparation of a photo shoot, 
Printing flyers and other promo materials, 
Transport,
Accommodation

I hope you like my colourful world, and will help me to spread it into the world!

  

    

photo : Marek Mulenko www.marekmulenko.com


My Previous Achievements

- Finalist Fashion Competition OFF VII edition in 2010
- Distinction Elle Poland / October 2010 
- Graduate diploma MSKPU March 2011
- Finalist Fashion Competition Fashion Oscars in March 2011 
- Distinction Fashion Magazine debut in 2011
- The fashion film "Fabric of Dreams", realised with photographer Wojtek Rudzki, in the finals Warsaw Fashion Film Festival / Cinema Luna, Warsaw 2012 www.vimeo.com/30691477
- Premiere Collection "Global Warming" - XI Heineken Open'er Festival / July 2012 Gdynia
- Fashion box / October 2012 Warsaw
- Collection show "Global Warming" during Neo Fashion Jamboree Festival in Bielsko Biala
- Collection show "Global Warming" in Silesia Fashion Look 2013 in Katowice
- Nominated for the prize: Silesia Fashion Point 2013
- Premiere collection "Sweet Memories" during Final Competition Elite Model Look / August 2013

photo : Grzegorz Rzeźniczek www.grzezniczek.tumblr.com

story:
Start

Hello friends/prospective investors,

We all know the saying “give a man a fish and you will feed him for a day, but teach a man to fish and you will feed him for a lifetime”. Since its inception over 4 years ago, the vision of iheartgo has been to become a sustainable organization that will help communities flourish, with a goal of having 100% of our public donations going towards the projects for which they are intended. For the past few years we have grown thanks to the generous support of our financial partners, but, as you know, even after having a huge meal one day, you will still be hungry again the next day. With an expanding vision and more responsibility, we think it’s time we learned how to fish.

Today, we would like to introduce you to the “social good” brand #hecommandedus, the brand that’s spreading the Great Commission message and doing good. With the recent establishment of iheartgo’s technology institute in Uganda, the organization has a need for an increase in revenue now more than ever. In order to steer clear of the donor-dependent model for income, we decided to put our skills in branding, production, and development to good use by launching a brand of products whose proceeds will go towards sustaining iheartgo’s operations and its expanding international work.

About the brand

We love people; that’s why we work in both secular and Christian realms to advance our vision for community development. However, it only makes sense that our brand is taking Jesus’s direct commands and putting them on clothing and other products. The aim of the brand is not to sell the message, but to promote the social good being done by our organization.

The Plan

We will launch in early/mid-summer 2014, pending the raising of the funds below.

Here’s how we are proceeding:

We are seeking to raise initial capital of $4,500 to get 400 fully customized t-shirts of 1 design in different sizes and colors ready for market. To start, we will only process orders within the U.S. We will hire 1 part-time, commission-based employee who will handle all the shipments, while the customer service is handled via Internet by our full-time U.S. staff currently working in Uganda. The gross income from the first run will be invested back into printing a second design, thus kick-starting the process over again. After the initial cycles are complete and we’ve attained stability, 50% of the profits from all products henceforth will be contributed towards the sustainability of iheartgo and its international humanitarian work.

About the shirts

100% cotton Next Level Apparel t-shirts, fully branded with 1 color design on front displaying the command and the brand logo directly underneath, tagless print in tag area (inside back), stitched tag on right sleeve. Retail value of $25.

We highly value your contribution and your willingness to make a difference internationally,

-Anthony & The iheartgo team

story:
Short Summary

Hello All! My name is Ashant'e Clayborne Roberson and I am a wife, mother, author, Special Education teacher, and most of all, A CHILD OF GOD! Like most people in their lives, I had moments of uncertainty in regards to what I was suppose to be doing with my life. I felt a void and I tried to fill that void by working a lot, going back to school, engaging in toxic relationships, and even partying but nothing could fill that void. I would often watch people doing great things and thought that one day that could be me, but I did not know what I was suppose to be doing. One day I finally asked my Creator, what do you want me to do with the life you gave me? And he gave me two things that I am suppose to be doing. The first was to write a book called Tidbits for Women and the second is to start a Christian tee shirt line called From Him Through Me Tees. By doing these two things, I will be able to minister to others and build the Kingdom of God, which is my sole purpose in life! Do you know how good it feels to know what your purpose is in life? There are so many people in the world that do not know their purpose and the are lost. I want to offer the hope that you can find your purpose and live life to the fullest, and not at the world's standards. Raising this money to start my company will start my mission. Thanks in advance for your support. 

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • I need at least $2,000 to pay for screen printing, get a website up, and advertising cost. 
  • The fund will go towards the above items, even if I do not reach my goal.

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know how the difference their contribution will make:

  • This project is going to help spread the word about Christ and let people know that they too have a purpose in life.
  • I have achieved one of my goals by co-authoring the book called Tidbits for Women that can be found at http://www.lulu.com/ and Amazon.com so I am a hard worker and will reach my goals. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can not help fiscally, your words are just as powerful so please spread the word!
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
We are thrilled to introduce CAVAL, The world’s first mismatched sneakers. We have two feet. Why wear two identical shoes?

CAVAL sneakers are unlike any other on the market. Our original and fun sneakers are designed to make you stand out from the crowd.

Designed in Paris and handcrafted in Portugal, our sneakers are comfortable, chic, and high quality. Crafted out of the finest Italian leather, CAVAL sneakers are built to carry you through the journey of life.

Get FREE WORLDWIDE SHIPPING when you order 2 or more pairs!

READY TO JOIN THE MISMATCHED REVOLUTION ?

 

 

We dared ourselves to be different…

At CAVAL, we believe that your style should be as original as you.

We want to see a brighter world, where people are free to express themselves fully and have fun while doing it. Our unisex sneakers are perfect for those who dare to stand out.

CAVALs were designed to be noticed while fitting in perfectly in your wardrobe. They can be dressed up and down. Wear them from the office, to happy hour, to wherever else life takes you. Life is a beautifully mismatched journey and our sneakers reflect just that!

 

CAVAL sneakers are designed in Paris, created in Portugal, made with Europe’s best materials. Mismatched, unique, and durable, CAVALs are unlike any shoes in your closet. 

In 2017, three friends united under one crazy passion: mismatched sneakers. Simon and Achille met while studying at Paris’s top business school, HEC. Their friendship formed when they noticed each other doing the same unusual thing: wearing mismatched shoes. Knowing that an ordinary office job wasn't for them - Simon and Achilles decided to walk their own path and follow their passion for unique sneakers. Together with Benoît, the artistic designer, they created a team. Over the course of one night, the team turned their dreams into reality and created their first pair of sneakers. And just like that, CAVAL was born! 


 

 

We are very concerned about the social and environmental impact of our sneakers. That’s why we have decided to entirely produce our sneakers in Europe. We personally visit all of our subcontractors to ensure our sneakers are being made responsibly and ethically. 

Making sure our workers are being treated fairly is a top priority for us. All of our workers in France, Portugal, and Italy are paid living wages and work in the best conditions. Furthermore, all the materials we use to craft our products strictly respect all of the European Union environmental laws and regulations. 

 

 

 

CAVAL sneakers are all about details: there are always 7 differences between both feet! Will you find them all ?

​

 

 

 

 

1. Click "Back this Project": Select the available reward tier you would like to pledge on the right side of the page or click here. Each backer may only make one pledge.

2. Payment: Enter your payment information. Your payment won't be effective until the very end of this campaign.

3. Size, Color & Shipping Information: Don’t worry about that yet! You will get to select your Size, Color choice and submit your Shipping at the very end of this campaign.

4. You will receive your CAVAL sneakers before Christmas :)

 


If something doesn’t feel right - exchange them! We accept returns and exchanges within 30 days after you receive your package, no questions asked.

We will exchange your CAVAL’s for a new size - don’t worry, shipping for the new pair is on us! If you would like to return your CAVAL’s, you will be refunded the entire perk amount, but you will be responsible for the cost of shipping for the initial pair. For both returns and exchanges, CAVAL will not refund any taxes and duties you may have paid. 

 

 

Achille, Simon and Benoit want to go beyond simply selling sneakers. They want to create a global community of unique people (The Mismatched Community) who dare to be different and who can recognize each other anywhere in the world, simply by looking at each other’s shoes. The Mismatched Community finds strength in our differences and embraces originality.

5000 pairs of CAVALs are out in the streets of Paris.

We are proud to bring our project available to you! Help us grow our community.

We are on a mission to free people around the world from uniformity.
Let’s express our uniqueness – together.

Together our community will free people from uniformity, one step at a time.

The Mismatched Community finds strength in our differences and embraces originality.

5000 pairs of CAVALs are out in the streets of Paris.
We are proud to bring our project available to you! Help us grow our community.
We are on a mission to free people around the world from uniformity.Let’s express our uniqueness – together.
Together our community will free people from uniformity, one step at a time.

story:
This is our second round of production of Peke•buo- the Smart, Little Diaper Bag. We have already taken care of the all the set up, materials, exporting---in fact we have over 500 bags being produced right now just for you! That means , *if all goes as planed, the first 500 bags can be shipped before Christmas!  All orders after the first 500 will be fulfilled by end of March 2017.

Take advantage of these never-before-seen holiday deals!  All prices will go back to normal after campaign is over--$60 retail. While supplies last!!

 

 

Finally, parents can carry their own bag! Pull out Peke•buo when baby needs a change. Dad doesn't have to suffer the embarrassment of carrying a purse! Approx dimensions folded up: 10.5"× 7.5"; width depends on how much you put in it.

Unlike Velcro or snaps and buckles, sewn-in magnets offer the ultimate closure solution. They don't wear out,  make noise or catch lint. Magnets provide a sleek, effortless closure.

FOUR sewn-in magnets are found in the secret 'Quick Diaper Pocket' underneath your bag. These magnets also help align your bag when folding it up.

 

TWO more magnets are found on the wipes flap for smooth closure.

 

Surfaces that touch your baby, surfaces that touch the ground, and the exterior surfaces are separate from each other, protecting your baby from germs and keeping your bag looking clean. All surfaces are wipeable and hand washable. The sewn-in magnets ensure that it folds up neatly.

And spend ANOTHER $100-200 because they aren't satisfied with their diaper bags!

YOUR SEARCH FOR THE PERFECT DIAPER BAG IS OVER! And it is way under $100 here on Indiegogo...in fact  try it out for as low as $39!!

PLUS. You will likely fit PEKE•BUO into a bag you already own and love.

PEKE•BUO is more functional than any other diaper bag out there.

More than 100 of each color are currently in production. When the campaign is complete, all backers will have the opportunity to provide three color preferences per bag. We will do our best to get every one their first or second preference, however, if you are determined to get a certain color and we are not able to provide it before Christmas, your bag will be shipped with the remaining orders before March 2017. A clear explanation and instructions will be provided in the Post-Campaign Survey.  

With now hundreds of Peke•buo bags out there, the review are in!! People claim to "LOVE!!!" their bags! (all reviews are unaffiliated)

"The swiss army knife of diaper bags!" -Aleisha C, UT :: Kickstarter backer

"We fit everything we had in our other huge diaper bag into your bags & now it fits in our stroller. It has already been so much easier to use and makes traveling with our 4 month old twin girls much easier. "  - Randy J, AZ :: Kickstarter backer

Here is an honest video review from a grandparent:

 

 

Love!!!

 

Go to our Facebook page to witness the live-action excitment of our supporters!
 

Most people pronounce the name of the product ‘peek-a-boo’ when they first read it, which is fittings the fun surprise elements of the diaper bag. 

Sariah Tate, creator of the bag and brand, is a native Spanish speaker and has inserted some fun hidden meanings.

Peke represents the Spanish word ‘peque’, meaning small and also used to refer to small children. The product is both intended for small children and also one of the key features of the bag is that it is very compact. 

Buo represents the Spanish word, ‘buho’, meaning owl. Owls are iconic for wisdom or intelligence which ties in with the 'smart diaper bag' concept.  The product unfolds to mimic the shape of an owl. 

Little Owl.

Here is the video we submitted to the University of Utah Opportunity Quest Competition where we placed third and received 2k to help move our project forward. It features one of the very first bags Sariah Tate created at home...not to mention her family. Enjoy! Video credit goes to: Story It Up

 

From there we took our prototype to Kickstarter and got the support we needed to lay the foundation for our business. Now we need funds to get everything up and running sustainably. That is were you come in. Share in the joy that so many parents are experiencing right now by supporting this campaign.

Unlike Velcro or snaps and buckles, sewn-in magnets offer the ultimate closure solution. They don't wear out,  make noise or catch lint. Magnets provide a sleek, effortless closure.

FOUR sewn-in magnets are found in the secret 'Quick Diaper Pocket' underneath your bag. These magnets also help align your bag when folding it up.
 
TWO more magnets are found on the wipes flap for smooth closure.

 
Surfaces that touch your baby, surfaces that touch the ground, and the exterior surfaces are separate from each other, protecting your baby from germs and keeping your bag looking clean. All surfaces are wipeable and hand washable. The sewn-in magnets ensure that it folds up neatly.
And spend ANOTHER $100-200 because they aren't satisfied with their diaper bags!YOUR SEARCH FOR THE PERFECT DIAPER BAG IS OVER! And it is way under $100 here on Indiegogo...in fact  try it out for as low as $39!!PLUS. You will likely fit PEKE•BUO into a bag you already own and love.PEKE•BUO is more functional than any other diaper bag out there.More than 100 of each color are currently in production. When the campaign is complete, all backers will have the opportunity to provide three color preferences per bag. We will do our best to get every one their first or second preference, however, if you are determined to get a certain color and we are not able to provide it before Christmas, your bag will be shipped with the remaining orders before March 2017. A clear explanation and instructions will be provided in the Post-Campaign Survey.  With now hundreds of Peke•buo bags out there, the review are in!! People claim to "LOVE!!!" their bags! (all reviews are unaffiliated)"The swiss army knife of diaper bags!" -Aleisha C, UT :: Kickstarter backer"We fit everything we had in our other huge diaper bag into your bags & now it fits in our stroller. It has already been so much easier to use and makes traveling with our 4 month old twin girls much easier. "  - Randy J, AZ :: Kickstarter backerHere is an honest video review from a grandparent:  Love!!! Go to our Facebook page to witness the live-action excitment of our supporters! 
Most people pronounce the name of the product ‘peek-a-boo’ when they first read it, which is fittings the fun surprise elements of the diaper bag. 
Sariah Tate, creator of the bag and brand, is a native Spanish speaker and has inserted some fun hidden meanings.
Peke represents the Spanish word ‘peque’, meaning small and also used to refer to small children. The product is both intended for small children and also one of the key features of the bag is that it is very compact. 
Buo represents the Spanish word, ‘buho’, meaning owl. Owls are iconic for wisdom or intelligence which ties in with the 'smart diaper bag' concept.  The product unfolds to mimic the shape of an owl. 
Little Owl.

Here is the video we submitted to the University of Utah Opportunity Quest Competition where we placed third and received 2k to help move our project forward. It features one of the very first bags Sariah Tate created at home...not to mention her family. Enjoy! Video credit goes to: Story It Up
 
From there we took our prototype to Kickstarter and got the support we needed to lay the foundation for our business. Now we need funds to get everything up and running sustainably. That is were you come in. Share in the joy that so many parents are experiencing right now by supporting this campaign.

story:
Let me introduce... 

FLYREB by Antikythera The watch conceived as an instrument for adventures... the most complete of all analog watches.  

check it out...

 

Our Design

Every detail of the ANTIKYTHER FLYREB project started with a series of hand-drawn sketches. We found the solution to define the rule for divers. We focused on simplifying all the complexity of the product, giving a clean and modern look that is now the core of the ANTIKYTHERA brand. After getting feedback on our concepts from a number of designers and business associates (people we knew would be interested in our product), our designs went through various revisions and were optimized so that they could be converted into CAD drawings.  

3D technical drawings and Antikythera's draft

SCUBADIVER RULE CALCULATOR 

 

 

Example just fo Tech scuba divers, how to calculate the pressure at the limit of O2Pp 1.4 using a Nitrox 32 (NI)

 

 I° - Collate number 10 on the outer ring with the percentage of mixture you want to calculate in this case 32 as 32% of gas mix  

II° - In the outer ring, in front at the number 14 (1.4 OTU) in the inner ring, you can see the maximum pressure not to exceed 44 ( exactly is 4,375 BAR = 33,75 mt)

TRAVELLERS: Exchange Rates Calculator

 I° - Collimate the number you consider "foreign currency exchange" (example in YEN) that is on the outer ring with the "10" number of the inner ring. In this case 1 US$ = 133 JP YEN (example)  

II° - Do you want to know the equivalent of 300, 3000 YEN? Look for the "30" outer ring and the value is exactly collimated with the number in the inner ring. In this case 300 YEN = 2.25 US$ (3000 YEN = 22.50 US$).

 

The Making of ANTIKYTHERA  

We have chosen a manufacturing company based in northern Italy, the choice has been made based on its experience. It has been a legendary company in the design and realization of watches for over 50 years, with great professionalism and reliability. Another very important detail to ensure a complete cycle of the project is that the company is equipped to handle large production lines. Another not uncommon fact is that the company headquarters are just 25 kilometers from our studio so this proximity was important because it allowed us to oversee the production of the Antikythera watch product line.

 The history and the tradition combined with its constant technical updating, ensured high quality standards, able to meet the needs of the great names in the watchmaking industry, whose names must be treated with confidentiality, in observance to the current privacy policies. In addition to manufacturing department for third parties, Is the producer and the worldwide licensee of MOMODESIGN and MONDIA brands, with its own Italian and international distribution networks.

 

 

Images of three Antikythera models

Scubateck Model

 

Takeoff Model

 

Military Model

 

Timeline

story:
It Is I, Lucian - Artist and Known Rune Pervert

I love pins.  Whomst among us doth not?  We're all gays, it's 2019, and we're down to frankly bedazzle the crap out of every apparel flap we can lift up and pierce.  I've made badges since I was a child, and was very excited to get my adult hands on one of those big butch kerchung steel presses to make 1" button badges for conventions.  I made a superb set (if I do say so myself) of runic badges finished with transparent iridescent film - combining my love of bindrunes and iridescence in one nice little magic toolkit. 

It is now several years later, and my favourite Pin Guys, PinPals Ltd, will now happily do "rainbow anodisation" on their pins.  What does this mean?  This means, my friend, that I can now actualise my rune magic badges in enamel pin format.  All the clunky pointy gorgeousness of pins, but without having to abandon the luscious magical iridescence.  Excited?  I am.  Read on.

Sorry, I Just Got Here.  What's a Bind Rune?

So runes, right? You know what a rune is?

I Guess So - They're Viking Letters, Right?

In a manner of speaking, yes, that's right.  Runic writing systems were the normal way of writing Germanic languages before the adoption of the Latin alphabet, dating from around 150CE and generally dying out around 700CE (central Europe) and 1100CE (northern Europe) as the cultures that used them were Christianised.  Some places persisted in using runic scripts right into the 20th century, but those are rare.  Where our alphabet is called the "alphabet" after the Greek names for the letters in order (alpha beta gamma, etc.... so "alphabet"), runic writing systems are typically called a futharc/futhark, after the first six letters in order (F, U, Th, A, R and C).  These are runes.  Runes! That's they.

Unlike the Latin alphabet, though, each letter has a word associated with it, and therein a concept.  Isaz (the letter I) means ice, and Raido (the letter R) means a journey, for instance.  This lends the runes themselves to be used in symbolic ways, and as a means to smash a lot of concepts together in visually harmonious and potent ways.  The Vikings used to do this to emblazen various intents and purposes on their possessions.  Boats had runes conjoined to encourage them not to sink on their voyages, mugs were stamped with runes to keep the drinker safe from poison - that sort of thing.  These harmonious glyphs are called bindrunes, because they are several runes bound together.

This Is Clear And I Am Enlightened. Now, Please Tell Me Of Your Bindrunes

So here are the gorgeous bindrunes I have created, and their explanations.  There was a much shorter form of this on the packaging of the original badges I made. 

   mannaz - isaz - ansuz : lovely friend time

Mannaz, the rune for mankind, interpersonal relationships, means isaz, the frozen lake, and ansuz, the voice of god, or an appeal to the gods for input.  A crystallised moment of interpersonal harmony, frozen in time and sanctified.

  algiz - kenaz : I trust my own eyes

Algiz, the rune of magical protection (or, more specifically, the desire to protect others) meets kenaz, the torch.  If you don't trust your own perceptions, how are you meant to get anywhere from that?

  wunjo - ansuz - nauthiz : move on, I'm begging you

Wunjo - joy, happiness and fulfillment - collides heavily with nauthiz, the unignorable pull of necessity through will, and ansuz, the voice of the gods.  I will find my happiness elsewhere, for god's sake!

  tiwaz - eihaz - nauthiz : I can & entirely fucking will

Tiwaz, the glyph of the god Tyr, cognisant with sacrifice, meets eiwaz, the potent and deadly Yew tree, and nauthiz, the drag of willpower.  Not even the death of a god will stop this juggernaut. 

  laguz - hagalaz - nauthiz : idk man just fuck me up

The unknowable liminality of laguz, the lake, meets hagalaz, a hailstorm, the all-consuming power of nature and the weather, with just a pinch of nauthiz's bloody desire and need.  Have fun out there.

Each pin is 10mm x 29mm - absolutely tiny and very thin!  Enamel is cut out where there's negative space, giving them an airy, ephemeral feel.  I designed them this way to work together as a group, each sitting harmoniously alongside its siblings.  My mockups are already done and accepted, and they're up in the gallery above this panel.  I have no example of the beautiful reality of rainbow anodised enamel, but Google images will tell you with images I'm not allowed to purloin.  Suffice to say, it's exquisite.  Each pin will be backstamped with @misterlucian, so you can remember where you got them.  I have not yet decided how to package them.  Probably all five on one card, plus individual backing cards for each "loose rune"?  Sounds all right, I'll do that.

I've worked with PinPals Ltd. many times before, and they're reliable, and of exceptional quality.  The turnaround from order is about a month, so as this campaign trundles on until the end of August, I imagine the pins will get in around October.  They'll be ready for Thought Bubble and MCM London!

The funds in the first instance are for 100 of each design, which I intend to parcel up into 50 sets of all five, plus 50 "loose runes" for individual sale.  This will be £1070 in total, so I've popped a bit on top of that for administrative costs, post and packaging, all that.  You get it.  Any excess will just make more pins.  More, and more runes.  Tonnes of runes.  Tunes of runes.  Tonnes of Ronnes. uh

I Don't Money. How? To Support? please

Please try yelling.  There exist many good yelling holes these days, like "the twitter", and instant Graham, and all those horrible places where we sink our idle minutes.  Either way, once this pre-order is finished, the resultant Rune Sillage will be available in my shop and at conventions, like everything else I make.

story:
Previously known as "TheCityof$ales", my team and I are proud to present a new refined vision in urban street wear: Authentix Collection Ltd. With service as our cornerstone, our commitment is to provide New Zealand with EXCLUSIVE gear at affordable prices!

In a few weeks, we're hoping that our dream will become a reality. We are committed to:

1. Operating our own business.
2. Separating ourselves from the competition.
3. Set a new benchmark in service and accessibility
4. Give back to the community.

We dedicate this project to our brother Peter Cross and everyone else who has ever lost loved ones to suicide. Life is short and precious. We want to do our part in helping change the way suicide is viewed. We firmly believe that ‘giving back is getting back’. This is why we are supporting the Life Matters Suicide Prevention Trust with a portion of our proceeds once our business is up and running.

We want everyone to feel good in their own skin and we understand the importance of individuality and the freedom to express. The exclusive nature of our product married with the accessibility of our service means anybody can be a part of our movement. For those who join us, you will wear our product with pride, free of fear and rejection.

We trust you'll do your part in helping us do ours! For it is by small and simple things, that great things are brought to pass. We hope you enjoy and we appreciate all of your support! 

We believe that you should know your donation is being well used which is why we'll be aiming for complete transparency in how our business runs and show specifically what challenges your donation is helping us overcome. We will be documenting our journey for you to follow at:

Facebook: Authentix Collection Ltd.

Instagram: @authentixcollection

Snapchat: Authentix.Co

story:
UVCWear™ is a wearable Far UVC-emitting device, which also includes Bluetooth speakers, microphone, headphone jack, walkie talkie-like features, and color-changing LEDs for style and status. 

Studies from Columbia University and others show that Far UVC kills viruses (like COVID-19) & bacteria and is safe for skin and eyes. 


(Visible LEDs for demonstration. UVC is not visible.)

We're a team of engineers & scientists from MIT, Harvard, Apple, Israel, and top hardware companies around the planet, with years of experience creating functional, stylish, affordable, long-lasting hardware that makes life safer and more enjoyable.

*Jason to join June 1, 2020

Because we wanted UVCWear to be not only practical, but comfortable and enjoyable enough to wear all day, UVCWear includes speakers, microphone, and headphone jack so you can listen to music or take a call, and it changes colors for style and status.

Teams and families can use UVCWear to communicate instantly with each-other, even if they're across sheets of glass, across buildings, or across the planet.

UVCWear is light and comfortable enough to wear all day, while you work, relax, or exercise. 

In fact, because it's got speakers, you can listen to music or have a call while still hearing the road as you jog, bike, skate, or scoot.

UVCWear can run all day with swap-able batteries, and or you can plug it in to a battery pack or charger and keep going non-stop.

UVCWear is waterproof and impact-resistant (IP5x), able to stand up to tough environments.

The outer shell is silicone, which you can wipe-down easily and which helps add additional impact- and water resistance, while keeping UVCWear exceptionally light and flexible.

 

Masks are important, but aren’t perfect. They can be very uncomfortable to wear, fail to seal 100% around your mouth, and also do not protect your eyes and exposed skin. Over the day they build-up particles on both sides, those breathed towards you and those you exhale, and viruses like COVID-19 can stay alive for days on such surfaces (They also cause CO2 and other toxins you normally exhale to build up, even causing wearers to faint).

UVC light hitting exposed particles will kill it, so if you’re wearing a UVCWear Collar and the light is hitting your mask and face, it’s working to kill viruses and bacteria on those surfaces, as well as bacteria headed your way. While nothing is guaranteed (and we cannot and do not promise to cure, prevent, or treat a disease the FDA!), every little bit helps -- a dead virus or bacteria cannot infect you.

 

A 2018 study by Columbia University Medical Center’s Center for Radiological Research found narrow-spectrum UVC light was effective at eliminating the H1N1 virus. Columbia University also says it can kill COVID-19, “Far-UVC light has the potential to be a ‘game changer,’” said Dr. David Brenner, professor of radiation biophysics and director of the center. “It can be safely used in occupied public spaces, and it kills pathogens in the air before we can breathe them in.”

A 2014 study in the American Journal of Infection Control found that portable UVC devices killed 100% of commonly-found bacteria within five seconds and inactivated 90% of spore-forming bacteria, which are harder to kill, within 40 seconds.

A 2015 study in Travel Medicine and Infectious Disease of a portable UVC light found it capable of killing between 94.98% and 99.99% of germs when used properly.

 

Our team has made multiple hardware devices protecting thousands of people around the United States. This device is no different in our diligence for ensuring we get proper certifications. We have filed a patent (pending), and intend to file more. We have also scheduled our FCC testing, with our existing partners, to ensure the device operates legally.

While UVC has proven highly-effective at killing viruses and bacterias, the law does not allow us to market any device as intended to cure, treat, or prevent any diseases or conditions. We are not a medical device and not intended to cure, treat, or prevent any diseases or conditions and do not intend to go for FDA approval for such. Because viruses mutate (COVID-19 has at least 30 strains identified already, and other bacteria and viruses do the same), we cannot and do not guarantee that the device will work 100% or any

percentage. Just as masks are not perfect to 100%, do not expect any physical device to protect you from a virus (Plus, you may already have it and be asymptomatic. There is simply no way to know at this point.)

Obviously, it is our hope and intention based on the science and technology at-hand that our device reduces most or all of the virus and bacteria content headed toward your face!

Legal Disclaimers (We must acknowledge the following):

  • The FDA has not evaluated any statements or products herein. UVCWear is not intended to treat, cure, prevent any disease or condition.
  • UVCWear is intended only as an experimental, consumer air filtering device, and not as any kind of medical or health device. 
  • UVCWear must be worn and powered properly to help reduce the number of airborne live airborne particles you breathe.
  • UVCWear cannot eliminate the breathing in of all particles and cannot eliminate the possibility of getting sick
  • UVCWear is not FDA or NIOSH approved.
  • Depending on the rate at which particles approach your face and the angle of the UVC light some or many particles may not be exposed to UVC for a long-enough period at the proper intensity to be killed.
  • You should still wear a mask if and as directed for proper protection.
  • Production of 222nm LEDs is new and there may be delays and hiccups in manufacturing & testing them at the quality and quantity required. 
  • Due to COVID19 delays, shipping of the product may take more than 120 days from backing and production. We cannot guarantee shipment times due to many shipments being stalled, delayed, and even held at Customs.
