UVC is not visible.)We're a team of engineers & scientists from MIT, Harvard, Apple, Israel, and top hardware companies around the planet, with years of experience creating functional, stylish, affordable, long-lasting hardware that makes life safer and more enjoyable.*Jason to join June 1, 2020Because we wanted UVCWear to be not only practical, but comfortable and enjoyable enough to wear all day, UVCWear includes speakers, microphone, and headphone jack so you can listen to music or take a call, and it changes colors for style and status.Teams and families can use UVCWear to communicate instantly with each-other, even if they're across sheets of glass, across buildings, or across the planet.UVCWear is light and comfortable enough to wear all day, while you work, relax, or exercise. In fact, because it's got speakers, you can listen to music or have a call while still hearing the road as you jog, bike, skate, or scoot.UVCWear can run all day with swap-able batteries, and or you can plug it in to a battery pack or charger and keep going non-stop.UVCWear is waterproof and impact-resistant (IP5x), able to stand up to tough environments.The outer shell is silicone, which you can wipe-down easily and which helps add additional impact- and water resistance, while keeping UVCWear exceptionally light and flexible. Masks are important, but aren’t perfect. They can be very uncomfortable to wear, fail to seal 100% around your mouth, and also do not protect your eyes and exposed skin. Over the day they build-up particles on both sides, those breathed towards you and those you exhale, and viruses like COVID-19 can stay alive for days on such surfaces (They also cause CO2 and other toxins you normally exhale to build up, even causing wearers to faint).UVC light hitting exposed particles will kill it, so if you’re wearing a UVCWear Collar and the light is hitting your mask and face, it’s working to kill viruses and bacteria on those surfaces, as well as bacteria headed your way. While nothing is guaranteed (and we cannot and do not promise to cure, prevent, or treat a disease the FDA!), every little bit helps -- a dead virus or bacteria cannot infect you. A 2018 study by Columbia University Medical Center’s Center for Radiological Research found narrow-spectrum UVC light was effective at eliminating the H1N1 virus. Columbia University also says it can kill COVID-19, “Far-UVC light has the potential to be a ‘game changer,’” said Dr. David Brenner, professor of radiation biophysics and director of the center. “It can be safely used in occupied public spaces, and it kills pathogens in the air before we can breathe them in.”A 2014 study in the American Journal of Infection Control found that portable UVC devices killed 100% of commonly-found bacteria within five seconds and inactivated 90% of spore-forming bacteria, which are harder to kill, within 40 seconds.A 2015 study in Travel Medicine and Infectious Disease of a portable UVC light found it capable of killing between 94.98% and 99.99% of germs when used properly. Our team has made multiple hardware devices protecting thousands of people around the United States. This device is no different in our diligence for ensuring we get proper certifications. We have filed a patent (pending), and intend to file more. We have also scheduled our FCC testing, with our existing partners, to ensure the device operates legally.While UVC has proven highly-effective at killing viruses and bacterias, the law does not allow us to market any device as intended to cure, treat, or prevent any diseases or conditions. We are not a medical device and not intended to cure, treat, or prevent any diseases or conditions and do not intend to go for FDA approval for such. Because viruses mutate (COVID-19 has at least 30 strains identified already, and other bacteria and viruses do the same), we cannot and do not guarantee that the device will work 100% or anypercentage. Just as masks are not perfect to 100%, do not expect any physical device to protect you from a virus (Plus, you may already have it and be asymptomatic. There is simply no way to know at this point.)Obviously, it is our hope and intention based on the science and technology at-hand that our device reduces most or all of the virus and bacteria content headed toward your face!Legal Disclaimers (We must acknowledge the following):
The FDA has not evaluated any statements or products herein. UVCWear is not intended to treat, cure, prevent any disease or condition.
UVCWear is intended only as an experimental, consumer air filtering device, and not as any kind of medical or health device. 
UVCWear must be worn and powered properly to help reduce the number of airborne live airborne particles you breathe.
UVCWear cannot eliminate the breathing in of all particles and cannot eliminate the possibility of getting sick
UVCWear is not FDA or NIOSH approved.
Depending on the rate at which particles approach your face and the angle of the UVC light some or many particles may not be exposed to UVC for a long-enough period at the proper intensity to be killed.
You should still wear a mask if and as directed for proper protection.
Production of 222nm LEDs is new and there may be delays and hiccups in manufacturing & testing them at the quality and quantity required. 
Due to COVID19 delays, shipping of the product may take more than 120 days from backing and production. We cannot guarantee shipment times due to many shipments being stalled, delayed, and even held at Customs.

story:
Chammock Original recently received the  Red Dot Awards 2015: Winner in the product design: Leisure, sport and Games category out of 4,928 entries from 56 countries.

Red dot official website:

http://bit.ly/1MCZ4s3


  • The most Compact and easy to stow hammock chair
  • Ingenious design provides a supportive upright seating position
  • Needed only 4 feet (120cm ) width to set up hammock chair
  • Quick and easy set-up 
  • Weight is less than a can of coke.
  • Packed size smaller than mini ipad
  • The sides of the chair are open so you’re not get that “cocooned” feeling while sitting, and you can hang your arms out. 

Chammock Original is inspired by the natives of Philippines who knit the bamboo into a chair. Thanks to modern waxing technology, the fiber can be super light and strong. We can transform the traditional hammock chair into the most compact and easy to stow ever - Chammock Original.

The “Chammock Original” is a hammock chair with small pack size, and weight less than a can of coke. It is made from the highest quality nylon and lightweight aluminum carabiners for optimal safety. It is very easy to assemble, and only required small room to set up. Hung from trees, posts, boat masts and whatever you can find that is stable and range of  4 feet (120cm) or wider.

On “Chammock Original”, there are two pocket bags, one is on the top to stuff jacket inside as a pillow for better comfort, and the other one is on the bottom for storing the “Chammock Original” as well as storage when you sit on it. You can also stretch your arm and chat with your friends through the two holes beside.It also included one adjustment strap to adjust width between two carabiners for optimizing your comfort curve.Use it to remember your last comfort curve and replicate it..

As serious hikers, we also love hammock. However, it is not very comfortable to sit on one. When we sit on the hammock as chair, the edge of the hammock will actually press on our thigh since it is very tight when sitting on. On the other hand, it is also not going to give a good upright support.You are not going to enjoy it if having back issue.

That is why we design Chammock. It has an asymmetric cut, where the upper side is for supporting your back and the bottom side is for supporting your butt parts. You are going to feel like sitting on a real chair and it is also easier to get out of.

The ”Chammock Original” is lightweight , comfortable and easy to set up, therefore making it highly suitable for backpackers, hikers, campers or just occasional naps.


We love outdoor activities- a lot. 

This idea came from one of our trips from Patagonia to Yellow stone Nation Park. We have hammocks with us, but very little chance to use it. While hiking or camping, the hammock is not very easy to set up in the wild. It needs two solid items in between 10-15 feet (300-360 cm). On the other hand, the hammock is designed for laying not for seating, you will find difficulty to sit on it to read or have a decent meal. When you sit on the hammock, your back can’t count on it. So you can only sit for a very short period of time. That is why we come up with the idea –Chammock Original.

Since we understand the size and weight really matter for those hiker and climber, we try to minimize the size and weight as much as we can. After dozen of prototypes we had tried , the final design offers not only easy assembly but also with its construction based on durable, high-quality materials.

Since it is really lightweight and compact, it can be easily set up anywhere. We usually use it during the hiking trips when you don’t really want to sit on cold stone or snow. It is also suited for reading and eating during the casual use at nearby park or even just in your own yard.

  • Fabric: Rip-stop nylon
  • Unfolder dimensions: 45 X 68 in (115 X 172 cm)
  • Folded dimensions: 7 X 6 in (17 X 15cm)
  • Included two lightweight aluminum carabiners 
  • Included one 40 in (100cm) adjustment strap
  • Weight: 10 Ounces (280 g)
  • We had already performed 10,000 sitting cycle with 264 lbs(120 Kg) on the hammock chair.

During the campaign, we can come with the better price. The retail store profit will be ignored. We are offering discount price at $79 including the hammock chair, two lightweight aluminum carabiners and tree friendly straps set. After the Indiegogo funding period is over , The price will be offered at $95+.

Chammock Original : Rose & Orange

Lightweight Aluminum Carabiners (Closed Gate Strength: 10 kN - 1000 kg - 2050 lbs)

Tree Friendly Straps Set (90 in - 230cm/Each)

story:
We are mainly about giving you multiple perks and discounts on online products but we have much much more.

Here are 12 features we have so far

1. Know How Area (formerly Web Tools Wiki).

We are transporting all the posts from Web Tools wiki into crowdify.tech. We have around 3500 different pages already our goal is to have many many more and to keep making them better and better.Will have a simple app where users can get tips about tools for beginner and advanced levels

2. Jobs

We will have a jobs app called Techcruitment App. We will have a jobs board for technology jobs. We will initially white label an Australian companies software which we can embed.

3. Shop

Shop will be a simple embed of Shopify. We will sell tech related goods from Amazon and Alibaba and other places.We will have banner ads for goods from shop throughout the site.

4. Places

This will be an area where we promote coworking spaces and venues for meetups. It will be connected to DropPin App.

This area will be a little like Product Hunt. This will be the only part of the site where people can comment. Only premium members can submit products and comment.

6. Stockmarket

The stockmarket will evolve as we get users and feedback. Our users can pick 2 tech categories they want to be seen as influencers in.

7. Events

This area will be a little like Eventbrite and will connect with the Mingle App.

8. Crowdfunding

This will be one of our most important features it is not so easy to build but hopefully we will have it working by Christmas. Is in our other site crowdify.fund right now but will be migrated.

9. Perks

Perks are our main feature. This is where we will give our premium users massive discounts and even some free access to a myriad of online tools.

10. Blog

The blogging set up is there right now I hope that they will become a place for you to share and get promotion of your content.

11. Tasks

Use your Crowd Coins to set tasks for other users. Use your imagination to get others doing stuff for you online.

12. Bitcoin

Pay other users or send funds requests with Bitcoin. Every user gets their own free wallet.


After 8 years as an advisor to and an investor in startups I have identified huge needs. Startups find it hard to connect to tech bloggers so that they can more easily get the word out about their new service or product. Ditto for connecting with venture capitalists. 

We have made a networking game and a website and group of apps that are going to be very attractive to anyone who loves technology. There will be a constant flow of great perks and discounts for premium members. There will also be opportunity to get your content seen and promoted.

Crowdify will also incorporate the Web Tools Wiki a knowledge base of over 3500 online tools. We have built 2 apps so far one for events and one for venues. We are working on 4 more apps as well.

We will become a launching pad for tech startups as well as the major connection point for tech lovers online. We also intend organizing real life meetups in cities worldwide.

What We Need & What You Get

We are looking for 200 initial founding members who will be part of forming Crowdify and who will benefit greatly from showing interest in what we are doing. It is just $40 to take up this opportunity. The perks and discounts you get access to just in the first month will save you over $40. The usual monthly cost is $12 a month or $144 for a year. There is also much more than just saving over $100. 

The initial 200 members will get; 

  1. A full year of premium membership to Crowdify for under 30% of the usual cost. 
  2. Ability to blog in the Crowdify website about tech once a day these blog posts will then be promoted to our community. 
  3. A Founders Badge. 
  4. Ability to run 3 tasks in Crowdify forever even if they do not renew membership after a year. 
  5. Access to premium perks and discounts even if they do not renew membership after a year. 
  6. Exclusive ability to become our first affiliates when we launch our paid membership to the public in November 2015.
  7. Access to an exclusive Facebook group of Crowdify Beta testers.

 

This video will give you an indication of how we started! is looking better and better and getting more and more useful each day.

When does your year of premium membership start? 

Your one year of membership will start on November 1 2015. Until then please join us in our beta testing if you wish and begin blogging in Crowdify and completing and setting tasks for other beta testers. New features will be rolled out every day. We would love any feedback from you as to how we can improve the site and our apps.

As for the opportunity to run a Perks campaign you will get big big value from this if you have some kind of online service or product that people pay for. We will introduce paying members to you and create a huge win-win for you and our members. 

Thank you look forward to being part of all this with you

Thank you look forward to being part of all this with you

story:
Short Summary

With your help, we aim to open a brick-and-mortar sewing studio in downtown Bloomington, Indiana. We believe expanding into a commercial space will allow us to provide services for a larger part of the community, and to create well-paying jobs for local seamstresses/tailors.

My name is Liby Ball, current owner and head designer at Liby Ball Sewing & Design. I am a self-taught seamstress from Boise, Idaho with over 10 years of professional sewing experience as a certified Bridal Alterations Specialist.

A few years ago, I was working as the Alterations Department Manager of a major bridal retailer. I discovered that the options were very limited, not only in size and style, but I was limited in the work I was allowed to do. I got so tired of saying “no” to my clients!

Everyone deserves to dress the way they want to, especially on their wedding day!

Start-up funding will essentially allow me to achieve my dream: Opening a sewing studio (outside of my home) with a focus on body-positivity.

 

What We Need

I am asking for $5,000 to use as start-up expenses for a commercial space. What are start-up expenses? Here are just a few examples:

  • hiring employees
  • advertising
  • paying the deposit on the new space
  • maintenance fees and construction costs
  • buying furniture, front counter, shelving
  • getting a cash register and accounting system
  • designing a new website
  • and maybe, just maybe… JOINING THE GALLERY WALK! (There’s an application process…)

 

What You Get

Have you SEEN our amazing logo?! Hartz Design hooked us up!

Take a look at all of the different items we’re offering with our custom “Pin-Cushion Sunburst” design, starting at just $5! Let us know you love us by showing off our logo, with a sticker, pin, pin collection, shirt, or tailor’s apron!

Want MORE than merch? Check out our VIP sewing packages!
 

The Impact

We aim to provide our clients with first class service, which includes providing a comfortable, intimate setting for fittings, personalized one-on-one consultations, and immaculate attention to detail. 

We are already an established “destination” experience; we just need a bigger venue!
 

Risks & Challenges

We have done our best to predict the future of our business, but starting any new venture is always risky!  For example: there are several other sewing shops downtown, already... Is there room for one more?

We think so! Our current business continues to grow each year. Last year alone, we experienced growth of over 30%!

We specialize in all things WEDDING. This sets us apart from our competitors. We've been in the wedding industry for 14 years, and have been an active part of the Bloomington Wedding Professionals group for the last 3 years.

We also have plans in place, sacrifices we can make if need be. We will adjust as necessary to make sure that our clients’ needs come first!

If we can’t raise the full $5,000, we will not be able to join Gallery Walk for our first year. But that’s ok!

We still plan to be an active part of the Downtown Bloomington community: teaching sewing classes, hosting craft nights, fashion shows, etc!
 

Other Ways You Can Help

There are plenty of ways that you can help us, even if you can’t donate! 

Tell your friends about our campaign! Share our message on social media! 

Are you one of our customers? Add your story: How were we able to help you?

story:
We are Harmattan Design (Holt & Radu), many of you know us for our Smart Belt series. With a track record spanning 5 years and 7 Campaigns with over 50 000 backers in crowdfunding overall, it's safe to say we have done this before.

 

  This year, as before, we have improved  upon our innovative belt to make it even better. We've done it with your help and feedback and are grateful, sincerely and extremely grateful to the Kickstarter Community  for providing us with a home and a place of learning.

 

THE SMART BELT ULTIMATE 2020 -  This year, upon backer requests we have brought back all the colors from previous iterations and added 2 more for a total of 10.

On the technical side of things, the Smart Belt Ultimate is the pinnacle of what we can do, the leather is now dyed in depth, something completely new to our process and the buckles have received a (rarely seen in buckle manufacturing) third layer of protective coating. For those of you that are new to our project please have a look at the 4 INNOVATIONS THAT HAVE MADE THE SMART BELT A HOUSEHOLD NAME ON KICKSTARTER: 

 

  Firstly, replacing the 5 hole system with 32 adjustments brings a world of comfort and a whole new dimension of adjustability. Not many people think about it or realize it but, our waist changes as we go about our business throughout the day. A classic belt does not adjust correctly because holes are too far apart.

Forget feeling tight or loose, you'll forget you have a belt on but your pants will stay exactly where they're supposed to. 

 

Our Kevlar® Core built with Kevlar® fibres is our staple innovation. Belts wear out because the leather flexes longitudinally and loses structure. Our Kevlar® Core prevents that from happening by reinforcing the whole structure like nothing else. It makes the whole thing highly durable yet light and comfortable.  We are the only licensee authorized by DuPont to make belts using the Kevlar® brand.

DuPont™ and Kevlar® are trademarks or registered trademarks of E.I. du Pont de Nemours and Company used under license by Harmattan Design LLC  (Project Creators).

 

T  he Leather we use is the most exclusive leather anywhere in the world. Vegetable Tanning is almost a lost art. Because it takes longer to tan the leather with natural tannins it has been replaced by chromium tanning at the turn of the century. We get our leather from a small valley in Tuscany, Italy, one of the handful of places in the world where this is still done. It's much more resilient that normal leather, it's all natural, eco friendly and really smells good too. It will come with a certificate of authenticity and a serial number. THE SMART BELT ULTIMATE is the first belt we make out of leather that is dyed structurally, inside, as opposed to painting the top layer. By doing this, we made sure that scratches can be reabsorbed inside the leather itself, a kind of self healing.

 

 Have you ever had a problem with a wrong size or buying a present for someone, ever been in between sizes? Not our Smart Belt Ultimate. You will get to make your own size, so no chance of getting it wrong. Please remember that our belt will cover a max. waist size of 115 cm / 45". FOR THE SMART BELT ULTIMATE iteration, the buckle has received a third protective layer a lacquer that will make the buckle even harder to scratch.

 

60 COLOR / STRAP / BUCKLE COMBINATIONS

 

THE SMART BELT ULTIMATE  is the most diverse we have ever made. The leather will have all the variations of previous years plus some new ones.  

10 STRAP OPTIONS:

 You can choose any of the 10 colors at the end of the campaign and we will send you an email with a link to the order survey.

DYED THROUGH LEATHER FOR ALL STRAPS - ALMOST IMPOSSIBLE TO SCRATCH!

For the first time, THE SMART BELT uses leather that is dyed by soaking and tumbling so that the color gets inside the structure of the leather, IMPOSSIBLE ALMOST TO SCRATCH. 

 

 

Our well known line of track and ratchet buckles, 6 options.

WE HAVE ADDED A THIRD LAYER LACQUER!

Now even harder to scratch and wear out!

 

 

ALL 60 OPTIONS HERE

This year 2020, for THE SMART BELT ULTIMATE, we will ship pledges out to backers every week starting the middle of OCTOBER!

 

SHIPPING MIDDLE OF OCTOBER!

 

 

 

SATISFACTION SURVEY

 

We send out a satisfaction survey each year, to our knowledge we are the only Kickstarter Project to do so. We do it because we want to know if where doing right by our backers or not. Our result speak for themselves,  the numbers from The Smart Belt 2.0 and 1.0 show that more than 95% of our backers very happy with their pledge and said that our belt is better than any they have had before.

 

SOME OF THE VIDEO REVIEWS SENT BY BACKERS (4 MIN. MONTAGE):

“The belt is tightened by pulling it through the buckle and the ratchet tightens in small steps. To release the belt, pull the end that pokes out of the buckle whilst pushing the buckle release knob and push the belt back through the buckle. Once you’ve done it a couple of times it becomes second nature. When you get the belt, the leather part is long enough to fit the widest waist (within reason). Wrap the belt around you and cut to length so what the middle of the ratchet on the front end of the belt meets the cut end of the belt. Best to cut longer and then fit the buckle. You can always trim a bit more so that it eventually it is cut to your size. There is a small cream leaflet that comes with the belt and buckle that shows all this. That’s how I did it, and it’s the most comfortable belt I have ever owned.”

DuPont™ and Kevlar® are trademarks or registered trademarks of E.I. du Pont de Nemours and Company used under license by Harmattan Design LLC.

We welcome third party sharing of our product in graphic form and text but only if in accordance and in full respect of trademark and copyright use guidelines concerning Kevlar® issued by it's respective owner, E.I. du Pont de Nemours and Company.For more information on using these trademarks linked to the materials we use in manufacturing THE SMART BELT ULTIMATE, please visit:  Kevlar® Trademark Policy

We, Harmattan Design LLC, are a responsible company and believe that quality is of the utmost importance. As such, we source our Kevlar® Fibre directly from manufacturers licensed by E.I. du Pont de Nemours and Company and are Registered Customers.

Patents and Intellectual Property

Part of our due diligence as a reputable company, in launching a new product, is the undertaking of an IP Audit. Such an audit, by a well known US IP specialised law practice, has deemed our Smart Belt ULTIMATE to be free of any infringement on any  standing patent, domestic or foreign. Any claim to the contrary, in a public arena, in a purposeful attempt to disparage our efforts will be pursued for damages.

Video and Audio Content

All footage, images and soundtracks presented within this campaign are our own manufacture or are licensed from their respective owners for the purpose and scope in which they are used. Testimonials of our product are voluntary and renders from actual backers from previous campaigns that have had extensive experience in using  the initial iteration of The Smart Belt ULTIMATE. The testimonials are their own manufacture and are used with their specific and direct consent.

Warranty & Money Back Guarantee

The Smart Belt ULTIMATE has a limited warranty of 1 year from the receipt of the product. The warranty covers manufacturing defects, structural failure of the buckle or the strap. The Money Back Guarantee is valid 30 Days from receipt of the product and can be claimed only after the product is returned to us in a good working order and with no apparent marks, cuts or signs of wear.

We've done it with your help and feedback and are grateful, sincerely and extremely grateful to the Kickstarter Community  for providing us with a home and a place of learning.

Everything about the belts are simply amazing. ????????”Kickstarter, Backer #10475,  comment:“The belt is tightened by pulling it through the buckle and the ratchet tightens in small steps. To release the belt, pull the end that pokes out of the buckle whilst pushing the buckle release knob and push the belt back through the buckle. Once you’ve done it a couple of times it becomes second nature. When you get the belt, the leather part is long enough to fit the widest waist (within reason). Wrap the belt around you and cut to length so what the middle of the ratchet on the front end of the belt meets the cut end of the belt. Best to cut longer and then fit the buckle. You can always trim a bit more so that it eventually it is cut to your size. There is a small cream leaflet that comes with the belt and buckle that shows all this. That’s how I did it, and it’s the most comfortable belt I have ever owned.”Kickstarter, Backer #159634,  comment:“I have just received my belts. Superior quality and excellent design. As such, we source our Kevlar® Fibre directly from manufacturers licensed by E.I. du Pont de Nemours and Company and are Registered Customers.Patents and Intellectual PropertyPart of our due diligence as a reputable company, in launching a new product, is the undertaking of an IP Audit. Such an audit, by a well known US IP specialised law practice, has deemed our Smart Belt ULTIMATE to be free of any infringement on any  standing patent, domestic or foreign. Any claim to the contrary, in a public arena, in a purposeful attempt to disparage our efforts will be pursued for damages.Video and Audio ContentAll footage, images and soundtracks presented within this campaign are our own manufacture or are licensed from their respective owners for the purpose and scope in which they are used. Testimonials of our product are voluntary and renders from actual backers from previous campaigns that have had extensive experience in using  the initial iteration of The Smart Belt ULTIMATE. The testimonials are their own manufacture and are used with their specific and direct consent.Warranty & Money Back GuaranteeThe Smart Belt ULTIMATE has a limited warranty of 1 year from the receipt of the product. The warranty covers manufacturing defects, structural failure of the buckle or the strap. The Money Back Guarantee is valid 30 Days from receipt of the product and can be claimed only after the product is returned to us in a good working order and with no apparent marks, cuts or signs of wear.

story:
Project Latitude | A Brand That Belongs to Those Who Need It


What | Project Latitude takes the social impact business model to the next level by creating products that support your next adventure and a community in need.  

How | Each product line will be part of  a different “project”. The product will be inspired, designed and made by a community in need. The sales from the product will go towards building needed infrastructure(s) that will allow the community to flourish.

Why | We like adventure and we love helping people so we took our architectural backgrounds and created a business that allowed our passion to also be our career.

When | Each product is tied to a community for the entirety of the project. Each new project will define a new line of products where the funds from sales will go towards the needs of the community it will be serving.


Each project will have a fundraising goal that will allow us to help out in the best way possible. We are architects, so almost every project will respond to the communities’ construction needs.


Each project will have a fundraising goal. We are architects, so every project will respond to the communities’ construction needs. Since this particular project is a build, let's say it's a certain amount of bricks needed to be raised. Every product we sell will count towards this fundraising goal.


Meet the Chaski Backpack for Project 00...

The Chaski Backpack is an all-purpose roll-top backpack designed for people like us, one that could be used in the city AND on adventurous weekend getaways.

Each Chaski is individually handmade in Ecuador. Chaski means messenger in Quichua - the local Andean language.

Local Material Shoulder Strap Detailing

Exterior Pockets for Everyday Essentials

All Detailing is made from 100% Recycled Car Tires

Padded Interior Laptop Compartment

Rubber Bottom with Unique Pattern from Recycled Car Tires

AustriAlpin Quick-Release Buckle

Handwoven Interior Lining and Accent Strap

Multiple Strap Colors Available

All products are stamped with the latitude coordinate where the product is from. The Chaski has 00 for Ecuador.

Anyone can track the impact the sales are making as well as track the overall progress of the project on our website. Each product will also come with a tag about the members of the community.

Our hope is to create a brand that will ultimately impact communities across Latin America by rethinking the way volunteer projects are funded.

While many other companies offer to donate a portion of their proceeds to a good cause, Project Latitude actually takes the funds - or bricks in this case - and builds the project!

We have already raised enough funds to build an entrepreneur workshop within the community of La Isla outside Quito, Ecuador.  We are now raising funds for the second build within the community - a daycare center for the youth of the workers in the entrepreneur workshop along with some much needed equipment for the entrepreneurs.   With the help of volunteers, Project 00 will do these builds in early 2017. These spaces will provide the community with much needed space for production, which in turn will empower the workers and the community as a whole.

story:
About the Project 

RIDER1991 is a wristwatch of a unique design with a crown embedded into the case. It is devoted to the idea of free movement and inspired by one of the designers' friend impressions from his road trip on an old motorcycle around his country as well as by the atmosphere and aesthetics of the Café Racer motorbike culture.

RIDER1991 watches are produced right now!  

In July 2017, RIDER1991 conducted successfully the campaign on Kickstarter where 227 baсkers from around the world supported our project and helped us to raise $27,689USD out of the $25,000USD expected.

This allowed us to launch successfully the mass production of the watches according to the plans. The producing is on its final stage now and we are preparing to deliver our watches to all the baсkers by the New Year of 2018 as promised.We thank all Kickstarter baсkers and are grateful in advance to all the Indiegogo baсkers for believing in our team and supporting RIDER1991 project.

RIDER1991 name consists of a word and a number by analogy with the approach to the name of famous motorcycles. RIDER is an independent traveller with no limit of age, language or status, seeking adventures in life. 1991 is a year when the watch creators Homeland started its own Free Movement in a History.

Motorcycles clear but gradually smoothed edges, diamond-shaped handles and seats, special shades of color, the combination of brown leather and black brushed metal are the basis of the RIDER1991 watch design.

The main emphasis of the watch design is a crown that resembles a motorcycle diamond shape throttle. It is located at the level of 2 hours and recessed into the watches stainless steel case. It is esthetic and allows the wrist to move freely while driving or other daily movements.Minimalistic design of the dial repeats some detail of a motorcycle speedometer. There are the Arabic numbers 6,7,8,9 symmetrically opposite the minute scale. The used font BDP GeLLY can be found at the numbers of racer motorcycles and cars in 60-70 years. 

The lugs emphasize the case and dial style. A special latch on the strap makes it easy to change.

5 basic models of the RIDER1991 were chosen. RIDER1991 offers the watches with black or white dial and with an aluminum inner ring brushed in silver, black, rose gold. And different color genuine leather and Mesh Band straps are proposed.

All watches are equipped with quartz movements Miyota GL30 and have 5 atmospheres water resistance.

Cafe Racer is a special kind of motorcycle and motorbike motion of 1960s in London. Gathered often in pubs and cafes motorcyclists came up with original entertainment – music race. Street racers had to cover a distance of about 2 km from cafe to a certain point and back while the song on the jukebox was playing.

The serial motorcycles were not suitable for such events. So the riders began to improve them - to dismantle all the excess weight and to install fairings for less air resistance. The wheel was changed to clip-on. The elongated narrow fuel tank and a single seat became a distinctive feature of Cafe Racers.

A motorbike has always been more than just a means of transport. It is part of a certain lifestyle, values and rules that bring together very different people moving in one direction with a sense of independence, uniqueness and confidence.

Thank you very much for supporting our project! You can pledge any reward till January 2018 . There are some advices in FAQ how you can do it easily. We will mail you to arrange the exactly model you have chosen after this crowdfunding campaign ends.

We are sincerely grateful to any media, magazines, bloggers and everyone for the interest and support of our project. We will be glad if you tell about RIDER1991. You can find all information, images and videos here.

Please, do not hesitate to contact us for any questions: welcome@rider1991.com

We will be happy to meet you on RIDER1991 social media pages - Facebook, Instagram, Youtube as well as on our web-site - RIDER1991.com

In October 2015 RIDER1991 won the main prize of the international competition of industrial design INDUSTART. The watch design concept won in its nomination Watches & Accessories and became the absolute winner. The competition had 8 nominations and the designers from 35 countries were taken part. 27 influential journalists, architects and designers from 14 countries evaluated the participants’ works.

As we have mentioned above RIDER1991 conducted the successful campaign on Kickstarter crowdfunding platform In July 2017 where 227 baсkers from around the world supported our project and helped us to raise $27,689USD out of the $25,000USD expected. We thank all Kickstarter baсkers and are grateful in advance to all the Indiegogo baсkers for believing in our team and supporting RIDER1991 project.

The RIDER1991 is a collaborative project of Ukrainian designers Nazar Maletz and Roman Geviuk, the founders of the international design studio GM design group, and watchmakers Andrew Kravchuk and Olga Kuchmeeva, the founders of designer watches project ZAVOD.

The team is united by their love to timepieces and aesthetics of the 60s and 70s of the 20th century as well as the desire to explore the fundamental concepts of time and beauty through its manifestations in culture, subcultural movements of different eras, architecture and design. Moreover they are all inspired by the idea of developing a new craft watchmaking in Ukraine with the use of the actual technologies in accordance with the principles of sustainable development and social responsibility.

That's why RIDER1991 team has placed the project on Kickstarter before and on Indiegogo now - to ask everyone who gets this idea close to support us! 

Working prototypes of the RIDER1991 watches were made in 2016. This year crowdfunding campaigns on Kickstarter and Indiegogo have been launched. Also RIDER1991 presents the prototypes at special events in Ukraine and Europe and has started production of the watches in August 2018. RIDER1991 team plans to make the gifts for our baсkers on New Year and to start the shipping exactly before Christmas Holidays.

Risks & Challenges

The RIDER1991 team sincerely thanks everyone who has supported or is going to support our project. To reduce all possible risks we decided to make working prototypes before starting on crowdfunding platforms. The RIDER1991 watches prototypes have been tested during four months and now we can guarantee the quality of the watch, compliance to the approved design and the reliability of the partners.

ABOUT PARTNERS AND SUPPLIERS. 
Team RIDER1991 is very responsible for the choice of partners. Therefore last year we visited the prestigious watch exhibition in Basel (Switzerland) to look for manufacturing suppliers. Also we involved qualified consultants of outsourcing production. Thus we chose seven most appropriate factories and visited all of them preliminary to estimate their work quality. After that we chose the best two factories and invested in the production of prototypes on both. Thus we found the best partner from Hong Kong with more than 15 years of successful watchmaking experience, with excellent production capabilities and highly qualified engineers and managers. We use this approach in choosing any partners or suppliers and can guarantee you high quality and meeting your expectations.

WARRANTY. 
RIDER1991 provides a warranty for all our watches within 12 months. We will provide you all necessary repair or replacement for free in the warranty case. In the non-warranty case we will also provide you all necessary support to solve the problem at fair prices. You can find a detailed description of warranty cases and procedures on RIDER1991 website in the support section after all crowdfunding campaigns.

SHIPPING&DELIVERY. 
The RIDER1991 team is committed to do everything in our power and deliver the watches in time at the best possible price. To improve logistics we cooperate with reliable logistics companies and we have our representative office in Italy.

Please, for any questions do not hesitate to contact us – welcome@rider1991.com

story:
The Element Cube is the ultimate conversation starter. Containing over 60 elements, in one compact cube, it’s the perfect centrepiece for your office desk or coffee table.

Whether you’re a science geek, a metal freak, or just a collector of really awesome things, this record-breaking cube is perfect for you. From Aluminium to Zirconium, the cube has it ALL. 

Many of the world's finest minds devoted their lives to unearthing new elements. The cube brings all of their greatest findings together, to act as a constant source of inspiration for all who choose to own one.

Over half of the very building blocks that make up our planet, in the palm of your hand.


Why buy an Element Cube?

  • You'd like to collect Element samples but it costs thousands.
  • You'd prefer to have a minimalist cube you can proudly display, than a messy set.
  • You want 62 Elements now, rather than waiting decades to build a collection.
  • To be one of the first people on earth to own this world record.
  • It's the ultimate conversation starter.
  • It's a testament to scientific discovery.
  • You need some killer desk candy.
  • You're a creative person seeking a source of inspiration.


The origin of the idea came from wondering, "What's the coolest thing I could put on my desk?". The result was a cube that contained over half of the world's elements.


  • Matches Apple products beautifully
  • The perfect size for your office or home (1.5" x 1.5")
  •  Simple in design, yet complex in nature 
  • The centrepiece for any collection
  •  The focal point for any space
  •  Fully scratch resistant
  •  Will last a lifetime

The cube is available in two finishes: semi-polished and polished.


Element Jewellery

We've used the same 62 metal alloy to create unique pieces of unisex jewellery, with a powerful backstory. Take half the world's elements with you, wherever you go.

BOTH Bracelets and Necklaces are available in snake chain, or braided nylon cord.

BRACELETS:


The bracelets are a wearable testament to this scientific marvel. A stylish and minimalist alternative to the cube itself. Take half of the world's elements with you, always. A story to tell wherever you go.


Polished to perfection. Incredibly lightweight. As minimalist as can be.


NECKLACES:


The perfect wearable version of the cube. Inspired by the periodic table, this necklace serves as a beautiful reminder of all that our planet is made of.


 Can't decide? Try the Element Gift Set for size - a little bit of everything for the uber geek!


Can't decide? Try the GIFT SET! A little bit of everything for the über geek!


A World Record!

The Element Cube really is the first of its kind. Containing over 60 metals in one cube, this is truly the largest alloy in the world. 

We would love to see this go down in the books as the most fascinating cube on Earth, and as we speak, the good people over at Guiness are learning about the cube themselves!


 Who is the cube for?

  • Those who love science, innovation, metallurgy, or quirky things.
  • The collectors, and purveyors of all things cool.
  • Those creative people who seek a source of inspiration, and a tangible reminder of what's possible.
  • Scientists, professors, innovators, and geeks.


If you think it would be cool to hold half of the world, in the palm of your hand, the cube's probably for you!



How were the cubes made?

After approaching a lot of different metallurgy companies, in Europe and in Asia I finally found the perfect supplier. With decades of experience in the field of producing intricate metal parts, and access to every metal required to make the cube, we began the year long journey of producing, and modifying prototypes.


The process used to create the cubes is 'powder metallurgy'. This is the act of taking all 62 metals in powder form, and pressing them together. This process allowed us to make several different products, of varying shapes and sizes.

Who's behind the cube?

My name is Cillian McMinn, and I'm a young entrepreneur from Belfast, UK. I have a passion for science and technology, and with the power of crowdfunding, hope to bring some of my own ideas to fruition.

From Aluminium to Zirconium, the cube has it ALL. Many of the world's finest minds devoted their lives to unearthing new elements. The cube brings all of their greatest findings together, to act as a constant source of inspiration for all who choose to own one.Over half of the very building blocks that make up our planet, in the palm of your hand.Why buy an Element Cube?
You'd like to collect Element samples but it costs thousands.
You'd prefer to have a minimalist cube you can proudly display, than a messy set.
You want 62 Elements now, rather than waiting decades to build a collection.
To be one of the first people on earth to own this world record.
It's the ultimate conversation starter.
It's a testament to scientific discovery.
You need some killer desk candy.
You're a creative person seeking a source of inspiration.



The origin of the idea came from wondering, "What's the coolest thing I could put on my desk?". The result was a cube that contained over half of the world's elements.
Matches Apple products beautifully
The perfect size for your office or home (1.5" x 1.5")
 Simple in design, yet complex in nature 
The centrepiece for any collection
 The focal point for any space
 Fully scratch resistant
 Will last a lifetime
The cube is available in two finishes: semi-polished and polished.Element JewelleryWe've used the same 62 metal alloy to create unique pieces of unisex jewellery, with a powerful backstory. story:
Summary

This has always been a dream of mine.  To curate a sexy box of useful items for my fans at a low price.   This campaign will help jump-start this dream and help you get my box!  By getting in on the ground floor you will be one of the first to help me realize this dream and also get some cool shit!

What We Need & What You Get

I am using this campaign to raise $50,000  to get the monthly subscription box rolling!  Your contributions will help me source items for each of the boxes and you will get my box in return.  

By joining this campaign and choosing one of the perks you will get my box first!  There are a variety of perks you can choose from and most of them get you a subscription to my monthly box!

WHAT's IN THE BOX????

I'll tell you what's in the box!

Each month you will get 4-6 items valued at over $100.  Fun, cool, sexy useable stuff!  It's like Christmas morning every month with my box delivered right to your door!

Some of the items you can expect include: Socks, Tie, Patches, Pins, Hats, Beanies, Mugs, Candles, Incense, Sex Toys, Handcuffs, Lube, Condoms, Membership Cards, Satin Robe, Whips and Flogs, Bath Gels, Jewelry, Crystals, Pillow Cases, and some special surprises!

Each box will have a note from me describing what's in it.  There will also be a youtube video each month, of me, showing you WHAT's IN THE BOX!

  

 

What's in it for you, What's in it for me

You will get my box at a discounted price if you contribute now!  Check out the perks...in addition to other special items, Autographed pictures, invites to special events, VIP meet and greets, as well discounts on purchases of my stuff!

Challenges

Our challenge is to provide you with a consistently good product.  To make sure we are sourcing the best and coolest items and to give you these products at a great price.

I have spent the last year working with toy companies, fashion producers, and novelty shops to make sure I can source the products you will like.  So what are you waiting for?  It's time to get my box!

Other Ways You Can Help

Maybe you can't contribute just yet...but you can still help.  Share this campaign on your social media and help us get the word out about my box!

Dani Daniels

 Adult film actress Dani Daniels is one of the top stars in the industry.  She has won numerous awards and is internationally renowned with millions of fans worldwide.  You can find her on Instagram @akadanidaniels

THE BLOOPERS!  

Check out the blooper reel on my video!  THEN GET THE BOX!

story:
If you are the kind of woman that loves to travel, and you like to wear dresses on your adventures, you'll know that those dresses were never made for sprinting to catch your next flight, hopping on a scooter, trying to outrun instant torrential downpours or any of the other things that may happen while on the road. Between fabrics that wrinkle and smell awful after only one wear, to styles that have a complete lack of pockets, we were fed up.

Our expert team has created the Kosan Go Travel Dress with the world traveller in mind. Designed to enhance your journey, it is loaded with traveller-friendly features that will keep you safe, organized, and looking your best.

 

                              

When travelling, versatility is key. You want to pack as little as possible while getting maximum wearability. The Kosan Go Travel Dress has an adjustable length; meaning regardless of the occasion, we’ve got you covered.

 

Comfort is king (or in this case queen), right? Our luxurious fabric has four-way stretch and just enough structure to ensure maximum comfort whether you’re sitting on a plane from Los Angeles to Australia, or biking through the backroads of Bulgaria.

The Go Travel Dress has four hidden pockets for everything from your phone and passport, to your cash, cards & lip balm. There are two large side pockets that are hidden by the use of invisible zippers, and two slots in the bust area.

 

Our fabric is naturally wrinkle resistant. Simply smooth out wrinkles with your hands, throw in the dryer, or hang up for a quick and easy fix.

 

Our fabric is treated with an anti-bacterial finish with odour-blocking properties. The Kosan Go Travel dress can be worn for multiple days without needing to be washed.

 

Our durable, quick-dry fabric is machine washable – meaning you will never have to worry about shrinkage or finding a dry cleaner.

 

Sweat-soaked clothing and outfit changes are one thing you won’t have to worry about with the Go Travel Dress. Our innovative technology wicks away moisture from the skin for significantly faster drying time and all-day comfort to take you from day to night.

 

Spending some time in the sun on your next adventure? Not to worry; the Kosan Go Travel Dress is rated up to 40+ UPF to ensure you’re always protected. The dress is also lined for added comfort and coverage.

                                   

Need help finding the perfect fit? Not to worry! Check out our handy sizing chart below or e-mail styleme@kosantravel.com for some personal assistance.

You will have the opportunity to select both your preferred size and colour after the campaign ends when we send out surveys.

After successfully launching our first product, the Kosan Travel Pack System and Kosan Packing Cubes right here on Kickstarter, we couldn't wait to share our next product with you.

We believe that travel can effect positive change by inspiring new perspectives about the world you live in. The more you travel, the better off the world will be. We also know that the better prepared you are, the more you will be able to enjoy the experience. So, we’ve set out to build the best products for those who travel the world, and our mission is to help our travellers prepare for their journey. 

From the bottom of our hearts, thank you. We wouldn't be here doing what we love if it weren't for all of you! If you have any feedback or questions, please let us know. We love to connect with other travellers.

 

 

We care just as much about how something is made and who made it, as we do about the end product itself. From the moment we decided to make a dress, our community of travellers helped us choose the style and colours. In true digital nomad style, our amazing team members were mostly remote during the process of designing the dress but we came together for fittings. We selected an expert dress factory in China and communicated with them every single day!

One of the coolest parts of this campaign was working with Jordan Hammond, Sophia Pope, Lauren Meeker, Iassen Gortchova and Biliana Gortchova on shooting the video and some of the photos you see here. They did an amazing job and we can’t wait to work with them again (thank you guys!).

We want to keep it real here and let you know that we will continually visit our factory partners face to face to check on the extraordinary work they produce.

 After successfully launching our first product, the Kosan Travel Pack System and Kosan Packing Cubes right here on Kickstarter, we couldn't wait to share our next product with you.We believe that travel can effect positive change by inspiring new perspectives about the world you live in. The more you travel, the better off the world will be. We also know that the better prepared you are, the more you will be able to enjoy the experience. So, we’ve set out to build the best products for those who travel the world, and our mission is to help our travellers prepare for their journey. From the bottom of our hearts, thank you. We wouldn't be here doing what we love if it weren't for all of you! If you have any feedback or questions, please let us know. From the moment we decided to make a dress, our community of travellers helped us choose the style and colours. We selected an expert dress factory in China and communicated with them every single day!One of the coolest parts of this campaign was working with Jordan Hammond, Sophia Pope, Lauren Meeker, Iassen Gortchova and Biliana Gortchova on shooting the video and some of the photos you see here. They did an amazing job and we can’t wait to work with them again (thank you guys!).We want to keep it real here and let you know that we will continually visit our factory partners face to face to check on the extraordinary work they produce. 
 
                                   
  
  
 
 Risks and challenges
Here at Kosan Travel Co., we stand behind all of our products. If we can't fix or repair a manufacturer's defect, we will replace the product.
RETURN POLICY
We offer a 30-day, no-risk return policy. If you are not 100% satisfied with the quality of the product within 30 days of receiving your order, simply send it back and we will refund you, no questions asked. But don't worry, we know you are going to love it!
CUSTOMS & DUTIES INFORMATION
Our prices DO NOT include VAT, GST or other country taxes. Depending on where you are based, you may incur additional fees such as taxes and duties. As we are shipping these products worldwide, it is impossible for us to build in these variable costs for each location on Kickstarter.
All of our orders will be shipped out of our DC in the US.
For all of our Canadian friends and family, the new free trade agreement is expected to go into effect ahead of shipping which will mean no duty or GST for the first $150 imported (or in this case, one dress!). Should the government twiddle their thumbs all spring, this might not be in place ahead of shipment and you'd be responsible for duties and taxes in the event of import. We'll be looking at options closer to the date to see what we might be able to do to mitigate this.
We suggest using this tool to assist you in calculating potential duties: https://www.simplyduty.com/import-calculator/
For international customers who are required to pay customs, you will receive an email from your local customs authorities asking for payment to have your order processed through customs. Unfortunately, there is no legal way around customs. Once you make that payment to the customs broker your order will be processed for final delivery.
Please note that Kosan Travel Co. cannot legally mark orders as gifts.
SHIPPING POLICY
If our shipping carriers attempt to deliver your package to you and you do not receive it because you are not there, the address was incorrect, or you moved without letting us know, it will be the buyer's responsibility to pay the shipping fee to reship the order once it arrives back at our warehouse. You will receive a tracking number for your package once it ships out, so please keep an eye out!
POTENTIAL SHIPPING DELAYS:
The current timeline is to ship all rewards in June 2019. There are always potential delays that may occur due to things like customs, weather, vessel bookings and holidays (i.e. Chinese New Year). That being said, we have incuded some breathing room in our production schedule to mitigate any potential issues.
Whatever the obstacle, we'll get through it together. We value our backer community and all the support you've shown us. We take communication and transparency very seriously, and we promise to keep you up-to-date throughout the entire process.

story:
Short Summary

My name is Rick Graham and after a lifetime of collecting cool, fun, trendy and mostly large watches, I decided why not produce my own..Make them cool and affordable enough for everybody to collect them all. Our slogan after all is Flavor, It's Not Just A Watch It's A Lifestyle.. With the success of this campaign I hope to be able to create more advertising and marketing steps to help connect with my target customers. Currently, after all the production costs of creating these awesome timepieces, there isnt much left over for advertising and promotions..

What We Need & What You Get

  • We are trying to raise approx. $1200 to go towards photo shoots, retail store diplays, banners, and marketing ideas.
  • By contributing to this campaign you are helping us achieve our goal, and at the same time getting an awesome product at about half the price..
  • 100% of the money received in this campaign will go directly back into the company.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean you can’t help, we have a donation button also. Even if you arent interested in this deal at this time, we hope you would pass it on to anybody you know that would love to get in on this amazing deal..Thanks

 *****After your purchase we will email you about your color choices********

story:
Linden is a women's contemporary clothing line designed and manufactured in Los Angeles. The designs are always inspired by art, music, film, or literature, and strive to maintain both wearability as well as affordability. Every season produced is limited in quantity.

As an independent fashion designer, sometimes designs are limited by cost. Affording all of the supplies as well as the presentation (trade shows, runways, etc) becomes a source of stress and as a result designs are often simplified or the best means of presentation is often not affordable. 

So you know what you are helping to create, the inspiration for this collection is a book called The Wind-Up Bird Chronicle written by Haruki Marukami. I began reading this book and was immediately struck with the unique language and vivid imagery. The book was translated from Japanese and sometimes the translation is such a beautiful combination of words that a native english speaker may never think to put together. Before I even knew what I was going to do with it, I started writing down sentences out of context. Ultimately, these series of phrases began to inspire the collection for Fall 2013. 

This season I hope to get a head start on the Fall 2013 collection, being able to create a broader range of pieces as well as finishing them as they were originally designed. I always mean to get a head start on my samples, but find myself putting it off until I can afford the various elements that go into the collection. With the right funding I can get started right away, perfecting style and fit long before the actual presentation happens.

What We Need & What You Get

Showing in a trade show or runway show can cost at least $1500 and go way into the tens of thousands. Where a line shows has a huge impact on how the brand is percieved as well as who will be present to buy from it. At least half of this fundraising campaign will go toward presentation of the Fall 2013 collection simply to get the business in front of the right people. 

******UPDATE*******

Linden has been accepted to show at Style Fashion Week Los Angleles http://stylefashionweek.com

Held for an entire week at the beautiful Vibiana in downtown Los Angeles, Style Fashion Week always draws a strong audience filled with buyers, press and fashionably conscious celebrities.  

This means that MORE than half of the funds will go to production of this show. 

*********************

The other half of the funds will go toward all of the supplies and materials that will be needed to complete the collection, as well as any work I will have to source out to specialists. 

**YOU** as the generous supporters of the brand, will be rewarded! Some of you will receive original illustrations of this collection (I'm a pretty good artist, I swear, i'm totally trained!), some of you will receive clothing of your choice, and some of you will be publicly thanked either on our website or in our printed materials during that show! 

Every little bit helps, so even if I do not raise the full amount, the funds will still go to support Fall 2013. 

 

The Impact

With your contibution, I can continue to make this brand grow. The goal is to present the best possible collection for Fall 2013, and begin to expand even more. I would love to hire assistants, and bring people into the business. Also, the more orders I receive, the more work I give to local manufacturers, helping to boost our economy. 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't donate yourself, you might know other people who can. Please spread the word through your social media, asking friends and family to make any small contribution they can.

story:
Hey! UTILITY FASHION is coming!

Have you ever faced the problem of finding a USB flash memory card when you really need it?  A spare SD card for your camera, when the other one inside is full?  An iPhone SIM card remover pin, when you need to change a SIM card for your iPhone? Or forgot to take the SIM card itself when traveling?  This will not happen again if you have the UTILITY WALLET!  Oh! And an 8Gb USB Flash Memory Card comes included as a zip tail of the wallet!!!


Italian Design 

High Quality Natural Leather
8Gb USB card included! (built-in)

SIM card pocket / micro SD pocket

iPhone SIM card remover pocket

SD card pocket

Safety Zip

2 bank note departments

6 pockets for bank cards

1 pocket for a photo

can contain pre-recorded GREETINGS on the USB card!

  • Simplicity Design is an Italian Full Cycle Design Company located in the middle of Italy in the city of Assisi, the birthplace of San Francisco.  UTILITY FASHION is the new project that we started, to create really useful fashionable items. Italy is famous for fashion, now it‘s time for fashion to get closer to the contemporary needs. Nice things with nice features, more than just fashion. They are designed around your daily needs and they’re also cute! 
  • This campaign will give life to the first product in this project. The UTILITY WALLET! It combines great Italian fashion with product features that modern people really need, without paying extra for anything else. Once the UTILITY WALLET! becomes successful, other products will follow to help you enjoy life with other useful items.

Hey! UTILITY FASHION is coming!
Have you ever faced the problem of finding a USB flash memory card when you really need it?  A spare SD card for your camera, when the other one inside is full?  An iPhone SIM card remover pin, when you need to change a SIM card for your iPhone? Or forgot to take the SIM card itself when traveling?  This will not happen again if you have the UTILITY WALLET!  Oh! And an 8Gb USB Flash Memory Card comes included as a zip tail of the wallet!!!


Italian Design 
High Quality Natural Leather
8Gb USB card included! (built-in)
SIM card pocket / micro SD pocket
iPhone SIM card remover pocket
SD card pocket
Safety Zip
2 bank note departments
6 pockets for bank cards
1 pocket for a photo
can contain pre-recorded GREETINGS on the USB card!



Simplicity Design is an Italian Full Cycle Design Company located in the middle of Italy in the city of Assisi, the birthplace of San Francisco.  UTILITY FASHION is the new project that we started, to create really useful fashionable items. Italy is famous for fashion, now it‘s time for fashion to get closer to the contemporary needs. Nice things with nice features, more than just fashion. They are designed around your daily needs and they’re also cute! 
This campaign will give life to the first product in this project. The UTILITY WALLET! It combines great Italian fashion with product features that modern people really need, without paying extra for anything else. Once the UTILITY WALLET! becomes successful, other products will follow to help you enjoy life with other useful items.

story:
1.  Who Are We?

5 Souls is an apparel and art company born from the Martial Arts and based in Los Angeles, CA.  It is owned and operated by us, German Baltazar and Eric Kohm.  Like many of YOU, we're Martial Artists and fans of MMA who can't find apparel we aren't embarrassed to wear.  With our years of experience training in a variety of disciplines, competing, and watching the sport of MMA evolve, we wanted to create a brand that reflects our passion for all of the Martial Arts and honors their origins.  

We are committed to YOU having MMA apparel and Art that you will be proud to show off.  We pride ourselves on creating unique designs that show YOU are a real Martial Artist, not just some beer-drinking MMA fan who has never trained and acts tough in his shiny shirt full of those same old MMA gimmicks like skulls, vikings, spartans...you get the idea. 

We want YOU to become part of our community of like-minded individuals, not just by wearing our designs or displaying our art, but by becoming active participants on our blog where you can show off your soul.

Check out our website to learn more about us:  www.5souls.com.

2.  Our Intention.

Our sights are set and we're ready to reclaim the Martial Arts Apparel industry for Martial Artists of all disciplines.  

Some of you may or may not know this about us, but we do EVERYTHING ourselves - the logo design, the shirt designs, the print designs, the website design, marketing material, blog posting, packaging, and shipping.  We're tired of keeping this to ourselves and want YOU to be part of this journey.  

That's why we've worked day and night to create our new collection called The Greatest.  With The Greatest, we've created a series of t-shirts, each of which pays homage to one of the greatest Martial Artists of all time, as well as a couple of prints.  We are confident that you will be proud to wear and display our designs, which in turn will allow more people to see that MMA is much more than drunk guys booing over barroom brawls.  Basically, we are developing a brand that will stand out from the rest because YOU stand behind it.

3.  Your Contribution.

How will your money be spent?  Well, by participating in our indiegogo campaign, you'll get the chance to preorder all of our items from The Greatest collection before they're even available at our own online store.  And with your preorders, we will be able to cover the costs of producing our new screens for the shirts, purchasing shirts for screening, printing our prints, and packaging and shipping it all to you.  With anything leftover, we'll be able to continue our goal of giving back to the Martial Arts through our endeavors with The Boys & Girls Club, and our plan to host a free women's self-defense class at least once per month.  

4.  Here's How You Can Help.

We're not going to sugarcoat it.  GIVE US YOUR MONEY.  Give us $5, and we'll send you a sticker pack.  Or give us $10 and we'll add a custom post on 5souls.com to thank you and advertise your business/website to our thousands of website visitors.  Make it $20 and we'll let you choose one of our two prints to go with your stickers and custom website post.  If you'd rather a t-shirt of your choice from The Greatest instead of a print, just give us $25.  What's that?  You can't choose just one shirt?  Then make it $50 and we'll throw in two.  Wait, the designs are so good that you can't even settle on just two shirts?  Then give us $125, and you'll get all six shirts in the collection plus a seventh we've created specially for this indiegogo campaign.  Where are you getting seven shirts for only $125?  Here, that's where!  What did you say?  You want the shirts and both prints?  Okay, okay, make it $150, just $25 more and you will get The Greatest colletion in its entirety...prints and shirts.  You think we missed a Martial Artist?  Okay, give us $350 and not only will you get The Greatest collection in its entirety, but we'll also design a custom shirt or print inspired by the Artist of your choice.  

Equally, or perhaps more importantly, tell all your friends to give us their money.  Do so in a lawful manner, of course.  Seriously, spread the word even if you can't spare a dime to fund our campaign!  Like us on Facebook (www.facebook.com/5souls), follow us on Twitter (https://twitter.com/5_souls) and tweet out our indiegogo campaing, follow us on Tumblr (http://5-souls.tumblr.com) and reblog the campaign, and go to YouTube to "thumbs-up" our video and leave a nice comment.  We said nice!

Show us your soul.

Show us your soul.

story:
Who am I?

That's me: 49 years old, college degree in linguistics, teaching languages to make a living, but passionate colour addict. What does this mean? Colours are beautiful to look at, colours are intense and bright, colours light up our lives, colours reinforce our emotions, colours divulge our feelings. My passion is to combine colours and forms in the best possible way to capture your attention and make you smile! I aim to create fashionable jewellery with a unique design, affordable to everyone, because I truly believe that exclusivity should have nothing to do with money.

Each of my jewellery pieces is handmade by myself. I spent countless hours trying to find the best materials, which would allow me to sell the pieces for an affordable price. I sell the items, but I give the exclusivity for free! Each item is absolutely unique! Make sure to check my gallery. There are similar items, but never two of a kind.


What do I need the money for?

For a few months now I am the proud owner of Perlenstum, the online shop, where I sell my unique pieces. I have been following the stats and realized that I need more advertisement in order to make my shop more popular. The world wide web is full of free solutions, but none of them worked for me. Virtual advertisements only are not enough for this kind of shop. I need more advertisements with posters and radio spots which will cost me around 3,000 €. This is where your help is needed since I can't afford to pay it.

I'll use 3,000 € for advertisements and the remaining 333 € for various fees.


Future plan: HELP ME TO HELP LESS FORTUNATE WOMEN!

A while ago I heard from a good friend about women in prison, who are begging for something meaningful to do, that will help them to pass the time. Many of those women have artistic skills and are interested in further developing them. I want to give some of those ladies the opportunity to create fashion jewellery, which I'll offer in a special section of my online shop.

First of all I need to expand my business, so I am able to provide these women with an opportunity of a lifetime. I'll need to cover my own expenses like travelling to and from the prison to host workshops where I will teach the ladies all they need to know about creating fashion jewellery. I also plan on providing the materials needed to create such jewellery to these ladies and buying back their creations so as to enable them to have an income stream of their own and maybe have a brighter future. The estimated amount needed for this project is around 5,000 €.

If your donations help me to reach and surpass my initial fundraising target and cover the expenses for the advertisement, I will keep you updated as to how my future plan is progressing.


Other ways to help

Please share my campaign with your friends! As I don't have many friends on facebook and other social media your help is crucial for me. 


Questions?

I would gladly answer any questions regarding my work, my shop or my future project. 


THANK YOU SO VERY MUCH!




Here are some samples of my work:

story:
Caged Collective is a new brand emerging into the streetstyle fashion market. We are looking to remove the profanity from this market and release a collection of casual and comfortable garments that are appropriate for all ages and situations. Our designs are based purely on the harmony between graphics and design. 


We are proud to be a Canadian company and equally grateful for the incredible workforce that the US has offered to our company. We pride ourselves on being made completely in America with ethical pay to all people involved in our production and design. 

Today we are launching our collection of hats. It's only the beginning of what we foresee for Caged Collective...



 


Our goal is $10,000.

What you're contributing to when you donate to Caged Collective.

  •  Your money will go towards our startup costs. Like any business, the most money is required before any money is generated; we are looking for your help with those costs.  We have an idea and we have a unique product. We need your help to create it!
  •  Breaking down where your donation will go: fabric (we have very high, 1000yrd+ minimums); deposits for our embroidery studios and our manufacturing factory (no production will start without a deposit); building our team (because we would like to sleep more than 3 hours a night); making new samples ( 50% of the next collection has already been designed!!) and lastly, a generous donation (paying back) our first investors: Our parents & VISA. A HUGE thank you to VISA for being our first very oblivious and impeccably unaware sponsor!
  •  Transparency is key. Sustainability is key. We have chosen high quality factories in the US who pay fair wages to their workers and whose standards are as high as ours. We've made that clear to everyone we have chosen to work with. Jen took a leap of faith and moved to NYC nine months ago. She has spent that time meeting the right people to help Caged Collective come to life. We've built relationships with all of the people helping us to launch and we can honestly say - after plenty of trial and error - we are working with some of the most incredible, honest, and fair talent in NYC. 
  • Now take a look at what you will receive in return for your generous donation. In exchange for your support, you will receive an enormous amount of gratitude (YES, it is worth a lot, just ask our parents... it's what we've been paying them for years!!) 

Your donations are kickstarting the Caged Collective. Our goal is to be an inclusive, collective brand that allows you to be a part of the design process. Our hats are only the beginning...

Jen and Anna both grew up in the beautiful town of Goderich, Ontario. Jen has always had a flare for design and has been designing for as long as anyone she knows can remember. She has directed/designed fashion shows in Toronto and NYC. She has been featured in Holt Renfrew and won design competitions all over the world. Anna left Goderich and immediately jumped into a role in the tech industry. She has worked for the e-commerce company Shopify for 3+ years in business development and talent acquisition. The fast-paced, dynamic duo team up to bring you Caged Collective. They are building a community of creative, interested and unique individuals and providing them with the platform to share, speak and design in a collaborative environment. 

Due to the initial costs and high minimum order quantities in manufacturing our hats, we need your support to allow us to begin our first production run. Here's how you can contribute:

1) Select a perk on the right hand side to start your pre-order. The more you order, the better the discount you'll receive!

2) Continue onto the next page to enter shipping information followed by payment details. Note; if you would like to contribute extra over and above the cost of the perk you have selected, you can change the figure above or contact us through email to make a private investment.

3) Complete payment via Paypal or using your credit/debit card.

4) We aim to deliver your hats to your door before the end of August, 2014 and appreciate your patience during their production!
