story:
The future of wearables




                  flat as a watch!


Never more than a touch away!

Experts believe, that the smartwatch will become the leading wearable computer in the market over the next years. But why to buy an expensive smartwatch with a too small touchscreen when you can transform your iphone into a fashionable smartwatch? The new Bellewrist smartwatch offers you the concept, that you can use the Bellewrist smartwatch as an independent smartphone as well as answer calls from your smartphone. It’s quite easy to answer a call this way or sending a text or email messages. All these things are quite simple to do with your iphone as a smartwatch.

________________________________________________________________________

          your smartphone watch case


This fashionable and wearable device enables wearers to use their smartphone on the go. Specially designed to withstand the demands of a life in motion, our product offers solutions no other manufacturer meets. Developed to comfortably fit on your wrist while securing your phone, you won't have to put it down again. This stylish wear turns your smartphone into a smartwatch, so you the need to buy a whole new device.

________________________________________________________________________


The advantages of our project:

1. You can change the bracelet

2. There is no small touchscreen

3. You can surf in the web

4. You can write text

5. You don't need another device to connect

6. You can change style and size

7. Less  expensive than others

8. You can use your iphone in or out of the watch case

9. You can use the bracelet as smartphone stand



 

 The perks: bracelets for your iphone

Our slap bracelets are a subtle expression of your personality. They illustrate what your fashion taste is as well as what message you want to express! Our bracelets can be manufactured from leather, silicone, plastic, gold, sterling silver and other materials.


You can wear the bracelet without iphone


The perks:



We will send you an e-mail in which you can specify the desired bracelet.



________________________________________________________________________



Wear your smartphone as a smartwatch



For years, technology manufacturers have attempted to create an attachment for the iPhone that can fit on a person's wrist. All those years of technology have culminated into our new product: the BelleWrist. With this new watch band, you can attach your iPhone, and then surf the web, jot down notes, call, text and do everything else you normally do with your iPhone - all from your wrist!



Innovative design




Not only is it an amazing deal, but it also looks about 555% more fashionable and elegant than any other accessory on the market today! Designed for men and for women, this new watch band was purposed to take looks and technology to a whole new level. We also want to provide different styles and sizes; pick the perfect one for you today! Attaching the phone to the strap is a breeze, as seen in the tutorial images above. We use patented suction tape to ensure that phone will both rest at a comfortable angle while being securely strapped in.



Purchase the result of over two years of testing

This is the first concept of a wearable iPhone watch case with a special trendy bracelet.
Everywhere you go, you can always take your iPhone with you. No pockets needed, no added devices.  Our wrist-concept for your iPhone helps you express your own style and who you really are. There are many solutions for wearable devices on the web, but only ours can withstand the demands that occur. The patent of BelleWrist has been applied and our new product line will be available from early 2014. Help us introduce this product to the marketplace and order your individual case with a fashionable bracelet for your beloved smartphone.


We will send you an email in which you can specify the desired watch case and bracelet


About Us

For years, well-known manufacturers have been trying to create a device that enables the user to carry his phone on their wrist. Smartphones are getting larger and this is causing the problem. They no longer fit into the small compartments in handbags or purses. The iPhone is worthless when it needs to be continuously held in your hand where it can easily be stolen. The development of a wrist case with a fashionable bracelet for a smartphone was a difficult thing to do because of the weight of the iPhone and the effect it would have on one’s arm as it moved throughout the day.  Stabilizing the smartphones on the wrist was almost impossible. 


After two years of testing, the team at Bellewrist managed to develop a solid bracelet with a watch case that allows the user to wear a smartphone permanently and without discomfort.  And it has the advantage that your iPhone can still be adapted to the user's fashionable outfit. The second problem was using smartphones on a wrist. Our approach was that you can simply place the phone easilyin the watch case and easily remove it. The smartphone is held securly in place inside the case due to a patented Suction Tape system. This is the first concept of a wearable iPhone watch case with a special trendy bracelet.
Everywhere you go, you can always take your iPhone with you. No pockets needed, no added devices.  Our wrist-concept for your iPhone helps you express your own style and who you really are.


______________________________________________________________________

This fashionable and wearable device enables wearers to use their smartphone on the go. Specially designed to withstand the demands of a life in motion, our product offers solutions no other manufacturer meets. Developed to comfortably fit on your wrist while securing your phone, you won't have to put it down again. This stylish wear turns your smartphone into a smartwatch, so you the need to buy a whole new device.




Hand Painted Unikats


Our team has worked to develop the BelleWrist through years of testing and development to give users all the advantages possible. Our bracelets stand up to continuous use without discomfort while still looking fashionable. Through a patented Suction Tape system, your device is held in place and frees your hands up when you need them most. There have been other solutions for wearable devices in the past, but they could not address the problems that came as smartphones grew larger.
Demands have changed, but the BelleWrist rises up to meet them.
Our team wants to bring the BelleWrist to you. Through Indiegogo we are looking to offer the first run of our product. Funds raised will cover the production cost and secure backers a BelleWrist for their own. No other product works like ours and we are confident that once you start using it you wouldn't remember how you got around without it. We thank you for all of your support and encourage you to share our project with your friends and connections online. Our product needs you as much as you need it, secure yours today!


Wear your new smartphone on your sleeve and stay connected throughout your day.
Get a BelleWrist and transform how you use your phone.We need your support to help get us started - and to give you great deals in the process! Prototyping is complete; packaging design is complete; our manufacturer is waiting to start tooling and start production. Our project doesn't qualify for Venture Capital - which doesn't bother us: We think VC is too restrictive for our creativity and is not the best solution to meet our customers' needs.Giving the Indiegogo community the opportunity to take advantage of great pricing on the new BelleWrist product is also an opportunity for us to thank everyone for their support in helping us get started!





Frequently Asked Questions


Are your bracelets comfortable?

Yes, they are absolutely comfortable. The bracelts are all light, sweat and moisture resistant.

What does crowd-funding mean?

Crowd-funding projects are supported and become viable only with the contributions of it's funders. Funders view various start-ups and innovations and decide which ones they want to support and see become a real project.


I have no iphone!

We can sell watch cases for every smartphone now.


Do I need different sizes for the BelleWrist bracelet?

No, there ist only available the size 6cm x 36cm. It is a slap bracelet and suitable for every wrist.


What should I add for shipping?

Simple. We are asking please: $9 for worldwide shipping.


When will you ship?

The faster we raise contributions the sooner we can commence the timeline from here to shipping. Right now we plan to ship in January 2014.


What's the money for?

There are some significant costs that can't be avoided. Here are the primary ones:

- Final Prototyping for the watch case

- Patent and Trademark Protection

- Production Tooling

- Initial minimum production run

- Advertisement


How do I figure out my total?

Just add together the perk level you want +$9 fot the worlwide shipping cost.

Example: $59 (chosen perk level) + $ 9 shipping cost = $68 contribution please.


What are the risks and challenges?

We ve finished all important prototypes, patent pending and started the advertisement. The success will only be a question of time. The greatest risk for any new venture is the shortage of funds. A highly successfull campaign will allow us to commence the final product sooner and to gain traction ahead of the competition. If you like what we are doing, the best way to help us minimize the risks is to support BelleWrist now by clicking on one of our perks.

Please send any and all questions and comments to: info@bellewrist.com

story:
Sometimes you need to wear a headset or helmet. 

If you also wear sunglasses, you know the pain from the temples digging in under the pressure of your headgear. No one needs those dents in the sides of their head. 

We have the answer: Flying Eyes Sunglasses. 

Revolutionary sunglasses with multiple, interchangeable sides that are comfortable with...well, whatever else you're wearing on your head!

They are already designed, prototyped, tested, and ready to be manufactured. Our goal is have them in your hands and on your smiling face by September 2014. We just need your help!

Flying Eyes were created by Dean Siracusa, a guy who loves to fly. And when you fly an airplane, you wear a noise-reducing headset. So, like most pilots, he'd always end up fidgeting with his sunglasses, trying to get them comfortable. Plus, there was the constant turning up the volume on the headset because of the noise leaks caused by the temples making that little gap in the seal.

Dean thought there ought to be sunglasses with a soft, flat headstrap instead of regular sides, so you wouldn't even feel it under a headset. 

After searching for such a thing and not finding it, Dean spent more than a year experimenting with designs and working with eyewear experts. The end result was a pair of sunglasses that he was confident would be the absolute best sunglasses to wear with an aviation headset.

So he took his own savings and borrowed some from friends and family and had a batch of the original Flying Eyes sunglasses produced. (It costs a LOT of money to make really good quality sunglasses, especially if you're just a little company and not one of the giant manufacturers.) 

Turns out, Flying Eyes are fantastic for aviation. And also for motorcycles, equestrian, snowboarding, disc golf, aviation ground crews, racing pit crews, and demolition derby. Anything you love to do that needs both eye protection and a helmet or headset. Or where you just don't want your sunglasses flying off at an inopportune moment. 

Well, we started selling the original Flying Eyes sunglasses last year, and now it's time to make more sunglasses. Re-ordering more of the exact same sunglasses would be a lot cheaper, but we have really listened to the people who wear our first sunglasses and have found ways to make Flying Eyes better and more useful — which means paying for the expensive molds and tooling to make them.

What makes Flying Eyes unique?

Convertible Sunglasses ~ There's a little button on the sides. It's a super-easy new release mechanism which allows you to quickly change from the headstrap to the regular temples to the micro-thin temples, so you can go from one activity to another without slowing down.

Headstrap ~ The soft, thin, non-elastic headstrap works with the overall frame design to hold the sunglasses gently and perfectly on your face, and your ears won't even know it's there—no matter how tight your headset. Plus, because it's so thin, your Active Noise Reduction headsets will work better and last longer — no more noise leaks!

Micro-thin Temples ~ These extra-thin — less than 1 mm — flexible, unbreakable sides are perfect with motorcycle, equestrian, cycling, and other helmets — they slip right under!

Durable Frame ~ Made from lightweight, unbreakable, flexible Resilamide, the new frames will be available in our original matte black, or in a shiny black.

Vision-enhancing Lenses ~ Flying Eyes feature technologically advanced, precision polycarbonate lenses for eagle-eyed clarity.

They offer the UV400 protection, the highest level of protection against UV radiation, along with anti-fog and anti-scratch coatings. The shatterproof lenses also offer vision-enhancing clarity and true color perception. 

Flying Eyes are available in our original aviation-friendly, neutral gray, non-polarized lenses, plus: polarized lenses, bifocals, gradient tint, gradient tint bifocals, and custom prescription lenses! 

Due to the manufacturing costs and high minimum order quantities in making our sunglasses, we need your support to set the conveyor belt in motion. 

Here’s how you can support our campaign and be the first to feel the freedom of Flying Eyes:

1) Select a perk on the right hand side. The perks are pictured below — we will contact you at the end of the campaign for you to make choices like lens option and t-shirt style & size.

2) Continue to the next page to enter shipping information followed by payment details. Note; if you would like to support us extra over and above the cost of the perk you have selected, you can change the amount there.

3) Complete payment via Paypal or using your credit/debit card. We will use these funds to pay for the production run, and for shipping them to you!

4) We will deliver your Flying Eyes Sunglasses and other thank you perks by September 2014.

Reserve your Flying Eyes Sunglasses, and you'll get your choice of lens and frame finish (we'll contact you after the campaign to finalize your specific choice. Prescription lenses available, by separate special order.)

Modern shirts with vintage style — hand-drawn illustrations, silkscreened by hand here in Austin, Texas, onto high quality 100% cotton shirts. An IndieGogo exclusive — you can't get these shirts anywhere else!

We already have prototypes of the new sunglasses and the factory is ready to make them — we just have to pay the nice people. Since we've been through this once before, with the same manufacturer, we are confident we'll have these revolutionary sunglasses to you quickly.

If we don't reach our fundraising goal, it may take us a bit longer to get the sunglasses made and out the door to you, but it will still happen!

If we surpass our funding goal, not only will you get your perks super-fast, but we'll also reveal our stretch goals! (Hint: some totally new additional frame styles. We're working on a larger and wider version of our signature frame, as well as a stylish women's frame that will include a tortoiseshell option. We're also close to finalizing a super lightweight titanium version.)

We've tried to include perks that will express our gratitude, whatever your budget. But if you are in a serious budget squeeze right now, well, we know how that goes and we hope that someday soon, you're rolling in dough. 

Meanwhile, you can still help: 

Please tell your friends & family about our campaign — you never know who might need a pair of sunglasses like Flying Eyes! If you are logged into IndieGoGo and use the "share" tools, we'll see that, and you could end up with a free shirt or pair of Flying Eyes.

Please let us know if you have any questions, comments or suggestions!
Email us at sunglasses@flyingeyes.biz

Press and retail/distributor inquiries welcome at the same email address.

story:
A huge Thank You to all my contributors. It's been great feeling the love from family & friends, as well as the new interest in my work. Your support is very much appreciated. For the continued development of my laser cut cardboard products, keep an eye on my website: Apple Eye Design. 

Hi, I’m Dan Landrum. Over the past year I’ve been developing a line of laser cut cardboard products that I call “The Rounded Flute Collection.” I’ve had a wonderful reception from people like you who are interested in eco-friendly, smart design. Now I need to take my business to the next level and buy my own laser-cutting machine. To help me reach my goal, I’m offering my Indiegogo backers a number of unique products as perks.

The Designs

Relative sizes of some of the perks.

No other common material has the textural qualities of cut corrugated cardboard, and there is no other tool that can cut corrugated cardboard as cleanly and precisely as a laser-cutting machine. Using non-toxic white glue to hold this sustainable material together, these modern and elegant designs are functional works of art. Blending high-tech with hand-made, I design, fabricate and assemble every piece myself.

The Perks

The following photos show each level of backing and the perks. Don't hesitate to contact me with questions.


Becoming a Maker

I began developing "The Rounded Flute Collection" at MakerPlace, a dream workshop for DIYers with every tool a craftsman could want. When I saw someone using the laser to cut out cardboard templates, I was fascinated by the texture and pattern of the crisp edges of the cut rounded flutes. I immediately wanted to explore the possibilities of layering the cardboard to see what effects I could get. I discovered that thinly cut in one direction, the assembled cardboard appeared virtually transparent, and yet in another view it looked like finely tooled wood.

Doing some research, I saw that architect Frank Gehry made lamps and furniture out of cardboard in the early 1970’s, proving the structural strength and durability of cardboard. However, back then he was limited to die cutting. Smart digital design and the laser cutting machine allow me the versatility and flexibility to create new designs in small, adjustable batches.

I started by making pendant lamps. When a couple of my early prototypes failed, I realized that the shapes would make stunning containers. Modernizing classic styles, I then developed a new line of baskets and vases. They were a huge hit! More recently, out of the décor accessory designs has come the exploration of using cardboard as a medium for sculpture. A year into the journey of transforming common cardboard into elegant forms, I feel like I’ve only just begun. The possibilities are endless, and I have more ideas than I can create in one lifetime. To keep up with the muse and develop these ideas, I need full-time access to a laser cutter, which is why I want to buy my own machine. Your support in this effort is greatly appreciated!

..............................................................

MAKE magazine recently published an article called, "My Quest to Turn Smart Craft into a Sustainable Business." They asked me to tell my story about making laser cut cardboard products over the past year.

story:
Dear Visitor !

Thanks for your interest in Utope

please have a look at www.utope.eu

or follow us via Twitter, @utope_eu

to see more of what we do






http://www.utope.eu/news.html


Red Dot Design Award

story:
What is LGFS?

For the 36th year in a row, Chinese Students Club (CSC) will be ringing in the Chinese New Year with the Lunar Gala Fashion Show, Columbia University's annual culture and fashion performance showcasing the very best of Columbia students' creative visions and enterprising spirits. 

On February 21st, come see the entirely student-produced show featuring fashion by top-name designers, such as Celine, Alexander Wang, H&M, and more! 


Why should you donate?

Directing and producing one of campus' largest cultural events requires MANY resources, such as:

  • Equipment rental, including lighting, sound, and staging
  • Marketing and publicity materials
  • Purchase of clothing, accessories, and cosmetics that are unattainable via sponsorships
By donating to LGFS, you are supporting a passionate group of student directors, producers, models, photographers, and artists dedicated to promoting cultural diversity and bringing the forefront of the fashion industry to campus. 


To learn more about LGFS, check out our photo gallery or visit us on our Facebook page. Email any questions to Joanna Zou at jjz2124@columbia.edu.

story:
MEET THE WORLD’S

FIRST DIGITAL GIF PIN.


We wanted to transform the classic round shaped pin into a modern wearable. We have created a digital gif pin that lets you voice any opinion, express love to your favourite artist or support the cause you are engaged in – and to change between these with just a few clicks. 

 

This wearable doesn’t measure your heartbeat, it won't track your position and we most definitely won't count any calories! The pin does one thing – it enhances your personality. It’s an accessory that lets you wear any of your favourite artists, designer or illustrator on your collar, clothes or bag. Based on the mood you are currently in.
 
 

 

GET FREE PINS - BECOME A REFERRER 

 

By referring our campaign to friends and followers you can get exclusive artworks and free pins! You need to be logged in to your IndieGoGo account and use the share tools on this page to get credits for your referrals. Read more about referral contests and how they work here.

In short here is how you do it: 

1. Make sure you are logged in on IndieGoGo.
2. Use the share buttons on the top of our campaign page
3. Every person that follows your link and buys a perk adds to your referral value. 

 

 

CREATE, UPLOAD AND WEAR

 

Wear Ready-made Designs

Our user-friendly iOS and Android app makes it really simple to change the content on the pin. The easiest way is to use a design someone else has created. Click on a design you like and then use the button “Wear on pin” and it will be uploaded to the pin in less than a second.

 

 

Create or Upload your own Designs!

It's really easy to make your own designs with our in-app creator, regardless of your artistic skills. You can write any text, use background patterns and colours based on your current state of mind. If you prefer you can take a picture and upload to your pin or combine it all with a sweet gif you’ve created!

 

 

A SOCIAL AND CREATIVE COMMUNITY

 

The Community

We are starting a creative community for people who want to design, share and express themselves through illustrations, pictures, logos or gifs. Find others that are passionate about the same band, artist or causes as you and collaborate with them to get the word out! 

 
You can follow friends, family or your favourite people or brand! In an instant you and your friend can wear any design you have created or downloaded.
 
 

For Artists, Brands and Designers

The idea of creating a creative community offline as well as online is what is most important to us! We are already building a network with some really awesome designers, illustrators and street artists who have started to contribute with their work to the community! 

 

 

We have teamed up with Come Alive Images, a stock agency for gifs, and other brilliant artists who have contributed to this campaign: Karl Striker, About:Blank, Sketchonista , Mia Wiking, Steve Wolf

 

Key Features

 

Production Video

 
 

SPECIFICATION

 

The Reflexive LCD Screen – for Outdoor and Indoor Use

The round 1.34 inch screen is semi reflective and semi backlit. This makes the screen very versatile as the image gets sharper when sunlight hits it. But, as it is backlit it works really well indoors as well. The technology used is also very energy efficient and has a low energy consumption.

Here is a clip of our Engineering Board where we have run a series of gif on the reflective LCD for you to see how different artworks looks like.

 

 
 
 

Breakdown of the pin

 

 

Dimensions
Diameter: 1.96 in / 5 cm
Weight: 0,56 oz. / 14 grams
Thickness: 0,2 in / 0,5 cm

Screen
Diameter: 1.34 in / 3,40 cm
Dots: 77 782
Colors: 262K

Battery (expected):
Still Picture: 74 hrs
Moving Picture (22hz): 5,5 hrs
Charging: Mirco USB

Compatibility
iOS and Android

 

 

 

 

THE PROJECT

 

Since day one of the prototyping phase, Pins Collective have worked closely with a manufacturer that has a well established reputation of moving projects like ours from the current prototype phase through the industrialization process and in to full scale production. This company have helped us with the sourcing of components and done all the CAD-work needed to design and create the final pin. They have also delivered the board prototype that we needed in order to show how the overall experience would be and how the reflective LCD works. We are very confident that we, with their assistance, have created a solid project plan for our coming stages.

 

 


Up until now we have put a lot of emphasis on finding the right screen, perfected the design and user experience. The design work is completed, we have a functional board prototype, and the appearance models have been manufactured to perfection based on the 3D CAD models. We’ve also put a lot of effort into the app prototype, as we think it is key to the experience.

Our upcoming challenges are now on the technical side. In the current phase we are miniaturizing the prototype and putting the components within its final form factor. As this is something we at Pins Collective haven’t worked on before we rely on our technical partner for this to be made. Our resources have gotten us this far but in order to take the next step towards production, we need your help.

 

Risks and challenges

Pins Collective is a unique product with some new components that leaves us dependent on our suppliers and partners. However, most of the technology we use is well known and common in other products. The fact that we have teamed up with a well-established technology partner that has over 20 years of experience in taking products from a prototype phase like ours into full production.

We also teamed up with Swedish industrial design company People People on this project. They have an in-depth experience working with new concept and ideas - especially within the wearable industry. Any design issues that might arise going into production are in the hands of some the most talented designers out there.

Our main priority is to ensure the overall product quality of our sub component. We’ll reduce this risk by visiting our suppliers and be present during assembly and testing.

story:
We as a country have an obligation to keep our greatest assets safe from harm, and to have the education process be free of any intrusive, distracting issues, and threat to our young people. Simply IV Safety has a true deterrent with a product designed to do so.There have been many ideas brought to the table regarding school safety, but with none of them being non-intrusive to the learning environment, or true safety initiatives. 

   We at Simply IV Safety feel that this is unfair for an educator to play the role of a law enforcement figure in a learning environment, and armed guards make the learning environment feel like an institutionalized setting for the students. As much respect that we have for officers, and first responders we feel that in todays society this makes them an initial target, and places an overwhelming task for one resource officer to try and protect an entire schools population safely, and with true outcome measures before extreme harm can be done. 

   The learning environment should be such that, a place where children can learn free of distractions, or potential threat. Parents should be able to feel safe sending their children to school again, and the financial burden this places on the taxpayer for programs that show no true data is a waste. With a district  investing in Simply IV Safety they are ensuring in a product that will free up  further funding for years to come will ensure financial stability i.e; hiring back educators that were let go due to budget cuts, materials, and programs that are essential for the success of our generations to come. 

   We believe that our product has the solution to bring back education to its highest standards, with a deterrent to ensure safety for all. Our intellectual property (Patented) product is a device that would be placed into every classroom, and administrative office in a school setting. Our device would be completely covered by functional tools for the learning environment i.e.; Smartboards, White Boards, Chalkboards, and other classroom furniture, and decoration suitable for the classroom setting, however behind these items would be a completely impenetrable refuge that is capable of housing every student, and administrator from any imminent threat. The system itself is equipped with its own independent air filtration system, back up source for power in the case of the main power being interrupted, communication, and essentials for the children, and teachers. 

   Allocation of funds raised:

$10,000- Launch of an E-Commerce website.

$75,000-A nationwide advertising, and marketing campaign.

$65,000-Additional testing for other applications within a retail driven marketplace for scalability. Testing would also place Simply IV Safety on the approved equipment list for FEMA.

$100,000-Bringing on additional staffing, from administrative positions, to marketing, and sales staff.

   We anticipate some speed bumps in the road along the way. However we truly believe that with the high demand of school safety initiatives by every state that we will be able to overcome them, by aligning ourselves with manufacturers, licensee's, large distribution centers. We have overcome most of the hurtles already by having the support of our home state Senators, Members of Congress, and Training Coordinator from Homeland Security for active situations in a school setting.

   We hope that the Indiegogo community shares our vision, of a safe environment for our children, and their future.

story:
Handcrafted Polarized Wooden Eyewear

Functional fashion for the lake. Buoyant wooden sunglasses handcrafted in multiple materials and styles.

Above: Blue Confluence, with bamboo case and sleeve

Never lose your shades at the bottom of the lake again!

Above: Solstice, crafted from carbonized bamboo

Our Goal
We wish to provide fashionable eyewear which you won't be afraid to bring on the boat for fear of watching them slowly sink into the dark depths of the lake. All of our products are buoyant and will float in water.

With this campaign, we will begin our pursuit of reaching that goal by offering 4 different options.

Available options are:

  • Confluence - Made from skateboard wood, with grey lenses. Frames will be available in both red and blue styling.
  • Solstice - Crafted from carbonized bamboo, with green REVO lenses
  • Lagoon - Black painted, but created from bamboo. Grey lenses to match.

Lenses
All pairs have polarized lenses to protect your beautiful eyes from UV(A+B) rays!

Extras
All pairs include a bamboo case and protective sleeve to keep your Boardwalks always looking their best!

Above: Blue Confluence, made from skateboard wood

Sizing
In this production run, all pairs have the same dimensions, 53-18-145.
All pairs also use spring hinges in their construction to ensure a comfortable fit on your head!

Thanks for looking through our campaign!

story:
ArmScarvz, the scarf you can wear as sleeves, are a new wardrobe staple. This product was launched in November and has already become an essential wardrobe item for countless women who realized the need for ArmScarvz. The debut collection of ArmScarvz includes festive colors, shimmery solids and exotic neutrals. They are constructed of the finest fabric, versatile and wrinkle-free, using highest quality details and craftsmanship. No matter what your style may be, there is a style of ArmScarvz for you. Dress it up, dress it down, drape it, hang it, wrap it tie it… ArmScarvz has you covered. 

It is our mission to warm the arms of women on the go and to do so in style, practicality and comfort. As a unique product in the marketplace, we take pride in providing instant protection and glamour to the women who play multiple roles in their daily lives. 

Women's arms are, on average, 2.8 degrees colder than men's, so for many women this means chilly arms. However, most women don't always have the carrying capacity to have a sweater handy. Luckily, ArmScarvz are packaged in bundles and each one comes in a keepsake bag so you can carry it with you for those unexpected chilly moments. So many occasions call for a quick arm cover, whether it be in meetings, the movies, or social and sporting events. When outdoors, ArmScarvz can provide an extra benefit, protecting your arms from direct sun. ArmScarvz will help you travel light and stay warm, in style. 

Part of why we want to share ArmScarvz with the world is because of the smile it puts on people's faces. Simply put, our customers are delighted when they see a scarf become a glamorous pair of sleeves. There is something about that transformation that visibly brightens the face of our "ArmScarvz Entourage." The reaction has been the same, no matter where ArmScarvz have been featured. Whether it be a conference, small showing, shopping trip, or most recently, the runway, the captivation is undeniable. It is our goal to keep this reaction going and growing across the globe. 

What We Need and What You Get

  • To take ArmScarvz to the next level, we need larger quantities, and quicker turnaround than our current seamstresses can provide. To use our chosen manufacturer, we need a minimum order of 500, in a variety of styles, which will cost approximately $3,500.
  • Not only do we need to produce them, we need to sell ArmScarvz too! So, we have chosen several festivals and markets to set up and share ArmScarvz with buyers and distributors. The minimum amount we need to secure these venues is $1,000. 
  • You can invite us to your event to have ArmScarvz delivered to your guests. We can even have ArmScarvz made with your celebratory message printed on them, or in your team colors.

The Impact

ArmScarvz go beyond fashion and apparel to put the women we serve in the spotlight. Our "ArmScarvz Entourage" is comprised of everyday, strong, independent, and beautiful women who deserve a bit of recognition. Through our various media platforms, we aim to spotlight different women who embody both our vision and product. It is this brand's goal to continue showcasing women around the world. That is why we ask you to join our journey so we can warm the arms of women on the go, while simultaneously making it known how beautiful they truly are. 

Other Ways You Can Help

As a newly emerging company, we not only value financial support but we also know the power of the individual and their voice. If, by this time, you feel you have connected with ArmScarvz and understand our mission then make it known! Like us, follow us, become part of this great movement that is ArmScarvz! There is so much change to create and we are ready to create it, starting with the simple task of warming the arms of women on the go. Let's create a movement and take the world by storm. Welcome to this ArmScarvz journey.  

Folks who may not contribute monetarily can still help:

  • Share the ArmScarvz idea with friends.
  • Invite us to your fundraiser and ArmScarvz will contribute a percentage of sales to your cause. 
  • Feel free to use the Indiegogo share tools & help us make some noise!

story:
Sources: 1 - 2 - 3 - 4
 



We are Sam, Owen & Matt.
We are the founders of Live Learn Evolve and to help fund the growth of the platform we’ve created Humantra. We didn't want to start just ‘another clothing brand’ as we found most clothing labels are using inhumane sweatshops. So we've designed ethical clothing with meaningful messages to create positive social change.
 

Humantra believes that the exploitation of people and the environment has to be stopped. Workers should be paid a wage that enables them to live in dignity. This campaign is our way of combating the negative effects of the fashion industry and we're giving 10% of all profits to Clean Clothes Campaign. We have spent a lot of time ensuring our products can trace an ethical and sustainable path back to their origins. If you are a person who values people over profit, you’re in the right place.

 

 

 


The clothing will be produced on a print-on-demand basis meaning that the clothes are made to order leaving zero-waste.


For USA & Canada we use American Apparel. They employ over 10,000 people worldwide. Most of those jobs are in the USA with more than 6,500 employees at their LA-area factories alone. The t-shirts we use are part of their Sustainable Edition range that are made from 100% USDA Certified Organic and pesticide-free cotton. Currently we cannot source organic vests/tanks through our suppliers but as we grow this will change. For more information on the process behind their clothing go here.

 

 

 

 


For UK & Europe we use Earth Positive Clothing. They are recognised as one of the leaders in the global garment industry for the ethics surrounding the clothing production. The clothes are organic and ethically made, but crucially, manufactured solely using sustainable energy generated from wind and solar power in India. To see the story behind their garments you can see their latest video of Supermodel and Campaigner Lily Cole visiting the EarthPositive Supply Chain in India. For more information clothing go here.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 




In our own experience, we’ve had a number of start-up ideas with verypositive responses only to fail due to lack of funding. So, this is the test to see if people are willing to support us by voting with their money.

Why $5000?
Our vision is to spread awareness about the destructive aspects of the fashion industry, as one step toward creating a more balanced and harmonious planet.

We have a 3-month marketing plan that will help us move forward with our vision. This involves getting independent artists, funky-fashionistas and sustainability-soldiers on board. Designing guerilla marketing campaigns, creating a studio and spreading awareness of fashion corporations that are not acting upon their promises for the good of garment workers and the planet as a whole.

 

We hope you will support us in trying to make this work!
We’ve brought together inspiration from nature, philosophy, spirituality and much more to create some truly captivating designs.

Take a look for yourself…
 


SIGNATURE LLE LOGO
This logo represents the whole ethos behind Live Learn Evolve - to live fully, learning and evolving through whatever life throws at us.



 


BE HERE NOW
The timeless mantra popularised by Ram Dass. It means literally just that – to live in this moment. Not dwelling on the past or worrying about the future. “I have realized that the past and future are real illusions, that they exist in the present, which is what there is and all there is.” – Alan Watts

 

 

 

 

 

 


WHYFACE

This illustration explores the often erratic nature of the mind and our ability to find peace within ourselves. Reminding us to question everything.
 

 


 

EVOLVE
In nature we can observe the processes of evolution, we are all completely malleable organisms with infinite potential to live our lives fully. This design encapsulates this concept as Stephen Hawking said "Intelligence is the ability to adapt to change".

 

 

 

 

 

 



 

TRAVELER
"What you seek is seeking you" is one of the quotes entwined into this illustration that explores the role of our experience - both inner and outer - as we continue to walk and craft our own path.

 

 

 

 

 




YIN YANG
The basic philosophy of Yin Yang is harmony and balance. It describes how opposite forces are actually complimentary and interconnected in the natural world, and how they give rise to one another. We've created a novel twist by integrating the iconic peace and love symbols.




CONNECTED
A subtle leaf pattern lies beneath the 'Connected' graphic, which represents the interconnection that lies between man and the Earth. As Terence Mckenna stated "Nature is not mute it is Man that is deaf" calling us to become more active global citizens.
 

 

 


QUOTE MAN
This funky illustration contains quotes that have greatly influenced the artist in many ways. For instance "Jobs fill your pockets, adventures fill your soul" by Jamie Lyn Beatty and "None but ourselves can free our minds" by Bob Marley.
 

 

 

 

 


 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

What is crowd funding?
Crowdfunding is a way of raising finance, awareness and support for great ideas by asking a large number of people each for a small amount of money.

What do I get for my money?
For the money you pledge you will receive a reward - There is a reward section a short scroll up from this explaining what you will receive for each different cost.

When can I expect delivery?
We are unsure of how much support we will get from this campaign but we will aim to get the products out as quickly as possible, We have set the date to November 2016 to ensure that we can process all the orders if we become overwhelmed. When the company is up and running - Delivery in the UK will take 3-7 days and US will take 3-7 days.

How will I be able to choose the desired clothing?
You will be sent a survey after the Indiegogo is funded asking you which design(s) you have chosen.

Is there a return policy?
Unless the product is delivered faulty or broken we will be unable to process returns at this current stage in the formation of this company. Our garments are made to order and we have sizing underneath to ensure you get the right fit.

Do you have the sizing dimensions?
Yes, please take a look underneath this section.

Any other questions?
Please get in touch, we are happy to help :)

 

 

 

We have added the above 2 images so that you can see the exact style of clothing we will be using. Some of the items of clothing presented above may not be a 100% accurate representation of the clothing when they are printed. All of our clothes use organic cotton except for the American Apparel vests/tanks as we are unable to source this at the current time. We have tried our best to ensure our products come from responsible companies as can be seen in the HOW section above. If there is something that you feel isn't in line with our campaign, please contact us we would love to hear criticism so we can make this company as ethical and eco-friendly as possible.

story:
LeadHead Glass was founded in 2013 in a meager home studio. Our goal was to make high quality, hand crafted terrariums. We decided early on the importance of making a product that was not only beautiful, but sustainable. All of the glass and wood we use is responsibly sourced from hand deconstructed homes in Detroit. 

In the past year and a half, we have been fortunate and worked many late nights to grow the Leadhead brand. We are now in stores across the United States and Canada, along with a growing online business at leadheadglass.com. We were also a 2014 finalist in Martha Stewart's American Made competition.  

We are in the process of moving into a larger commercial studio space in Detroit, where we will be able to increase our production capacity. Every product that LeadHead makes is fully constructed by hand, so in order to keep cost down and ramp up production, we also feel it is time to mechanize certain parts of our process.  

We are looking to purchase a computerized CNC glass scoring machine. Currently we use a hand operated glass scoring system. With a computerized glass scorer, a task that would normally take us days, can be reduced to hours. It will also allow for a greater accuracy and detail for specialty cuts.

Moving our studio has been a major expense, but this expansion will allow us to get our products to more people, and to continue our commitment to up-cycling in Detroit.  A glass scoring machine would allow us to take our small company, and help to expand it into a thriving local business. We appreciate your investment.

 

The Hall House

(Not planted for perk)

The Hall house is named for Dr. George Rogers Hall, a horticulture pioneer. Dr. Hall first visited Japan in 1859 to join the lucrative trade that had already been established between Japan and the United States.  Hall filled Wardian cases with Japanese plants, and they set sail from the newly opened Yokohama whaling port. These terrariums protected the flora from the salt air allowing them to survive the long ocean voyage. Dr. Hall's trip was the first time that shipments of Japanese plants came directly to America. Notable specimens included Japanese Maple, Crab Apple, Magnolia, Wisteria, and Hinoki Cypress, slow growing forms of which are frequently trained as bonsai. Did you make it through all that? Hall house features a box gable roof and a repeating geometric line design, the perfect space for your own bonsai. 

15" L x 10"W x 18" H 


The Ward

(Not planted for perks)

The Ward takes its namesake from Dr. Nathaniel Bagshaw Ward, inventor of the modern terrarium. LeadHead Glass based this design on an original Wardian Case from the 1830's. These cases would be used by orchid smugglers, hired by the European Aristocracy. The British had such a fervor for collecting rare varieties from Asia and South America, collectors were said to have "orchidelirium". We hope that you have less nefarious intentions than the orchid smugglers of Dr. Wards day. This one is a classic. 

10" L x 7" W x 13" H 


Framed Detroit Post Card

The Detroit Post is a unique keepsake that is made entirely of glass and wood from hand deconstructed homes in Detroit. The same glass that once viewed these cityscapes, now captures the memories of this great city through the decades. The Detroit Post features a vintage postcard of Detroit, in a reclaimed glass and wood frame. Each framed postcard will feature a Detroit scene or landmark. Many of the vintage postcards are stamped and have hand written messages, however we do not guarantee this.  


Cape Cod

(Not planted for perk)

The Cape Cod's clean symmetrical design and steep pitched roof, hark back to the sturdy New England cottages built to withstand the battering of the stormy Northeastern Coast. Our Cape Cod may only face the peril of a wobbly side table, but it will serve as a dashing home for your plants or mossery. 

6" L x 6" W x 15"H

story:
As we closed in demand on Indiegogo, we have officially launched our online store at www.SVSTEM.co! There you find all information about our watches and offerings. We will keep this campaign open to continue communication with our initial backers! Thank you!


Svstem Watches are high quality sartorial timepieces that feature a unique interchangeable bezel system, allowing you to switch easily between various looks and styles, providing seamless versatility within a single watch component.

On July 16th, the team made a corporate decision to rebrand their watches (formally known as 0815) under the new name of SVSTEM (pronounced 'system'). Click here to read the decision behind the name change.

All watches will display the updated logo featuring the word "svstem" instead of "0815".

PRESS

___________________


" It is a simple design, but clean, uncluttered, and the bezel system sets it apart from the hordes of other minimalist quartz watches vying for your crowdfunded dollars." The Time Bum


" The versatility of the 08/15* collection is an excellent way to get multiple looks out of one watch."  HEY GENTS AUSTRALIA


" 0815 Watches* get their start this summer season offering a unique interchangeable bezel system. The watches can be customized to fit your mood or style with several bezel choices."   SWAGSYNDICATE.COM


"@0815watches*, a sleek modern interchangeable bezel watch which is available now on Indiegogo." 
@watchesofinstagram

*0815 was the formal name of svstem.


TWO WATCH BASES

___________________

Component 1 :
Watch Base

*Note that the watch will display the updated logo featuring the words "svstem", instead of "0815".


4 BEZELS: INFINITE POSSIBILITIES, MORE TO COME!


Component 2:
Interchangeable Bezels

*Note that the watch will display the updated logo featuring the words "svstem", instead of "0815".


Complete Collection


SVSTEM WATCHES:

Seamless Versatility. Infinite Possibilities.

svstem watches consists of  2 components: the Watch Base and the Interchangeable Bezels.

  • The Watch Base is a precision machined, stainless steel, barebones body that houses the functional components of a watch.
  • The Interchangeable Bezels, each with their own distinct character, lock on to the Watch Base, supplementing an otherwise basic watch with a touch of style and identity that complements a wide variety of sartorial ensembles.

Working together, these 2 components create a unique watch system that allows you to effortlessly dress up your watch in a variation of bespoke styles, providing a seamless versatility tailored to our ever-evolving lifestyles.


___________________

Purchase Options

1 Bezel of your choice

$19 USD
(Includes bezels and straps unlocked from stretch-goals)

1 Watch Base (Jet Black or Ash Grey) + 2 Bezels of your choice

$79 USD – Super Early Bird
$89 USD – Early Bird
$109 USD – Supporter

1 Watch Base (Jet Black or Ash Grey) + a set of 4 Bezels (1 of each bezel design)

$129 USD – Core Supporter

2 Watch Bases (Jet Black and Ash Grey) + 8 Bezels (2 of each bezel design)

$249 USD – Collector


2 Watch Bases (Jet Black and Ash Grey) + 8 Bezels (2 of each bezel design) + Limited Edition Collectors Case

$999 USD – Valued Collector


___________________

Stretch Goals

Stretch Goal #1 – $40k USD

Unlock additional strap colorways when the campaign reaches $40,000 USD in funding. Upon unlocking this Stretch Goal, the straps will be available for purchase under the "Bezel" perk.

Stretch Goal #2 – $50k USD

Unlock the Carbon Fiber & Marine Blue bezel designs when the campaign reaches $50,000 USD in funding. Upon unlocking this Stretch Goal, the bezels will be available for purchase under the "Bezel" perk.

Stretch Goal #3 – $70k USD

Unlock the Whisky & Chardonnay bezel designs when the campaign reaches $70,000 USD in funding. Upon unlocking this Stretch Goal, the bezels will be available for purchase under the "Bezel" perk.

___________________

Watch Specifications

Movement: Swiss Ronda 763
Case Material: Stainless Steel 316L
Case Diameter: 42mm 
Strap Material: Genuine Leather, with Stainless Steel Buckles
Strap Width: 20mm
Optics: Scratch Resistant Mineral Glass
Water Resistance: 3 ATM
Battery Life: 2-3 Years


___________________

How it Started

When we started to design the first svstem watch, we wanted to create a watch that could be easily personalized. We initially played around with different strap designs, but soon identified the bezel as the key component defining the character of a watch. It made us question, "What if we could effortlessly change the bezel of a watch and dress it up according to mood or preference?"

It was from there that we started designing a mechanism for interchangeable bezels on a single watch base. We went with a 42mm diameter watch case as it best accommodated the bezel thickness we needed to accentuate the unique characteristics of each bezel.


What does svstem mean?

Our name, svstem, is an adapted spelling of the word 'system', adapted to contain the acronym of our core brand attribute - seamless versatility, while also retaining the connotation of the word 'system' - a set of things working together as parts of a mechanism or an interconnecting network. 

svstem speaks of functional utility over contrived exclusivity. With svstem watches, we seek to produce products that work flawlessly in the background, independent of any extra fanfare.


An Understated Confidence

svstem represents an understated confidence, one that is refined enough to have little need for superfluous self-exaltation.

It represents the modern individual whose life is in constant transition towards their goals and aspirations, reflected by an identity that transcends beyond material status.

For them, there is no need for a superficial status. For them, there is svstem.


___________________

Production Timeline

We have everything ready and are able to manufacture our watches with the quality we desire. We have the advantage of taking a small quantity order as we are able to scale up when needed. We were able to source every material individually and to do all the details we want to achieve to make these unique timepieces. With ample assistance from our manufacturers, we can easily handle issues with suppliers and redirect to others. This makes us very flexible. 

Once the watches are assembled, every one of them runs through strict quality testing to ensure that every piece works perfectly. This is the most crucial step of our production process as we want to have all the watches shipped in the highest quality possible. After going through the round of rigid and thorough testing, the products are shipped to our distribution centers.

When the funding period ends, we will be ready to start production and ship the watch to you in a timely manner.


Risks & Challenges

With both of us being professional industrial designers, we fully understand that manufacturing and bringing a product to market is a time intensive and complicated process. As such, we have prepared all the necessary production steps ahead of time to minimize as much risk as we can.

We have also been working very closely with our watch manufacturer over the past 8 months in order to establish the right quality of product and forge and reliable partnership with all the suppliers involved.

The manufacturing and fulfillment process is good to go, only waiting for funding to make it happen. As we move through the production timeline, we will be keeping you up to date with regular updates and pictures.

We are fully committed into moving according to schedule. However, we are also insistent that there should be no compromise on the quality of the product. Therefore, delays might be inevitable if the product quality is not at the standard we demand.

You will be kept informed about the status of our every step towards the final shipment, and will be updated in a timely manner should we encounter any unforeseen setback. We strive towards creating great products that excite you, and thank you for your support to get this campaign up and running! 


Warranty

All of our watches come with a limited warranty for one year.


F.A.Q.

How do I select my watch color and bezels?

Your selection of choice for the watch and bezels will be made available after the funding period ends. We will be send out an update by email allowing you to select your choices then. 

Do you ship internationally?

Yes we do! Our watches ship worldwide and shipping is free of charge as well!

What does a complete set of 4 bezels consist of?

A complete set of 4 bezels consists of one each of bezel design: Polished Silver, Brushed Copper, Gun Metal, and Tactical Black.

Can I pledge for more than one watch?

Yes you can! You can pledge for as many watches you want to.

What is the movement and how long does the battery last?

We use a Swiss Ronda 763 movement including a battery which should last about 2-3 years.

How is the warranty of my watch?

All of our watches come with a limited warranty for one year.

___________________

Stretch Goal #1 – $40k USD

Unlock additional strap colorways when the campaign reaches $40,000 USD in funding. Upon unlocking this Stretch Goal, the straps will be available for purchase under the "Bezel" perk.Stretch Goal #2 – $50k USD


Unlock the Carbon Fiber & Marine Blue bezel designs when the campaign reaches $50,000 USD in funding. Upon unlocking this Stretch Goal, the bezels will be available for purchase under the "Bezel" perk.


Stretch Goal #3 – $70k USD


Unlock the Whisky & Chardonnay bezel designs when the campaign reaches $70,000 USD in funding. Upon unlocking this Stretch Goal, the bezels will be available for purchase under the "Bezel" perk.

___________________

Watch Specifications
Movement: Swiss Ronda 763Case Material: Stainless Steel 316LCase Diameter: 42mm Strap Material: Genuine Leather, with Stainless Steel BucklesStrap Width: 20mmOptics: Scratch Resistant Mineral GlassWater Resistance: 3 ATMBattery Life: 2-3 Years


___________________


How it Started


When we started to design the first svstem watch, we wanted to create a watch that could be easily personalized. We initially played around with different strap designs, but soon identified the bezel as the key component defining the character of a watch. It made us question, "What if we could effortlessly change the bezel of a watch and dress it up according to mood or preference?"
It was from there that we started designing a mechanism for interchangeable bezels on a single watch base. We went with a 42mm diameter watch case as it best accommodated the bezel thickness we needed to accentuate the unique characteristics of each bezel.


What does svstem mean?
Our name, svstem, is an adapted spelling of the word 'system', adapted to contain the acronym of our core brand attribute - seamless versatility, while also retaining the connotation of the word 'system' - a set of things working together as parts of a mechanism or an interconnecting network. 
svstem speaks of functional utility over contrived exclusivity. With svstem watches, we seek to produce products that work flawlessly in the background, independent of any extra fanfare.

An Understated Confidence
svstem represents an understated confidence, one that is refined enough to have little need for superfluous self-exaltation.
It represents the modern individual whose life is in constant transition towards their goals and aspirations, reflected by an identity that transcends beyond material status.
For them, there is no need for a superficial status. For them, there is svstem.




___________________
Production Timeline




We have everything ready and are able to manufacture our watches with the quality we desire. We have the advantage of taking a small quantity order as we are able to scale up when needed. We were able to source every material individually and to do all the details we want to achieve to make these unique timepieces. With ample assistance from our manufacturers, we can easily handle issues with suppliers and redirect to others. This makes us very flexible. 
Once the watches are assembled, every one of them runs through strict quality testing to ensure that every piece works perfectly. This is the most crucial step of our production process as we want to have all the watches shipped in the highest quality possible. After going through the round of rigid and thorough testing, the products are shipped to our distribution centers.
When the funding period ends, we will be ready to start production and ship the watch to you in a timely manner.



    Risks & Challenges 
With both of us being professional industrial designers, we fully understand that manufacturing and bringing a product to market is a time intensive and complicated process. As such, we have prepared all the necessary production steps ahead of time to minimize as much risk as we can.
We have also been working very closely with our watch manufacturer over the past 8 months in order to establish the right quality of product and forge and reliable partnership with all the suppliers involved.
The manufacturing and fulfillment process is good to go, only waiting for funding to make it happen. As we move through the production timeline, we will be keeping you up to date with regular updates and pictures.
We are fully committed into moving according to schedule. However, we are also insistent that there should be no compromise on the quality of the product. Therefore, delays might be inevitable if the product quality is not at the standard we demand.
You will be kept informed about the status of our every step towards the final shipment, and will be updated in a timely manner should we encounter any unforeseen setback. We strive towards creating great products that excite you, and thank you for your support to get this campaign up and running! 


Warranty


All of our watches come with a limited warranty for one year.


F.A.Q.
How do I select my watch color and bezels?
Your selection of choice for the watch and bezels will be made available after the funding period ends. We will be send out an update by email allowing you to select your choices then. 

Do you ship internationally?
Yes we do! Our watches ship worldwide and shipping is free of charge as well!


What does a complete set of 4 bezels consist of?
A complete set of 4 bezels consists of one each of bezel design: Polished Silver, Brushed Copper, Gun Metal, and Tactical Black.

Can I pledge for more than one watch?
Yes you can! You can pledge for as many watches you want to.
What is the movement and how long does the battery last?
We use a Swiss Ronda 763 movement including a battery which should last about 2-3 years.
How is the warranty of my watch?
All of our watches come with a limited warranty for one year.

story:
A vision created by a color-blind designer (art scholarships through college) in combination with an x-Quirky industrial designer (over 20 products launched out of NYC). The goal of the seasoned DIALED team is to bring to life a series of premium minimalist designed products through an insane commitment to innovation and eliminating the unnecessary. The first product in the Dialed family of innovations is the Notebook Wallet. With over a dozen rich features, there's something here for everyone.


The vision for the Notebook wallet was to offer a pocket-sized storage solution that houses the essentials + a slim notebook for the serial note taker and doodler.

Materials Selection

In addition to our commitment to a slim profile, we are also committed to selecting quality materials while striving to maintain affordable pricing to make the brand very accessible to all demographics. Each wallet features RFID blocking properties for an added measure of security and peace of mind. 

 

The Small Notebook Wallet fits comfortably in your back pocket, a shirt pocket or toss it in your bag. The Large Notebook Wallet fits in a front pants pocket or strap it to your phone and carry it comfortably in your hand.


The large Wallet is also designed to carry your passport securely either in place of the notebook or on the opposite side. Choose your own adventure.


Let's take a closer look now at the premium paper notebook inside.


 Here is a more in-depth page breakdown (56 total pages):

1. 1 Month page (write the name of the month here along with your contact info so it is returned if lost)

2. 12 "week-at-a-glance" pages (with lined checklist pages at the side for notes on the large Notebook Wallet)

3. 31 lined pages with watermark universal checklist boxes

4. 11 blank pages for doodling

5. 1 Back cover page with dialed contact info for your reference

 If you're not sold on the whole checklist concept, I highly recommend reading this NY Times Best Seller, "Checklist Manifesto," by Atul Gawande. His application of this simple concept is saving lives within health organizations, but it can be applied to all walks of life. (This campaign has no association to the author or his book - we're just big fans)


Are you the kind of person that loves tactile paper note taking or planning, but you're equally committed to your phone? You don't have to take sides - carry both conveniently by strapping your phone to the large wallet. It's a perfect bundle. 


As another way to solidify the relationship between your tech and your notebook, we are also offering this simple stylus pen that is small enough to fit comfortably inside the small and large Notebook Wallets.


Use the stylus to doodle on your touch screen and switch to the pen to sketch or plan in your notebook.

 The product design has evolved in significant ways throughout the design and development process. We need your help to continue to refine the product line to delight the world. Here's a quick walk down memory lane as the Notebook Wallet originated down to the final tech packet that was delivered to the manufacturer:


 Lastly, we are excited to move quickly with this launch and deliver the Notebook Wallet in January (or earlier if possible) and move on to the second campaign in the 1st quarter of 2016. We have some great concepts in the works to expand the brand and build up the Dialed Community. We couldn't do any of this without backers like you!

We THANK YOU for your support and excitement for the brand and the growing product line. We will provide regular updates along the journey.

-the Dialed Gear Team

story:
What is Doué  

Doué is a brand that was created by a group of people that is constantly pursuing for the finest lifestyle one could have. Our project started a few years ago when we came across a discussion about how material and design value of products that we bought are only a very small portion of it's retail price due to current market structure that stacks layers of profit for distribution.  

However, we believe there must be a way to find a product that is as fine in design and quality with a reasonable value. We believe there must be a way that presents us the choice to not compromise with the coarse situation of current reality.

Since then, we have been ceaselessly searching for a way to create things that could atleast reflect a reasonable portion of it's cost. In the course of this journey, talented people with a common thought has decided to join our course. 

Hence, we created Doué, a brand and a platform where we can freely exercise our imagination and realize items that are designed through in-depth consideration and decision.

 

We know it is a big dream to reach

But we have to start somewhere. 

  

Doué started as a bag brand summer 2013, because this is where our current members' skill set are heavily based upon. Members and products of our team have won many world class design awards. Especially on camera bags, we've helped our clients to win 4 consecutive TIPA awards, a award that could be described as "the Oscar of the photo and imaging industry" during our past years.

We decided to setup a workshop at Guangzhou, putting everything into action and made every piece of Doué bag with our own hand, seeking to work our way slowly toward the vision. 

We took a lot of time to research on how a bag could be useful for daily usage. All the materials for our bags are chosen or ordered parts by parts ourselves. 

We're not looking to create bags that are very custom made as it would cost a great deal to it's user, but to create products that can reflect a good quality at it's price relatively. Moreover, we're promising all our products a lifetime repairing warranty, as a direct and simple promise of service to our supporters.

However, supporting a self production workshop is a extremely costly thing to do, especially when all the items are made through a combination of handcraft and sewing labor. Your contribution will really help us in supporting the brand to stay alive through this stage of establishment.

Strapline

This is our very first collection.

By using bold but simple outline design together with tough and durable custom fabrics, Verve Strapline series has successfully bring functionality and trendy taste to a pleasant combination.

The series is designed to provide large capacity, opening, and uncomplicated functions; a attempt to uncover the intention to engage in adventure and a fearless attitude to challenge. In addition, its durable fabric provides a sturdy, robust exterior touch while preserving a delicate, neat impression. 

The Verve Strapline presents a series of bag with the functionality that is just right for outgoing and energetic users to present a unique style of self-confidence. It’s signature red and black strap trimming embellishment can also be utilize as extra hanging strap resembling most military bags.

Functionality and style for Verve Strapline is not meant to be a choice, but a whole。



Why are we here?

Our workshop is not a factory, we only have a handful of very experienced artisans that makes every single piece of product through a combination of handcraft and sewing machine.  

The entire workshop was started from scratch, all sorts of professional sewing machine, tools, working space, and especially the materials, which are custom ordered, in which requires a minimum order of ten thousand yards to lay a hand on one specific piece of textile. 

We are able to support ourselves until now that the first collection is ready to be go into production, but are in need for fund to maintain production and material ordering cost.

Any fund that we receive will be used to help our product go into real production and allows us to keep the brand alive and toward our goal to make quality bags. As well as developing more collections of various focus for different requirements.


What we have to offer

Here are some of the perks you get for contributing! Thank you for your support and we hope that you will enjoy our bags as a useful everyday item! 

The current Verve-Strapline collection is designed to have three different colors: Black, Army Green, and Blue. But at current moment, it is uncertain that we can offer items of all three color at once. 

Hence, the perks will be subjected to Black color right now; however, please do let us know if you would prefer Army Green or Blue color and we would try our best to deliver them for you. 


Verve - Strapline - Cross-body bag Large (度帷 極限系列 大斜跨包) - $90

 

Verve - Strapline - Cross-body bag Small (度帷 極限系列 小斜跨包) - $80


Verve - Strapline - Satchel Small (度帷 極限系列 小單肩包) - $100


Verve - Strapline - Keyring (度帷 極限系列 鑰匙扣) - $15

 

Verve - Strapline - Crescent bag Small (度帷 極限系列 小月亮包) - $90

 

Verve - Strapline - Sling bag Small (度帷 極限系列 小斜肩包) - $100



Verve - Strapline - Backpack Medium (度帷 極限系列 中背包) - $115

 

Verve - Strapline - Tote Medium (度帷 極限系列 中托特包) - $100

 

Verve - Strapline - Tote Large (度帷 極限系列 大托特包) - $110

 

Verve - Strapline -  Folio Medium  (度帷 極限系列 中肩背公事包) - $110

  

Verve - Strapline - Briefcase Medium  (度帷 極限系列 中手提公事包) - $160

(Shipping: Please add $5 for Taiwan or China and $20 to ship worldwide $15 for just the key ring)

   

Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ)

How do I choose my colors?

The current Verve-Strapline collection is designed to have three different colors: Black, Army Green, and Blue. But at current moment, we are not sure if we are able to offer item in all three color at once. 

Hence, the perks will be subjected to Black color right now; however, please do let us know if you would prefer Army Green or Blue color.

We would try our best to deliver them for you, if we are able to order the production of all three different color of textile.

What are you going to do with the money you raise?
Once we reach our goal, we'll be able to order the materials immediately and initiate production of the bags. Any additional funds raised will go towards continued production and expansion of the current line to include new colors, new style, and the development of new collections. And perhaps some small items that as an extra.

When do I get my bags?
Our workshop is operating and is standing by for production of this current series while exploring for future designs. As soon as our campaign ends, we will be initiating the production of Verve Strapline bags.

Please allow for 20 days to receive the funds we raised, we can expect to have the bags delivered to you within 2 months after the campaign. But hopefully, we will be delivering each of them to you sooner than this when everything is flowing smoothly.

Is there a warranty for your bags?

Yes, all Doué bags comes with a lifetime warranty for repair. As long as the condition of the bags are in repairable condition and not from a result of intended damage, we will repair the bags free of charge. All you need to do is contact us, leave you're information, and send in the bags! (Please note that all shipping costs to and from our workshop will be the obligation of the customer.)

What sizes do Doué bags come in? 
Doué bags usually splits the bag in 5 different sizes: Mini, Small, Medium, Large, and Extra Large.

But while different bag types may be designed for different usage, the 5 different size would not be fully available for each bag type, but usually for the best possible size that suits it's using condition.

All the bags will have it's size written by it's full name for you to easily recognize.

Can we wash the bags?
Yes and no, the Verve Strapline bags are made by a combination of custom ordered nylon and polyester materials. The textile also underwent a process of water resistant strengthening treatment.

Throwing the bag directly into the washing machine or soaking it with water will possibly destroy the exterior treatment and lower it's durability.

The best way to clean the bag if it became dirty would be lightly wiping the dirty area with a piece of cloth that was rinsed with water or pure alcohol.

 

Doué

The word “Doué” characterize being talented, gifted, and capable. So are we. But we have a bigger dream. We dream to exercise our talents to bring everyone a selection to own a unique characteristic with a bag that suits them. 

In the future, we also hope to become a platform in which all talent people could join our course to deliver good products to each and everyone that comes across our products.

In Doué, we search for infinite possibilities to combine the beauty and functionality within simple daily life. We believe practical goods can also be presented with a good taste. Thus, we would thoroughly explore all the needs and possible using habit; just to produce quality design based on practical daily behavior.

But this is not where we stop. We wanted better than that.

Our design are repeatedly observed, tested, and modified to become a part of its user’s daily life, a life that presents a fine taste in living quality. Doué’s bag aims to become an extension of livelihood. With unique design, Doué’s bag is not just a bag. It is a part of your outfit, a piece of you, which defines who you are.

Through the hand of Doué's master artisan, every single piece of Doué bag is handled like a priceless masterpiece. Hopefully, you will easily locate your name on that one piece of Doué when you are in touch with us.
