story:
LET’S MAKE INTERIOR DESIGN AFFORBABLE TO EVERYONE

ABOUT THE PROJECT

Hello. We are a team of young interior designers and architects set to provide quality interior design and make it affordable.

The goal of the project is to create an amazing online portfolio of custom made professional quality interior design proposals for everyday people, based on real budgets and without any advertising commitments or commissions. In order to prove affordable interior design is possible we need to undertake as many real homes to decorate as possible and the minimum help from you to compensate for the working hours needed to complete each individual project.

Each backer will receive his own unique personalized interior design, at a level of detail depending on the backing, for any space of their home. All projects upon completion will be displayed at mydezigner.co.uk and shortly at mydezigner.com showcasing hundreds’ of examples of affordable interior design for everyday spaces. 

ABOUT THE INTERIOR DESIGN PROJECTS

Each proposal in the final published portfolio will consist of a plan view

of the proposed layout, a list of suggested furniture and a high quality 3d visualization

in color, and let’s call this the full 3d pack.

Obviously in order to make this project true we will need as many homes in need of a remake to work on. This is where you come in. Upon successful funding all backers from $25 and above can send us photos from a space of their house they would like to refresh or re-furniture, change style or use, some basic dimensions and a brief summary of their needs style and their budget in mind, although we will send out a survey for all information needed to each one of you upon the funding period end. Make sure you send all this information as soon as possible and not later than 2 months after the funding period end. We will be processing the proposals to you in the order we are receiving your information. Each supporter will receive a personal estimation about our delivery time for the good. We will keep you all updated on the progress of our work.

ABOUT THE FUNDING

The full pack obviously is a lot of work, from understanding each backers needs to making the optimum proposed layout, a valid plan view and choosing colors for the final 3d visualization including furniture from locally available brands of furniture to each one of you and we will consider this project a success even if we are only asked to complete just 5 full projects like this. We estimate that for each full 3d pack our team needs about a day of work. Since we are serious about the work done for each project we will have to make a range of the proposed design goods we can produce for each supporter. All backers funding our project with $25 or more will get a written summary (roughly 300 words) of our proposal for your chosen space including furniture placement and suggestions about size, color, fabrics and more as well as a proposed painting theme. For $50 or more you’ll also get the plan view layout of the proposal and furniture arrangement. For $120 or more we will add one high quality 3d visualization of your proposal and a list of suggested furniture of locally available to you brands and will post it as a full pack project on our online portfolio at mydezigner.co.uk and shortly at mydezigner.com.

MAKE A GIFT

Though the funding process won't be finished in time for Christmas, this could still be the perfect gift for that special someone in your life moving into a new house or apartment, or just thinking to make a change. A digital gift card with a unique code will be send to you upon the end of the funding period to use it as you like!

THANK YOU!

If you want to learn more about us, please visit mydezigner.co.uk and shortly mydezigner.com. You can also “like” us on www.facebook.com/Mydezigner.  

Thanks again for taking the time to read this. We are excited to see what we can do for you!

 

FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS

QUESTION: What does qualify as “one space” of my home ?

By one space we mean a part of your house like a room for one use, a living room, a kitchen, a bedroom, a kids room  or a playroom all this will be considered one space and we will have to limit that one space for up to 100 square meters or 1000 square feet. Most living rooms do contain enough space for a dining table and will be considered one space but kitchens always are considered to be one space and if they are inside your living room you will have to double your fund accordingly.

QUESTION: I plan to make this a gift to a friend. How will I gather the information needed and how will I present it to him?

Just inform as that you want to make a gift at info@mydezigner.co.uk and we will send you a unique digital gift card with a unique code and the survey form to be filled by your friend, so you can print both and place in a nice envelope of your choice, or just send it by email.

story:
Black Fox Team is a small group of enthusiastic people who would like to create something new and thrilling in gothic art and photography and beside that - occasionally – in cosplay. We already did four photoshootings as you can see on our Facebook site but we are full of plans and ideas and we need your help to put them on screen.

THE TEAM:



Andor Bánsági (second from right) Historian, inventor, cosplay jury, blogger, online marketing specialist, etc. The creative mastermind of the team.

Áron Bausz (left) Graphic, typographer, editor. The photoshop expert of the team.

Dávid Écsi (right) The chief photographer of the team.

Margit Pecze Our gothic princess. Ballerina, dancer and the modell of the group.

Anna Rédei (middle) aka Enji Night. Modell and make-up girl. The cutest and happiest member of our team. :)

Zoltán Vörös aka Zackary. Steampunk god and owner of Cool Gear Steampunk. Modell of the group.

Ágnes Takler Graphic, typographer, editor. Creator of our mascot called Hikari.

Jill Valentine

Have we ever told you that the beautiful and popular Enji Night is a member of our team? :) So we are planning a shoot with her. She will be cosplaying Jill Valentine from Resident Evil in a ghost town (a former military base). Zombies beware!

Red Riding Hood – Bloody Edition

Who hasn't heard about the ever popular fairy tail about the little girl, her old grandma, the evil wolf and the brave hunter who saved them. What if Red doesn't need the help of the Hunter and isn't afraid of the wolf? :) Well, it was our first photoshoot, but we weren't fully satisfied with the results so we want to redo it. As you can see on our page we have a terrifying Red, but we will need a new wolf too.

What's in the egg? Ravengirl

Have you ever wondered how would it look like if a raven would hatch from an egg and transform into a beautiful girl? How about if we put some ballett into it? Even more beautiful. Could be? Yes! We only need a little help from you.

The Red Dragon

One of our friends, Kíra loves dragons. She told us that she wants a full body painting so she could look like a red dragon. Fortunately we have good relations with the girls of Buddha Colours who did the paint job on Zoltan's head on our latest photoshoot (as you can see on the cover picture). Can't wait to see the results. :)

Framed Ballerina

Painting, ballett and photography will come together in this project. I ever wanted to do something more than just a simple photoshooting. Of course it will be difficult and costly 'couse we need a large frame, a large window glass, and we must find a suitable place too. Fortunately one of our friends is a skilled painter. 

Chrysalis & Princess Celestia

Ponies, ponies everywhere... We couldn't resist so we decided to do a My Little Pony themed photoshoot with Chrysalis and Princess Celestia but we want to add more darkness into it. :)

Steampunk Group

Some of our friends are working on a steampunk group (also including a tesla- and a dieselpunk character) cosplay. They will finish their costums very soon and we want a cool photoshoot with them in a forsaken factory.

 

As you can see with your help we could have a really busy year! :) 

 

Costs include food and transportation costs (most of our shoots will be shot on the countryside), rental costs, and materials for the sceneries.

In exchange for your generous donations, you will receive gifts, which are listed to the right of this, on the Prize/Donate Sidebar. Any support you can offer is greatly appreciated, and we hope that you'll get as excited about our art as we are!

story:
What are Bushouts?

  • A line of shoes that blends sustainable materials & style with social impact
  • A movement to create social impact in a small, coastal fishing village in Jamaica

Bushouts will spread from the local village of Lucea into the rest of the Jamaican marketplace as affordable, quality shoes handcrafted by Jamaicans for Jamaicans. The line will include styles for casual and business wear. The goal is to provide a contemporary, well-crafted shoe that can be worn both casually and professionally.


Value to the World

Dignity. Pride. Empowerment.

Bushouts' core philosophy and aim are to create a brand that is sustainable to the community and to the surrounding natural environment. Bushouts is a social business, not a non-profit or traditional start-up. This means that Bushouts will implement a profitable business strategy guided by a social mission.

ETHICAL All workers will be paid a “living wage” - enough to support themselves and their families.

SUSTAINABLE In order to empower the environment all materials sourced will be recycled or natural to the existing environment. Bushouts will use natural fibers from hemp and bamboo, which are more sustainable and longer-lasting than most of their counterparts.

“Turning old truck tires into sandals can be a powerful business idea. For decades that has been the tradition, where everyone from farmers to fighters has fashioned worn-out road rubber into cheap, long-lasting footwear.” --The Guardian

CHARITY As Bushouts grows, profits will be funneled back into the community. Bushouts will be a co-op, partnering with the workers.


The Inspiration

From Founder, Josiah Leatherbury:

In the late 70's I lived in Jamaica. For over a year I lived and worked at the historic Casa Blanca hotel. Before I came, I was young and careless in my dealings with people. But to my surprise I found that the Jamaicans had a particularly calming influence on my character. I found them to be especially friendly, good-natured and always welcoming to strangers. The wonderful way I was welcomed and treated caused a transformation in my life, and when I left the island I had become a better person because of my personal contact with the Jamaican people. I always knew that some day I would return.

I am an artist and returned this year for a three-week trip, telling myself I was going there to paint. But after I arrived, I realized I had come not only to paint images of the beautiful tropical island, but also to once again interact with its wonderful people. I became reacquainted with the country and the people in the rural town of Lucea. 

I became good friends with some of the Jamaicans and they asked for my help.  I believe if someone is drowning, you throw them a rope. Among the main problems there are a lack of jobs. There is also a lack of affordable shoes. Together we decided that we would create jobs and affordable shoes by starting a small cooperative, making shoes from inexpensive but plentiful local materials such as bamboo, hemp cloth and old cast-off car tires. This is being done with great success in Africa. We want do the same in Jamaica. Will you partner with us in this campaign?

I found that the Jamaican people are very intelligent and well-grounded, honest and hardworking, living on an island that most of them are unable to ever leave, with few chances for education or self-improvement. Given a small chance, I know they will be able to improve their own lives.  


Why Jamaica

Jamaica lacks a self-sustaining system for goods production, and most goods are imported from China. This means that their products are not sustainable to the environment and suffer from a loss in quality. While Jamaica is replete with incredible natural resources like hemp and bamboo, it is plagued with unemployment and a depressed economy. 

Jamaica ranked as one of the 10 Worst Economies in this 2011 Forbes list. 

“The poverty rate has been cut almost in half to 10% in recent years while literacy has increased to 88%, according to the World Bank. But the global financial crisis took a toll on this vacation island’s economy, with GDP shrinking 4% in the last two years and expected to grow at less than 3% through 2015. High inflation and a persistent current-account deficit make increasing the wealth of the average citizen a challenging goal.”

In the 2013 Index of Economic Freedom, more detailed information about the state of the country's economy describes the plight of the everyday Jamaican.

"For Jamaicans, obtaining necessary licenses still costs over 200 percent of the level of average annual income. Rigid employment regulations are not conducive to job growth. Significantly burdensome government regulation and political favoritism are a drag on the Jamaican economy, and a cumbersome bureaucracy dissuades potential entrepreneurs. Pervasive corruption continues unchecked by anti-corruption measures that lack enforcement capacity. Continuing fiscal deficits have pushed public debt to about 140 percent of GDP, trapping Jamaica in a vicious cycle of debt service and borrowing, and the new government has not yet demonstrated the political will to tackle the tough reforms needed to eliminate the deficit." 


Where can you buy Bushouts? 

Jamaica! The bustling marketplaces of Jamaica will supply Jamaicans with Bushouts. Stateside, Bushouts will also leverage a distribution channel that incorporates the best of various e-commerce strategies.


Team Members 

Josiah Leatherbury

I have been a businessman, entrepreneur, humanitarian and artist for most of my life. My goal for Bushouts is to be part of the solution to the widespread poverty of the region. Bushouts will be built on the relationships that I have with the wonderful people of Jamaica. Contact me directly on Facebook

Calvin Wilson

I am 30 years old and am unemployed. I have worked mostly in the Jamaican tourist industry in coastal hotels as a groundskeeper. I am excited about the opportunity to produce shoes. This would be a benefit to local workers and give me and others steady employment, thereby enhancing and stabilizing our lives both economically and personally, and help us gain a better education for our children.


What’s Next

Josiah will head to Jamaica at campaign's end and start production of the debut collection. Become a part of the movement. Collaborate with us. Connect to your world. You can help Bushouts create social impact.

  • The initial funds will be used to create shoe designs, purchase raw materials and tools, rent a building and hire workers.


Irie, Mon!

If you simply can’t contribute, that doesn't mean you can’t help:

  • Get the word out and make some noise!

  • Use the Indiegogo share tools!

Calvin in Jamaica

story:
Our Idea

We are your personal fashion consultant, your wardrobe guru, your unique fashion statement. We have developed a way to organize your closet in such a way that you will never be stuck with wondering what to wear or resorting to dressing in the same old boring attire day after predictable day. 


Welcome to "The clothesline"

A quick, convenient, and unique way to assemble your existing clothes and create new looks by mixing and matching the different items in your closet. Even better, you can share your closet with your friends who might just be looking for that extra flare they are missing from their next night out or special occasion. A good friend, is a friend that shares.

The app is simple. 

1) First you take a picture of all of your existing clothes...yes, we know, this can be daunting and time consuming, but it will be worth it in the end we promise, so get that out of your head! 

2) Once all of your clothes are entered into the app, you separate them into their separate categories (Tops, Shorts, Dresses etc..) You can also separate them into different occasions, for example; formal wear, casual, concert, sports etc. 

3) Once everything is entered the fun begins! with a press of a button, you will never be wearing the same outfits over and over again. Essentially, your boring days are behind you. 

Our unique app will mix and match your clothes so you can continue to be the talk of the town with your unique flare and style. Furthermore, once your clothes are entered in the app, you can share them with your friends! They will have access to your closet where they can see if you have that shirt that will "just go perfect" with her skirt...etc. 

Not only will you save time in the morning by not spending countless minutes wondering what to wear, but your friends will also appreciate not having migraines and continuously chanting "I have nothing to wear!" followed by tear drops and regrets. Stop having tears, stop having regrets and stop wasting time! 

This app was made for you, it is you...with a funky twist.   

 

Who We Are?

We are two incredibly talented, blazingly intelligent and unbearably cute grade 8 students from Sir John A MacDonald Public School in London Ontario. Our names are Tiffany Birkner (The bubbly dancer) and Sierra Bryson (The sarcastic straight shooter). Together with Francis Yanga (Red Square Labs), our stellar app creator and the support of our super awesome teacher Mr. Jones we feel we have something with will be beneficial to girls and women from every demographic, age and station in life! Yes, some boys may need this, not to count you out fellas!


 

OUR APP WAS FEATURED IN THE METRO NEWS:



The Story So Far

Our super awesome teacher Mr. Jones gave us a persuasive writing assignment that is based around the TV show Dragons Den (for you Canadian and British investors) and Shark Tank (for you American investors). Essentially, we were tasked to create next latest and greatest new invention, and then persuasively sell our idea to a panel of local community members. Pretty awesome eh! We had to create a business plan, an advertising and marketing plan, as well as a prototype. Leading up to the final project we were asked to form groups brainstorm as many ideas as we could that are unique, realistic and would be beneficial to others. This is where "The Clothesline" was born! 

We were thinking about getting up in the morning earlier then we would like just to pick out clothes to wear for the day (I mean we have to look good right!?), and how much we would love to spend that extra time still in bed, or watching breakfast television...yes we said it. We asked some of our classmates and they thought the idea was great, but lets face it, are they really gonna tell us our idea was terrible? So we took it to the streets, well the mall, and asked over 100 random people what they thought of our idea? Everyone loved it! Then came the prototype...dun dun dun...how can we, 13 year old girls create a fashion app that will change the way millions of women will dress everyday? Mr. Jones said, "why don't you just pick up the phone and call a smart phone app developer?". We hate it when he is right! so we did, and we met Francis, and well, as they say, the rest is history! or going to be!!

 

The Future

We really think we have a great idea here, and based on feedback, others seem to like the concept as well. We are not wanting to create this app to get rich and brag to all our friends as we come to school wearing Prada shoes and Gucci hand bags, rather this is about our future education. All proceeds, after the app is created and any other promotional funds are paid out, will go into an educational savings account for us. The only way we get access to the cash is to continue with our schooling. School can be expensive, and not all of us has the means to pay for higher education...Words can not explain what this could do for us and our family.
story_txt:
Our Idea
We are your personal fashion consultant, your wardrobe guru, your unique fashion statement. We have developed a way to organize your closet in such a way that you will never be stuck with wondering what to wear or resorting to dressing in the same old boring attire day after predictable day. 


Welcome to "The clothesline"

A quick, convenient, and unique way to assemble your existing clothes and create new looks by mixing and matching the different items in your closet. Even better, you can share your closet with your friends who might just be looking for that extra flare they are missing from their next night out or special occasion. A good friend, is a friend that shares.
The app is simple. 
1) First you take a picture of all of your existing clothes...yes, we know, this can be daunting and time consuming, but it will be worth it in the end we promise, so get that out of your head! 
2) Once all of your clothes are entered into the app, you separate them into their separate categories (Tops, Shorts, Dresses etc..) You can also separate them into different occasions, for example; formal wear, casual, concert, sports etc. 
3) Once everything is entered the fun begins! with a press of a button, you will never be wearing the same outfits over and over again. Essentially, your boring days are behind you. 
Our unique app will mix and match your clothes so you can continue to be the talk of the town with your unique flare and style. Furthermore, once your clothes are entered in the app, you can share them with your friends! They will have access to your closet where they can see if you have that shirt that will "just go perfect" with her skirt...etc. 
Not only will you save time in the morning by not spending countless minutes wondering what to wear, but your friends will also appreciate not having migraines and continuously chanting "I have nothing to wear!" followed by tear drops and regrets. Stop having tears, stop having regrets and stop wasting time! 

This app was made for you, it is you...with a funky twist.   

 
Who We Are? 
We are two incredibly talented, blazingly intelligent and unbearably cute grade 8 students from Sir John A MacDonald Public School in London Ontario. Our names are Tiffany Birkner (The bubbly dancer) and Sierra Bryson (The sarcastic straight shooter). Together with Francis Yanga (Red Square Labs), our stellar app creator and the support of our super awesome teacher Mr. Jones we feel we have something with will be beneficial to girls and women from every demographic, age and station in life! Yes, some boys may need this, not to count you out fellas!



 
OUR APP WAS FEATURED IN THE METRO NEWS:





The Story So Far
Our super awesome teacher Mr. Jones gave us a persuasive writing assignment that is based around the TV show Dragons Den (for you Canadian and British investors) and Shark Tank (for you American investors). Essentially, we were tasked to create next latest and greatest new invention, and then persuasively sell our idea to a panel of local community members. Pretty awesome eh! We had to create a business plan, an advertising and marketing plan, as well as a prototype. Leading up to the final project we were asked to form groups brainstorm as many ideas as we could that are unique, realistic and would be beneficial to others. This is where "The Clothesline" was born! 
We were thinking about getting up in the morning earlier then we would like just to pick out clothes to wear for the day (I mean we have to look good right!?), and how much we would love to spend that extra time still in bed, or watching breakfast television...yes we said it. We asked some of our classmates and they thought the idea was great, but lets face it, are they really gonna tell us our idea was terrible? So we took it to the streets, well the mall, and asked over 100 random people what they thought of our idea? Everyone loved it! Then came the prototype...dun dun dun...how can we, 13 year old girls create a fashion app that will change the way millions of women will dress everyday? Mr. Jones said, "why don't you just pick up the phone and call a smart phone app developer?". We hate it when he is right! so we did, and we met Francis, and well, as they say, the rest is history! or going to be!!
 
The Future
We really think we have a great idea here, and based on feedback, others seem to like the concept as well. We are not wanting to create this app to get rich and brag to all our friends as we come to school wearing Prada shoes and Gucci hand bags, rather this is about our future education. All proceeds, after the app is created and any other promotional funds are paid out, will go into an educational savings account for us. The only way we get access to the cash is to continue with our schooling. School can be expensive, and not all of us has the means to pay for higher education...Words can not explain what this could do for us and our family.

story:
The World of HUG - Help Us Give!

The World of HUG was founded to create high quality children’s apparel. HUG stands for Help Us Give. As passionate as we are about what we do, we are even more passionate about why we do it. 

Through our One For All campaign we vow, that for every garment sold we will give out at least one to a child in need, this allows us to sustainably Dress The World one child at a time. 

We are in the business of giving and we are relentlessly looking to transform lives and spread hope to those that need it the most. Help Us Give! 

Why we need your support

Help Us Give = One for All

What comes first? As our collection is under way, we have decided to focus our efforts in building “The HUG Line” one garment at a time. Developing three items to launch our Indiegogo Campaign. These items are our Hugsie, Hugster Cover-all and the Hug Dress-all. Dressing Infants from NB (new born) to 24M (months).

Garment Production - Your donations and support will play a crucial part in the creation of this beautiful business concept. As we are in negotiation with our suppliers, we are in the need of this capital injection to process our first garment order.

The World of HUG Mission - Our mission is to create the first entity truly focused in much more than profit margins. Through our high quality children's apparel line HUG; we simply look to dress the children of the world.

What happens after Indiegogo - Our goal is to grow our HUG Line into a full Infant and children’s apparel collection but it does not end there. Many surprises are to be expected from an entity that will strive in being a trendsetter for others in corporate America to follow.

You can also help by:

The Power of U - There is no HUG without U. You are the engine that moves our marketing. So go ahead and spread the word, tweet about us, like us on Facebook, pin one of our Pinterest pictures or simply add a beautiful image on Instagram and helps us give.

The Power of Purchase or Choice- When you support brands that prove to be invested in their consumer’s wellbeing at a personal level, you support change in our world.

Our Story

The World of HUG was an inspiration of its founder Juan M Pimentel in search of creating the first entity solely focused on profit to maintain the growth of its charity and what we call giving margins.

The World of HUG located in Miami, FL was later founded by three individuals looking to make a difference in our future generation and set our footprint in the corporate world.

Our company looks to focus on giving as we have focused on profit margins in the past. While profit margins are important to keep us in business, our concept sustains our mission and helps thousands receive a product they need and cannot afford.

After coming together and experiencing the blessing of helping ninety-five children in different areas of Miami, FL we look to expand this venture and grow our concept into a new greater level. 

Our Product

Our exclusive infant apparel line is made with love and care in Colombia.

Our "Boy Hugster" made out of 100% Cotton Mesh.

Our "Girl Husie Dress-all" also made out of 100% Cotton Mesh.

Our "Signature Girl Hugsie" made with 100% Cotton Jersey. 

Under Construction.

Our "Signature Boy Hugsie" made with 100% Cotton Jersey.

Under Construction.

"As passionate as we are about what we do, we are even more passionate about why we do it"- The World of HUG.

On Mother's Day (May 12, 2013), The World of HUG visited Leisure City, FL to give the mothers of South Dade Center and their children an unforgettable Mother's Day. The day was full of surprises with raffles, gifts, and games. For The World of HUG this was a day to remember and just the beginning of our journey to change our world. 50 children were dressed that day.

On May 23, 2013 The World of HUG partnered with the Art Reach Program and donated clothing to children of Broward County, FL at the Young At Art Museum. The day was a great one full of smiles, hope, joy and gratitude. 45 children were dressed that day.

story:
Hello, my name is Mallory Muddiman.  I am a fashion designer and business owner. Growing up my mom sewed all the time, and I began to sew by helping her with projects.  I was hooked immediately.  To pursue this passion for creating clothing I attended the University of Cincinnati DAAP for my bachelors in fashion design.  I quickly learned I had a strong voice & a unique outlook on fashion.  My senior collection even won the Macy’s Rising Star Award.

After graduating I partnered up with the most talented person I know, my mom.  Together we started a company to share my vision with the world.  We launched online at ShopMallory.com in Oct. 2013 to sell our bags & accessories.  Since, we've launched 2 full clothing collections.  We are in love with making long lasting, yet sassy and unique fashion pieces for girls who make their own luck!  Mallory isn’t just a clothing line, it is a company that provides a positive, intelligent, unique brand for women.  A brand that will make more of an impact the more we grow.

Mallory is at the stage where our sales are picking up, our blog following is growing, and we’re receiving more attention.  So far my mom and I make all Mallory pieces in house, and all funding has come from my personal money.  We are unable to grow unless we are able to dedicate sewing time to things like marketing and branding.  To have this time we need to have our goods manufactured for us.  This is why we’re asking for your help.  So we can have capital to grow into the next phase of our business.

If we meet our $5,000 goal we’ll be able to:

·  Pay for our spring collection to be factory produced in America

·  Pay for a production manager who will oversee the process for us

·  Have our production manager will take care of making sure production meets our high standards and is on time

·  Focus on growth, marketing, branding, and sales instead of sewing

If we exceed our goal, we would love to:

·  Expand our advertising

·  Make more units of our items than we can make on our own.  This means wholesale will be possible!

·  Start attending trade shows so we find wholesale customers

·  Make more styles and expand our product offerings per season

·  Use more custom print fabrics

·  Buy a new computer (we currently have an old 2008 Mac Book Pro)

·  Rent/buy a larger, more functional studio

If we don’t quite reach our goal we will still put the donations to good use!  We will use it to fund a partially outsourced line with the rest made in-house.  We may also use it to improve our studio and websites.

Perks:  We appreciate your support and all of the Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter sharing you can do!  We have some perks for you as well as our gratitude!

·  $10 - Receive a sticker pack and handwritten thank you note

·  $15 - Receive a print of a fashion illustration drawn by Mallory, a sticker pack, and a hand written thank you note

·  $25 - Receive an item from our Spring 13 Collection.  Also receive a fashion illustration print, a sticker pack, and a hand written thank you note

·  $50 - Receive early access to buy our Spring 14 Collection with 20% off.  Also receive a fashion illustration print, sticker pack, and hand written thank you note

·  $100 - Receive early access to buy our Spring 14 Collection with 20% off AND a Spring 13 Collection item. Also receive a fashion illustration print, a sticker pack, and a hand written thank you note

·  $500 - Receive 2 items from our Spring 14 Collection.  Also receive a 20% off coupon code, a fashion illustration print, sticker pack, and handwritten thank you note

·  $1000 - Receive 5 items from our Spring 14 Collection.  Also receive a 20% off coupon code, a fashion illustration print, sticker pack, and handwritten thank you note

·  $2000 - Collaborate with Mallory on a cocktail/day dress or skirt designed just for you. Also receive a 20% off coupon code, a fashion illustration print, sticker pack, and handwritten thank you note

·  $3000 - Collaborate with Mallory on a cocktail/day dress or skirt designed just for you AND receive an illustration by Mallory of your custom piece.  Also receive a 25% off coupon code, sticker pack, and handwritten thank you note.

Of course we understand not everyone can financially contribute.  We can still use your help!  Feel free to share our campaign as well as our products and store with your friends, family, and acquaintances.  We are so thankful for every little bit of help!

story:
What makes oombrella unique is its notification services that alert you before it rains and if you leave your umbrella behind.







If you are a media: we have a press kit :)




When it's forecast to rain outside soon, oombrella will send an alert to your smartphone EXACTLY WHERE you are and PRECISELY WHEN you need 

The service is based on our existing platform: wezzoo. A social and real-time weather service: We give a voice to the people so they can share the weather they are experiencing. oombrella users will do the same but seamlessly: Each oombrella will collect data and share it with the community to make hyperlocal weather data more accurate. 


 
Your smartphone will kindly notify you when you stray away (30/50m - 100/130ft) from the oombrella. Never leave it behind at the restaurant or anywhere else. 


The umbrella canopy is made with our finest shiny material. The result is a strong and beautiful canopy optimized to have the smoothest noise under the rain and the coolest bright effects. Furthermore, it's UV resistant and windproof!

We thought about everyone and decided to make three versions of the oombrella canopy. The Shiny, the Black Edition and the White Edition.

Whether you are enjoying the sun or standing under a hailstorm, oombrella will cover you properly and make you look forward to rain.

You can choose between 2 sizes:

  • "classic" that is 95cm long (3.1 feet) with a curved handle
  • "fit-in-my-bag" that is 25 cm long (0.82 feet) with a straight handle

Same services, same color options. Only the size is different!


With its kevlar-made ribs, oombrella can withstand the high winds that often come with heavy rain. Or storms. Or hailstorms. Or snowstorms. Or ...


The oombrella handle is also well thought out. The injected plastic ensures that the oombrella is waterproof. The capsule (see below), located at the end ensures a more comfortable, ergonomic and discrete grip.

There's an electronic capsule at the end of it, where the magic happens!


We have also integrated a buzzer and a light inside the capsule. Thanks to it you can be alerted on the go if you have an incoming call on your smartphone or a notification that you could miss otherwise.

We have other ideas for the buzzer and the light. If you too have ideas, let us know, we would be happy to hear them and see if we can integrate them in our firmware.


There's a screw thread on the top of oombrella. Now we let you re-imagine your oombrella by customizing it!

You can screw a camera, a GoPro, whatever you want that gets a screwing device.
Maybe not the golf club we demoed in our video though ;-)


You can turn every umbrella into a connected one thanks to the "capsule".

It will perform the same functions (weather alert, forget-me-not alert, weather station) and will be attached to your umbrella on the handle be it a curved or a straight one.

The way to attach it onto your umbrella will either be a scratch or glue, depending on your feedback.


Everything happens on the handle of the oombrella and more precisely inside the "capsule".

The capsule is the brain of oombrella. This is where it feels, where it thinks and where it does the magic! With its range of sensors, oombrella is well-informed about:

  • how cold it is outside (temperature sensor), 
  • how high the pressure is (pressure sensor), 
  • how humid the air is (humidity sensor), 
  • and if you are on the dark side (light sensor).


This collection of sensors talks to your smartphone thanks to the Bluetooth Low Energy technology.


The app works in notification mode as shown before. But, if you enable the option, we can also track your usage of the oombrella by:

  • accessing all the stats of your last trip with your oombrella (duration, weather conditions, temperature and humidity you were exposed to),
  • browsing your global usage statistic history (number of days used, times used, weather history, ...)
  • seeing all the other oombrella community members in your neighborhood
  • discovering the last position of your oombrella when you took it with you

The features will be integrated into our existing app, wezzoo (ios/android)


oombrella is the result of teamwork. From the design to the electronic via the software, every single team member has had a part in developing the product we are proud to show you. And because everyone on the team has had their say, the product is the result of everybody's contributions:


The designers, Escabo design studio are fascinated by product design. They love to touch things and comment on it as if each material was a source of inspiration! They were picky about finding the right materials for the oombrella and this is thanks to them that we have the finest of product today.


The electronic Capsule has been thought and designed by EXOTIC SYSTEMS. The team is gathered around Guillaume, Julien and Laurent. They are really involved in turning quickly good ideas of connected objects into simple and robust electronic systems, ready for industrialization. EXOTIC created both a small and smart electronic. They have a sharp eye for detail and resulted in a great electronic device for the capsule. Here is the brain.



The software, data, product and communication team is the biggest part of the oombrella team. From left to right: There is Félix (iOS/Android developer), Serhii (Java killer), Michaël (CTO), Clément (CEO), Komlavi (SQL ninja), Maxime (Project manager) and Guillaume (Community manager). Everybody has a role in this project. 

If you are in Paris and want to meet with us or see the oombrella, drop us a line : clement@oombrella.me


We need your support! Otherwise, our effort would have been vain ;-) 

We really want to create the smarter and the most beautiful umbrella ever seen. We need you to begin the manufacturing part. We are so excited about the launching and we believe that with your collaboration we can make the dream come true. We need you!







Pourquoi ne pas rendre la pluie fun ??
Il faut avouer qu'on oublie son parapluie justement quand on en a besoin !! Pas fun !
Quel sentiment désagréable que de penser à son parapluie bien au sec chez soi alors qu'on se fait rincer par la pluie...

Ce qui rend oombrella unique est justement son service de notification qui vous alerte quand vous en avez vraiment besoin : avant la pluie et si vous l'oubliez quelque part.

oombrella est avant tout un parapluie ! Donc il vous protège de la pluie et résiste également au vent fort avec ses baleines résistantes.

Il s'adapte à vos attentes. En terme de couleur d'abord ou vous pouvez choisir le modèle Shiny ou opter pour un très élégant White Edition ou un plus classique mais revisité Black Edition. Vous pouvez choisir également la taille : format classic ou format pliable de poche.

Pour les fans de météo, vous pourrez également avoir un suivi de vos activités et suivre la météo que vous avez eu pendant que vous êtiez dehors. Comment ? Grace aux différents capteurs présents dans la poignée : température, pression, humidité, luminosité. Nous utilisons toutes ces données pour créer les notifications "Emmène-moi avec toi, il va pleuvoir dans 15 minutes".

Au fait, une dernière chose ! Il y a un pas de vis universel en haut de l'oombrella. Parfait pour accrocher votre GoPro et voir le monde de haut pendant qu'il pleut.


ombrella vous tient au courant des conditions météo EXACTEMENT là où vous êtes et PRECISEMENT quand vous en avez besoin.

Le service est basé sur notre plateforme existante : wezzoo. Un service de météo communautaire et temps réel. Nous donnons la parole à tous pour partager leur météo.

Les utilisateurs d'oombrella feront de même mais sans rien faire ! En effet, chaque oombrella collecte des données et les partage avec la communauté pour réaliser des alertes hyperlocales encore plus fines.


oombrella n'est pas un parapluie jetable. Il est à vous et vous ne vous en séparerez pas. Ne le perdez plus au restaurant ou ailleurs.

Avec oombrella, vous entrez dans la communauté wezzoo. Dès que vous ouvrez le plus intelligent des parapluies, vous partagez la météo avec les autres membres et permettez aux autres de ne pas se faire mouiller ! Vous donnez un peu pour recevoir beaucoup. On espère que l'idée vous plaira ;-)

The umbrella canopy is made with our finest shiny material. The result is a strong and beautiful canopy optimized to have the smoothest noise under the rain and the coolest bright effects. Furthermore, it's UV resistant and windproof!
We thought about everyone and decided to make three versions of the oombrella canopy. The Shiny, the Black Edition and the White Edition.


Whether you are enjoying the sun or standing under a hailstorm, oombrella will cover you properly and make you look forward to rain.



You can choose between 2 sizes:



"classic" that is 95cm long (3.1 feet) with a curved handle


"fit-in-my-bag" that is 25 cm long (0.82 feet) with a straight handle



Same services, same color options. Only the size is different!


With its kevlar-made ribs, oombrella can withstand the high winds that often come with heavy rain. Or storms. Or hailstorms. Or snowstorms. Or ...




The oombrella handle is also well thought out. The injected plastic ensures that the oombrella is waterproof. The capsule (see below), located at the end ensures a more comfortable, ergonomic and discrete grip.



There's an electronic capsule at the end of it, where the magic happens!



We have also integrated a buzzer and a light inside the capsule. Thanks to it you can be alerted on the go if you have an incoming call on your smartphone or a notification that you could miss otherwise.
We have other ideas for the buzzer and the light. If you too have ideas, let us know, we would be happy to hear them and see if we can integrate them in our firmware.



There's a screw thread on the top of oombrella. Now we let you re-imagine your oombrella by customizing it!
You can screw a camera, a GoPro, whatever you want that gets a screwing device.Maybe not the golf club we demoed in our video though ;-)



You can turn every umbrella into a connected one thanks to the "capsule".
It will perform the same functions (weather alert, forget-me-not alert, weather station) and will be attached to your umbrella on the handle be it a curved or a straight one.
The way to attach it onto your umbrella will either be a scratch or glue, depending on your feedback.











 

Everything happens on the handle of the oombrella and more precisely inside the "capsule".


The capsule is the brain of oombrella. This is where it feels, where it thinks and where it does the magic! With its range of sensors, oombrella is well-informed about:


how cold it is outside (temperature sensor), 


how high the pressure is (pressure sensor), 


how humid the air is (humidity sensor), 


and if you are on the dark side (light sensor).





This collection of sensors talks to your smartphone thanks to the Bluetooth Low Energy technology.







The app works in notification mode as shown before. But, if you enable the option, we can also track your usage of the oombrella by:



accessing all the stats of your last trip with your oombrella (duration, weather conditions, temperature and humidity you were exposed to),


browsing your global usage statistic history (number of days used, times used, weather history, ...)


seeing all the other oombrella community members in your neighborhood


discovering the last position of your oombrella when you took it with you





The features will be integrated into our existing app, wezzoo (ios/android)


oombrella is the result of teamwork. From the design to the electronic via the software, every single team member has had a part in developing the product we are proud to show you. And because everyone on the team has had their say, the product is the result of everybody's contributions:

The designers, Escabo design studio are fascinated by product design. They love to touch things and comment on it as if each material was a source of inspiration! They were picky about finding the right materials for the oombrella and this is thanks to them that we have the finest of product today.


The electronic Capsule has been thought and designed by EXOTIC SYSTEMS. The team is gathered around Guillaume, Julien and Laurent. They are really involved in turning quickly good ideas of connected objects into simple and robust electronic systems, ready for industrialization. EXOTIC created both a small and smart electronic. They have a sharp eye for detail and resulted in a great electronic device for the capsule. Here is the brain.



The software, data, product and communication team is the biggest part of the oombrella team. From left to right: There is Félix (iOS/Android developer), Serhii (Java killer), Michaël (CTO), Clément (CEO), Komlavi (SQL ninja), Maxime (Project manager) and Guillaume (Community manager). Everybody has a role in this project. 

If you are in Paris and want to meet with us or see the oombrella, drop us a line : clement@oombrella.me



We need your support! Otherwise, our effort would have been vain ;-) 
We really want to create the smarter and the most beautiful umbrella ever seen. We need you to begin the manufacturing part. We are so excited about the launching and we believe that with your collaboration we can make the dream come true. We need you!


















Pourquoi ne pas rendre la pluie fun ??Il faut avouer qu'on oublie son parapluie justement quand on en a besoin !! Pas fun !Quel sentiment désagréable que de penser à son parapluie bien au sec chez soi alors qu'on se fait rincer par la pluie...
Ce qui rend oombrella unique est justement son service de notification qui vous alerte quand vous en avez vraiment besoin : avant la pluie et si vous l'oubliez quelque part.
oombrella est avant tout un parapluie ! Donc il vous protège de la pluie et résiste également au vent fort avec ses baleines résistantes.
Il s'adapte à vos attentes. En terme de couleur d'abord ou vous pouvez choisir le modèle Shiny ou opter pour un très élégant White Edition ou un plus classique mais revisité Black Edition. Vous pouvez choisir également la taille : format classic ou format pliable de poche.
Pour les fans de météo, vous pourrez également avoir un suivi de vos activités et suivre la météo que vous avez eu pendant que vous êtiez dehors. Comment ? Grace aux différents capteurs présents dans la poignée : température, pression, humidité, luminosité. Nous utilisons toutes ces données pour créer les notifications "Emmène-moi avec toi, il va pleuvoir dans 15 minutes".
Au fait, une dernière chose ! Il y a un pas de vis universel en haut de l'oombrella. Parfait pour accrocher votre GoPro et voir le monde de haut pendant qu'il pleut.

ombrella vous tient au courant des conditions météo EXACTEMENT là où vous êtes et PRECISEMENT quand vous en avez besoin.




Le service est basé sur notre plateforme existante : wezzoo. Un service de météo communautaire et temps réel. Nous donnons la parole à tous pour partager leur météo.
Les utilisateurs d'oombrella feront de même mais sans rien faire ! En effet, chaque oombrella collecte des données et les partage avec la communauté pour réaliser des alertes hyperlocales encore plus fines.




oombrella n'est pas un parapluie jetable. Il est à vous et vous ne vous en séparerez pas. Ne le perdez plus au restaurant ou ailleurs.


Avec oombrella, vous entrez dans la communauté wezzoo. Dès que vous ouvrez le plus intelligent des parapluies, vous partagez la météo avec les autres membres et permettez aux autres de ne pas se faire mouiller ! Vous donnez un peu pour recevoir beaucoup. On espère que l'idée vous plaira ;-)

story:
Why are we running the campaign?


100% LOCAL MANUFACTURING

Keeping manufacturing local allows us to support the city where we are from, as well as, ensure that we are inspecting every piece for individual quality.


HANDMADE

Every bag is handmade using the finest raw materials. The artisan quality and effort that goes into every monte & coe bag is unrivalled for luggage in our price range. Our expert craftsmen use classic techniques that are rarely seen in modern manufacturing to ensure the quality of each handmade piece is second to none.


SMALL BATCH SIZES

Due to the handmade nature of every piece, we design and manufacture our bags in small batch sizes to maintain their integrity, unique design and personality.




Craftsmanship and Raw Materials


FULL GRAIN VEGETABLE TANNED LEATHER

At monte & coe, we choose to use full grain vegetable tanned leather because of the quality and sustainability that it promotes. Vegetable tanning is an ancient method that uses tannin, a plant extract, to improve durability and provide colour. It is the most eco-friendly tanning process currently available and is 100% chemical free, unlike the modern method of chrome tanning. Only 10% of the leather used in the world is vegetable tanned. Vegetable tanning is a much longer process but we strongly believe that quality takes time and it is well worth the wait.


Using vegetable tanned leather provides benefits that are essential to every monte & coe. All of our bags are handmade in small batch sizes to ensure that each bag is meticulously crafted and unique. Our goal is to make every monte & coe, as unique as you are. Using vegetable tanned leather allows us to do this. As you use your monte & coe, the vegetable tanned leather will uniquely age with you. Exposure to sunlight, heat, and moisture will cause the vegetable tanned leather to develop a patina, providing you with a beautiful depth of colour. After years of wear, your monte & coe will truly be one of a kind.


PREMIUM ITALIAN WOOL FELT

Premium Italian wool felt is a natural, versatile material suitable for all seasons. To find our wool felt we scoured the best mills throughout Italy. All of our wool is of premium quality. Our designs contrast the character of full grain vegetable tanned leather with the softer feel of wool felt. It will add an unexpected flare to the everyday struggle.


Wool felt provides every monte & coe with unparalleled durability that can withstand every season. As an anecdote, think of the exterior of your monte & coe as a premium, designer peacoat. Your peacoat maintains its shape and quality for years throughout the most adverse weather conditions. Our Italian wool felt will stand the test of time and will maintain its durability and quality for years to come.


OUR QUALITY IS WHAT SETS US APART. QUALITY IS WHAT WE DEMAND.


We are confident our products will not only satisfy your style needs, but will provide pleasure in knowing your bag is 100% Canadian made from the best textiles available. Craftsmanship and design are our primary focus. Each piece is handmade in Toronto, in limited batch sizes, to ensure that it represents an unparalleled dedication to originality and versatility.  



PERKS


DUFFLE

Black - Sahara // Grey - Revelstoke 

 Blue - Bond // Camo - Westpoint

$299 Secret launch
$349 Indiegogo
$489 Regular


- 100% handcrafted in Toronto, Canada

- Two top handles, detachable adjustable leather shoulder strap, Italian brass hardware and YKK zippers, double zipper closure, two exterior pockets with leather trim, one large interior pocket with zipper closure

- Length: 48cm (19")

- Width: 20.5cm (8”)

- Height: 25.5cm (10")

- Care: Spot clean

- Black premium wool felt

- Full grain vegetable tanned leather - black

- Premium black denim stripe

- Desert camo water resistant polyester interior (*interior will differ from picture; please see the interior of the Sahara briefcase and dopp kit)

- Heather grey premium wool felt

- Full grain vegetable tanned leather - chestnut

- Red tartan plaid cotton stripe and interior


- Navy blue wool felt

- Full grain vegetable tanned leather - cognac

- Multi-coloured ribbon stripe (Stripe colour will vary)

-Orange microsuede interior


- Camo cotton canvas

- Full grain vegetable tanned leather - cognac

- Yellow microsuede interior


BRIEFCASE

Black - Sahara // Grey - Revelstoke

$199 Secret launch
$249 Indiegogo
$349 Regular


- 100% handcrafted in Toronto, Canada

- Two top handles, detachable adjustable leather shoulder strap, Italian brass hardware and YKK zippers, double zipper closure, single exterior pockets with button closure, one large interior pocket with zipper closure, one leather smartphone pocket (iPhone 6 Plus and Galaxy Note), and one leather tablet pocket (iPad)

- Length: 39.5cm (15.5")

- Width: 6.5cm (2.5”)

- Height: 28cm (11")

- Care: Spot clean


- Black premium wool felt

- Full grain vegetable tanned leather - black

- Premium black denim stripe

- Desert camo water resistant polyester interior


- Heather grey premium wool felt

- Full grain vegetable tanned leather - chestnut

- Red tartan plaid cotton stripe and interior



DOPP KIT

Black - Sahara // Grey - Revelstoke

$89 Secret launch
$99 Indiegogo
$129 Regular


- 100% handcrafted in Toronto, Canada

- Three leather feet on the base, single YKK zipper closure, single interior pocket with zipper closure


- Length: 20.5cm (8")

- Width: 11.5cm (4.5”)

- Height: 10cm (4")

- Care: Spot clean

- Black premium wool felt

- Full grain vegetable tanned leather - black

- Desert camo water resistant polyester interior


- Heather grey premium wool felt

- Full grain vegetable tanned leather - chestnut

- Fire engine red nylon interior


SAHARA

The Sahara is one of the largest deserts in the world, covering most of North Africa and of similar size to the United States. Although the land covered by the Sahara is ever expanding, only two million people inhabit the area. Think about that: over 300 million Americans live within the same sized borders.



REVELSTOKE

For decades, helicopter and cat skiers from around the world have flocked to Revelstoke, British Columbia, attracted to its perfect powder, varied alpine terrain and quaint mountain community. Revelstoke boasts the most vertical lift-accessed terrain in North America at 1,713 m (5,620 ft). Revelstoke Mountain Resort is also the only resort in the world to offer lift, cat, heli and backcountry skiing from one village base.


BOND

Bond Street is a major shopping destination in the West End of London that, historically, was best known for art dealers and antique shops. Many of the shops are now occupied by high-end fashion boutiques making it one of the most posh shopping destinations in the world. Presence on the strip is regarded as de rigueur for any brand wishing to proclaim the highest international standing.


WESTPOINT

The United States Military Academy at West Point is one of the most prestigious academic and military institutions in the world. Admission to Westpoint is one of the most competitive processes among these institutions. Once accepted, cadets must adhere to the Cadet Honor Code: "A cadet will not lie, cheat, steal, or tolerate those who do."




When will you get your products?


CAMPAIGN FULFILLMENT


We will ship items by September 30, 2015. Each batch will have a unique shipping schedule. We welcome you to email us at info@monteandcoe.com, if you have special requests.



Who are we?

Born and raised in Toronto, Matt Montemurro, Andrew Coelho, Ron Scarafile, and Nicholas Wiktorczyk collaborated to create monte & coe. Our partnership is a reflection of our individuality and differing backgrounds, but is solidified around a shared appreciation of fashion and personal style. Our brand is founded on one guiding principle: create high quality products that foster personal expression and practicality. We believe each piece should reflect your unique sense of style. Embrace a new perspective on traditional apparel.


Our goal is simple: Wherever you are and wherever you're going, #carryuswithyou.

  


FAQ


INTERNATIONAL SHIPPING


We provide free shipping to all orders in Canada and the United States. For international shipping, please include our $50 CAD international shipping perk to your order.


DUTY / VAT CHARGES


If you live outside Canada or the United States, you will be responsible for any applicable duty / VAT charges.


CUSTOMS


Some countries customs policies can be more time consuming than others, please note that unexpected delays may occur.

story:
My Little Photographer's First Camera

 

Help Your Child See the World Differently with an Adorable Camera-Pet

 

Why GeekPapa Kid Camera?

Today, technology battles for our children's attention.

That's why it's our responsibility to empower children with the tools they need to express their creativity and explore their environment. Photography is a wonderful way to help kids challenge the way they see the world, and to look at life through a different lens.

We cannot wait to hear of all the photographic adventures your child has with their first camera!

 

All-in-one 8 million pixels of photography and videography

Whether they want to keep their shooting simple or take it up a notch (like using the "triple shot" or new aesthetic styles!), they will be able to record and share their wildest dreams with others.

It's the ultimate way to cultivate imagination and innovation while providing them with endless hours of entertainment!

 

Empower your Child to Give Their Work a Special Finish with the Creative Editing Studio!

 

With 20 original stickers and cartoon frames, your child can make their fantasies into reality.

Tap-to-toggle backgrounds transport your child wherever they want to go! Dreaming of being a cute frog, bear, or rabbit? Just click the shutter! In the Creative Editing Studio, kids can express themselves independently like never before.

 

Selfie-Timer for Fabulous Smiling Photos!

Now you can achieve the same wide-angle look as selfie-sticks and tripods without any extra equipment. With 3 Selfie Timer Modes--2, 5, and 10 seconds--your child can set up the perfect shot. All they have to do is select the feature in the Settings Menu, and then click the shutter button. In love with your selfie-stick or tripod? Pair your equipment with the Selfie-Timer for even better pictures.

 

Get Creative with Four Unique Lens Filters

Empower your child to say more with their work! They can show off their flair for creativity with four dramatic lens filters: the classic black and white, retro blue, thrilling neon, and retro green.

Charge Anywhere with a Universal USB Charger

With a build-in battery with 1100 mAh and a memory capacity of more than 2,000 photos and 2.5 hours of video, the fun never has to stop!

Whether you are on the road, in the car, or at home, powering up is always a breeze. 

Only the Safest Environmentally-Friendly Materials

The health of your child and the Earth are our top priority.  That's why all of our cameras' components are manufacturers who pledge to to maintain the highest levels of safety, non-toxicity, non-contamination, and environmental-friendliness.

Charming Pet-Themed Protective Cases

Which pet will your child choose? With an adorable cartoon case, your child's camera will not only be protected--it'll be transformed into a show-stopping, adorable accessory. Each case is soft to the touch and built to last.

 

GeekPapa Kid Camera Color

GeekPapa Kid Camera Specifications

  •  Display:  2" IPS Screen
  • Functions: Photography, videography, multiple shots, format, playback, lens filters
  • Photography Resolution: 3264 x 2448 pixels
  • Videography Resolution: 1920 x 1080 pixels
  • Battery Capacity: 1100 mAh
  • Charging Period: About 3 hours
  • Battery Life: >2000 continuous pictures; >2.5 hours of continuous video
  • Internal Storage : 16G/32G
  • Product Dimensions: 7.5 x 4.5 x 2.5 cm
  • Product Weight: 65 g

 

Timeline

 

 

About GeekPapa

 

Geekpapa is an infant product brand striving to transform a parent's love into a tangible asset. Together, we integrate research, development, production, and sales to make products that embody a parent's love and ensures the health and safety of babies everywhere.

Over the years, Geekpapa has become a household name for millions of families worldwide.

We are committed to our vision of making and creating high-quality infant products for travel, toys, and health. To date, we have created more than 20 products for kids aged 0 to 8 years old and remain committed to delivering safer, more caring, and worry-free products to the babies of each papa and mama.

 

Why Crowdfunding?

 

A child's imagination is a beautiful thing. We want to empower kids to dream up a brand new world and discover new perspectives however we can.

It's something we've been striving to accomplish ourselves and we finally came across a way to do it. We believe this camera enables parents to connect with their child on a deeper level, while encouraging children to explore and think differently. 

We were inspired by the accessible photography available through smartphones, but wanted to create something simpler, distraction-free, durable, affordable--and that could be a child's very own toy! A simple camera allows children to express themselves and share the way they see the world. We hope that mamas and papas everywhere will be as excited as we are about this project.

Charging Period: About 3 hours

Battery Life: >2000 continuous pictures; >2.5 hours of continuous video

Internal Storage : 16G/32G

Product Dimensions: 7.5 x 4.5 x 2.5 cm

Product Weight: 65 g
 Timeline  About GeekPapa Geekpapa is an infant product brand striving to transform a parent's love into a tangible asset. Together, we integrate research, development, production, and sales to make products that embody a parent's love and ensures the health and safety of babies everywhere.Over the years, Geekpapa has become a household name for millions of families worldwide.We are committed to our vision of making and creating high-quality infant products for travel, toys, and health. To date, we have created more than 20 products for kids aged 0 to 8 years old and remain committed to delivering safer, more caring, and worry-free products to the babies of each papa and mama. Why Crowdfunding? A child's imagination is a beautiful thing. We want to empower kids to dream up a brand new world and discover new perspectives however we can.It's something we've been striving to accomplish ourselves and we finally came across a way to do it. We believe this camera enables parents to connect with their child on a deeper level, while encouraging children to explore and think differently. We were inspired by the accessible photography available through smartphones, but wanted to create something simpler, distraction-free, durable, affordable--and that could be a child's very own toy! A simple camera allows children to express themselves and share the way they see the world. We hope that mamas and papas everywhere will be as excited as we are about this project.

story:
WWW.CRAFT-WALLET.COM

 

 

 

We're shipping!

 

 

The Craft Wallet 2.0 is a super-slim RFID Blocking wallet, with lifetime warranty, ready to hold 1-6 cards. The wallet also comes with an optional leather pocket and an optional money clip.

After launching the first version of Craft Wallet in a successful crowdfunding campaign back in early 2016, we spent the next 1,5 years working on the feedback provided by our backers and improving the design of our product.

The result is the Craft Wallet 2.0.

Quick Card Access at a click of a button

That simple. Carry one, two, three, four, five or six cards. It doesn't matter. It's always easy to change their position while in the wallet.

 

RFID Blocking

Don't be afraid of walking around with your wallet in your pocket. With Craft Wallet, wireless theft is something of the past.

 

Leather Pocket (optional)

With the optional leather pocket, your Craft Wallet is ready to carry cards, notes, coins and everything you carried in your old wallet.

 

Money Clip (optional)

With the optional money clip, you can carry your notes in style.

 

Lifetime Warranty

All our wallets come with lifetime warranty. Why? 
The new Craft Wallet is the result of 2 years of working with the best materials in the market. This wallet is ready to stand the test of time.

 

Lose the Bulk

The Craft Wallet is able to carry what you need for your daily life. No need to walk around with a bulky wallet. 
Have more respect for your pocket.

 

Designed for your front and back pocket

A wallet made with the best materials human ingenuity has ever produced, combined in an elegant, yet affordable way.

Because amazing quality doesn't have to cost you an arm and a leg.

 

 

Refer your friends and get your Craft Wallet for free!

 

Get your friends to support this crowdfunding and get a free Craft Wallet of a color of your choosing.

10 referrals = Free Craft Wallet Essential

12 referrals = Free Craft Wallet Clip

15 referrals = Free Craft Wallet Leather

If you have already purchased a Craft Wallet and get your friends to support us, we'll give you back your money. How does it work?

Get your tracking link on the top of the page

Share it with your friends. Every time they buy a Craft Wallet you'll get closer to your goal.  We'll notify you when you refer enough people!

Learn more about it here

 

Our Story

After the success of our first crowdfunding campaign back in early 2016, we spent the next 1.5 years working on improving the design of the Craft Wallet and the processes that allowed us to deliver every single wallet. The result is a wallet better in every way when compared to its predecessor.

- Better user experience;

- Able to carry coins;

- Improved design eliminating screws and elastics from the wallet;

- Cleaner design;

- Smaller and lighter, yet with the same capacity;

- Spring activated for better efficiency and user experience.

With this new crowdfunding campaign, we aim to keep moving towards our objective of building the perfect wallet. Our journey has been going on for some time now and we've learned from the mistakes we made along the way. The new Craft Wallet has been built taking into account those very same mistakes.

We're based in Lisbon and ready to change the world.

 


The Team's Message


 

 

Production

In order to deliver all the wallets in time, we decided to move production from China to Portugal and acquired a CNC Machine to produce them ourselves. This means that production will start in November (one month before the end of the campaign) allowing us to keep the deadline and a better quality control throughout the whole production process.

 

 

Frequently Asked Questions

 

  • How many cards can the Craft Wallet hold?

Craft Wallet's aluminum body can hold 1-6 cards. With the leather pocket add-on, the wallet can hold another 4 cards, raising the maximum number to 10.

 

  • Can the Craft Wallet carry coins?

Yes, it can, but only with the leather pocket add-on.

 

  • Which models are available for purchase?

There are three models which come in different colors. The first model is the Craft Wallet without the money clip, known as Essential, which comes in Silver and in Black. The second model is the Craft Wallet with the money clip, known as Essential with Money Clip, which also comes in Silver and in Black. The third model is the Craft Wallet with the leather pocket, simply known as Leather. The leather pocket comes in Black, Brown, Camel, Dark Blue and Bordeaux.

 

  • How does the RFID block works?

Craft Wallet is entirely made of aluminum, which blocks RFID waves, thanks to its electromagnetic shielding properties.

 

  • Why lifetime warranty?

We believe in the everlasting quality of the product we built. The new Craft Wallet is the result of almost 2 years of working on the feedback we've been receiving regarding the first Craft Wallet. We're giving lifetime warranty because we know this is a product you can trust and if something happens to it, it'll be replaced automatically.

 

  • When do we expect all the wallets to be delivered?

Despite this being our second crowdfunding on Indiegogo, thus having experience in delivering a product, we know problems can happen along the way, making it hard to set a precise date for delivery. With this in mind, we expect to deliver all the wallets two months after the end of the campaign.

story:
FAQ (Frequently Asked Questions)

Why should I buy the HEAD Prestige watch on Indiegogo? You can enjoy Indiegogo's discounted price. Most importantly, this is a limited edition watch so it could be your only chance to get the watch.

Is it safe to contribute? Indiegogo is 100% safe and have been funding since 2008. They have raised over 950million with crowfunding projects to date. All of the payments go through a secured payment gateway via a credit merchant. 

Are the watches water resistant? The watches are resistant to 10ATM so you can use the watches while you swim (not diving).

Which racket can I get? There is a perk with 1 HEAD watch + 1 racket. The racket is a HEAD Prestige MP racket and it comes unstrung because usually players choose their strings separately.

What is the size of the watch? The watch case is 44 mm. The bracelet is big and can fit any wrist. Please provide your wrist total length information on the order notes and we will adjust the lenght accordingly. Extra links from the original bracelet will be included in your shipping. 

What will be the delivery times? We are ready to go to the next step, the manufacturing process. The watches will be ready in February 2018 to be shipped to you.

How much does shipping cost? Shipping is free worldwide!

Duty/VAT charges? They are included worldwide!

Is the HEAD Prestige watch covered by warranty? 2 years warranty is included over any malfunctioning due to fabric defects.
