Is it safe to contribute? Indiegogo is 100% safe and have been funding since 2008. They have raised over 950million with crowfunding projects to date. All of the payments go through a secured payment gateway via a credit merchant. 
Are the watches water resistant? The watches are resistant to 10ATM so you can use the watches while you swim (not diving).
Which racket can I get? There is a perk with 1 HEAD watch + 1 racket. The racket is a HEAD Prestige MP racket and it comes unstrung because usually players choose their strings separately.
What is the size of the watch? The watch case is 44 mm. The bracelet is big and can fit any wrist. Please provide your wrist total length information on the order notes and we will adjust the lenght accordingly. Extra links from the original bracelet will be included in your shipping. 
What will be the delivery times? We are ready to go to the next step, the manufacturing process. The watches will be ready in February 2018 to be shipped to you.
How much does shipping cost? Shipping is free worldwide!
Duty/VAT charges? They are included worldwide!
Is the HEAD Prestige watch covered by warranty? 2 years warranty is included over any malfunctioning due to fabric defects.

story:
Thank you for your support!

 

We’ve now shipped 8,500+ Soundbrenner Core and Core Steels to 8,000+ musicians in over 100 countries around the world. Amazing!  

Check it out and get yours today at www.soundbrenner.com or at your local music store. If you have any questions DM us on social or send us an email on support@soundbrenner.com. 

While you’re at it, get the #1 metronome app, “The Metronome by Soundbrenner” today. It’s available for both iOS and Android. Head to www.soundbrenner.com/themetronome and download it for free today. 

 

Take your practice & performance to the next level

The Soundbrenner Core combines the accuracy of professional music tools with the convenience of wearable technology. Seamlessly integrated with a watch, you will always have your tools with you, whether you’re practicing at home, recording in the studio, or even performing on stage. The Core reimagines what modern-day music tools can do for your musical development.

 

4 Tools | Superior in Every Way

Vibrating Metronome - Free Your Ears, Feel The Beat

  

 

Decibel Meter - Be Aware. Know Your Sound Levels

 

 

Watch - Stay Connected With Your Daily Life

 

Made for the modern musician

With the Soundbrenner Core, you’ll always be ready to make it count, be it practice or performance. The Core is a tool that gets out of the way instead of in the way. 

The pros love it!

 

See 5 amazing artists react to the Soundbrenner Core

 
 

The press loves Soundbrenner 

Here's what you get:

 

Choose between two premium models

The Core comes in two premium models, both carrying two distinctively different looks but hold the same tools and features. The Core, made of high-quality polycarbonate and aluminum, and the Core Steel in the material most favored by traditional watchmakers; stainless steel and leather.

 

Soundbrenner Core

 

Soundbrenner Core Steel

 

A full lineup of new and exciting accessories 

 

We're also launching a brand new line of accessories so you can wear the Core the way you want. With a wide array of interchangeable watch straps, you can now easily switch up your style. Choose between the midnight black silicone, the colored woven nylon bands or the premium Italian leather strap.

Practice, Performance or Everyday Life

Being a watch as well as your most essential music tools, the Core will be with you at all times. It will have you covered for all situations, be it practice, performance or just everyday life.

 

Control all your tools from your wrist

 

The Soundbrenner Core in short: 

 

 

Read More About Our Tools In Detail

 

VIBRATING METRONOME

The Core features our world-class vibrating metronome loved by professional musicians all around the world. Get rid of the intrusive click metronome and feel the beat. Through the capacitive touch sensor, you can just tap the beat and/or customize your BPM, time signatures, subdivisions and more.

Become one with the beat and internalize your rhythm through the super powerful vibrations. Free your ears and get rid of your audio click.

The one-size fit most body strap, included in every package, lets you position the Core on your arm, leg, chest, and shoulder. Feel the beat where it suits you the best.

 

Connect the entire band and play tighter than ever before through our Multi-Sync feature. Connect up to five devices or ten through Ableton Link.

Control the most versatile metronome from the convenience of your wrist. Tap your BPM, set subdivisions, accents, time signatures and more.

Make music practice part of your everyday life and practice on the go with our new rhythm coach. The Core will start with your selected beat, go silent and it's up to you to continue tapping along until you receive your final score.

Perfect for recording, editing, producing and live performances! (Beta version only)

Create songs and setlists in the Soundbrenner app and play them back on your Core. Easy to do and immediately accessible with a few simple taps. With a future update we will even add the option to switch through songs directly on your Core!

MAGNETIC TWIST TUNER

The Core features a chromatic contact tuner that attaches to your instrument’s tuning pegs via its magnetic port (guitar, bass guitar, violin, and ukelele). A built-in Piezo mic detects micro-vibrations from the strings and guides the user to the correct note.

Just simply twist it off counterclockwise, attach it to the tuning pegs of your guitar and have yourself a reliable and accurate tuning for the best sound.

 

The Core delivers top precision and accurate tuning when you need it. Tune your guitar, bass guitar, ukulele, and violin.  

The Core allows you to tune in every situation through our built-in Piezo Mic. No matter how loud, or dark, you'll never have to worry that your instrument is out of tune.

DECIBEL METER

Take care of your most important music tool; your ears. Musicians are four times more likely to suffer from hearing damage. Enjoy music responsibly and knowingly with The Core. The Core will stay vigilant and listen for you, adding an extra layer of defense in making sure that you can enjoy music forever.

The Soundbrenner Core adds a second line of defense. The first step to protecting your ears is awareness; let the Core listen for you.

 

The Core will alert you and make you aware of when you surpass decibel levels that might be harmful to your hearing.

 

 WATCH

Being both your everyday watch and your most essential music tools, you’ll be able to bring all of these at the convenience of your wrist.

 With up to 3 days of battery life, you can check the time, set alarms, get push notifications and never be late for any gig or rehearsals.

With over 5 different watch straps to choose from, you can easily switch to the strap to match your style.

 

THE METRONOME BY SOUNDBRENNER

The Core seamlessly integrates to Soundbrenner’s metronome app, giving musicians greater ability for advanced customizations. The app is used by over 320,000 musicians every month and ranked as the highest rated metronome app for both iOS and Android.

 

Specifications

Timeline

Global shipping

We’ve tried our very best to keep shipping rates as low as possible and these are based on which country you live in. The rates for each country becomes visible when you choose a reward (top, right-hand side) and then select the desired country to where you want the units shipped. For simplicity, we’ll keep the rates the same, no matter the number of units you pre-order.

Please notice that Soundbrenner’s Kickstarter shipping rates include import duties, VAT and/or other taxes for shipments to US and EU countries only. Other countries may be subject to local import duties.

Our Story

At Soundbrenner we’re looking to solve the universal problems of musicians, by applying design, technology, and human ingenuity. We combine hardware and software into integrated solutions that offer a beautiful user experience. Solutions that are not gadgets or toys, but music tools designed for all musicians who are serious about improving. 

Our first product was the Soundbrenner Pulse, a smart vibrating metronome that allows you to literally feel the beat. It works hand in hand with our metronome mobile app, that is already loved by millions of musicians around the world. 

Our second, The Soundbrenner Core, has been co-developed with our community of engaged musicians, amateurs and professionals alike. We firmly believe success is earned and not given, so we celebrate those musicians who are on the journey to musical greatness, and we inspire musicians to reach for it. 

We're Soundbrenner and we bring technology, great design and inspiration to every musician on the planet, to help them master their craft.

Connect with us




Thank You!

Soundbrenner is a company founded by musicians, for musicians. Without the support from our community and fellow musicians, we wouldn’t be where we are today. Since our inception our community has been fundamental to our road forward; we solve their problems through design, technology, and human ingenuity. 

Your feedback is our fuel so thank you for that, thank you for raising your voice and allowing our products to help you master your craft.

story:
Ferro AGL- Above Ground Level

Limited Edition Swiss Made Watches, with Swiss Movements inspired by 1940's Aviation. Luxury watches Made for any Budget,

Ferro AGL Watches are Featuring:
-Automatic Chronograph Valjoux 7750 Elabore (Decorated).
-Quartz Chronograph With Ronda  5040 B,
-Automatic 3 hands with ETA 2824-2 Elabore (Decorated).

Breaking News!

We are now introducing a 3rd model with Swiss Valjoux 7750 Movement. One of the best Swiss Automatic Chronograph Movements of history used by top Swiss Watch Brands that retail up to $6000 and even higher with some top brands.
 
 

Inspired by Vintage Aircraft, Ferro & Co. designed 3 distinctive styles of Pilot Watches that reflect the aesthetics of 1940's Aviation World.

We named these series AGL, which means Above Ground Level that is used in Aviation World.

 

Hands on review by Tristano from Urban Gentry. Watch Expert

Introducing Ferro AGL (Above Ground Level) Pilot Watches

 
Ferro AGL Watches come in  3 Movements:
 

 

 

 

THE COLLECTION

Swiss Quartz Movement (Ronda 5040B) Collection:

 

Super Double Domed Thick Scratch Proof Sapphire Crystal (for both Quartz or  Automatic series)

A bold & sophisticated movement with Chronograph and Big Date

 

 

               

 

 

 

 

FEATURES AND FUNCTIONS

 

 

 

 

 

                                       

Swiss Automatic Movement (ETA 2824-2) Collection:

The 25 jewel ETA 2824-2 decorated movement will keep your time accurate for a very long time. This is one of the most popular movement and is widely used in Swiss Brand Watches due to it's reliability and accuracy.
 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 Automatic PVD Rose Gold Series

 

 

Swiss Automatic Chronograph Series (Valjoux 7750)

 

Limited Edition

To make these watches even more exclusive, every Ferro AGL model / color will be limited to 500 pieces only guaranteeing that your watch will not be mass produced.

 

Here is how the watches look like with the Stretch Goal Zulu Straps. 

Design:

For the past year we have been working together with our Swiss Watch suppliers to  design and develop prototypes several times until the watches came to perfection.

 

Partnering with watch manufacturers in Switzerland with over half century of experience in watch making, we are very confident that our new Swiss Made Ferro Watches will surpass everyone's expectations. 

Our suppliers have been producing high end Swiss Timepieces for top brands that retail from $2000 to $5000. 

The Movements

 A work horse movement that never stops. Featuring Chronograph & Big Date

 

The 25 jewel ETA 2824-2 decorated movement will keep your time  accurate for a very long time. 

 

The 25 jewel Valjoux 7750 Chronograph decorated movement has been used widely by top Swiss Brands.

The Case

Ferro Watches are made from 316L stainless steel cases, offering high strength, durability and longevity as well as  great visual appearance due to its fine brushed finish.

The 42 MM wide case makes Ferro AGL watches fit perfectly on any wrist size for both men and women. 

ETA 2824-2 & Ronda Quartz Model Cases are 11 MM high, Valjoux 7750 Models Cases are 13.5 MM high.

 

The Straps

We have sourced the best materials to make extremely comfortable straps for these watches. Made with Italian genuine leather, the hand stitched straps will be on your wrists for years to come. 

The Dial

Reading time with Ferro Watches is easy. The numbers  on the dial are topped with strong luminescent coating so you can easily read the time in the dark.

 Top right is the Quartz Dial and the left is the Automatic Dial

Sapphire Crystal

Both Quartz and Automatic models will include thick double domed scratch proof Sapphire Crystal.

 

Sapphire is the most expensive glass crystal material and the most scratch resistant. It is a very hard, transparent material made of crystallizing aluminum oxide at very high temperatures.

 

Why Double Domed? The arch on both sides of the Sapphire Crystal  makes it better able to dissipate the forces of impact, and once treated with an inner A/R coating it looks like a quality lens.  The dial really "pops" sharp and clear.

Packaging

Made in Switzerland!

 

 For the past 3 years we have been working with watch experts around the globe to bring the Ferro Watches to life. With 3 successful Kickstarter campaigns under our belt, we have now managed to meet with our new Swiss Watch Manufacturer partners at Basel World (Switzerland) to discuss the production of our very first Ferro Swiss Made Watches.

 
 

How to make a Pledge

To make a pledge, make sure you're first logged in to your Indiegogo account. Once logged in, just click the green “Back This Project” button on top right of this page (next to the Video window). Or simply hover over any of the Pledges on the right side of the page, and the pledge will turn green once highlighted so you can click and then follow   the screen.

 

Next, select the reward you'd like to receive and your pledge amount will automatically populate. If you select a reward that involves shipping, you'll be prompted to include this additional amount in your pledge. 

After selecting "Continue," you'll move on to confirm your payment details. If you've backed a project before and saved your payment method details, you can use them over again you'll have the option to select that payment method. If not, you'll need to enter the information manually. 

Lastly, click the “Pledge" button and you’ll be all set! You should receive a confirmation email within moments of completing your pledge.

Here is how you save:

Top Swiss Brands charge premium prices not only for their brand names, but also for the high costs associated with selling through retail.

We do it the opposite. By eliminating distributors, wholesalers and retailers, we are able to offer these time pieces directly to you at accessible prices. All the costs margins that the middlemen  add to theirs prices will be eliminated; hence savings to our backers.

 

 

 

 

The Plan

As the final design / tech drawings , prototyping and testing phases have been successfully accomplished, we are finally confident and ready to manufacture the watches for our backers. We have the manufacturer and other part suppliers ready to make the watches with our green signal. All we need is your support. In order to bring Ferro AGL watches to your wrists, we need to meet our factory's minimum order quantity requirement; and this will only be possible with your support. By making a pledge, you will secure a high quality Ferro Swiss Made Watch at a special Indiegogo price.

Reserving Your Watch:

You can reserve your first Ferro Watch Swiss Made production batch, by making a pledge. Simply click on the green button that states "back this project" and follow the screen.

Be a part of Ferro Watches First Swiss Production Batch. Make a change and make it possible to bring this campaign to life.

Thank You

Thank you all for taking your time to view this project . We hope that you are as passionate as we are about Ferro watches and make your pledge in order to receive your super awesome unique watch(es).  

 

 Share:

Help us to help you. Spread the love with your friends and family. The more your share, the more chances to reach all the stretch goals, thus more free upgrades for all. Simply click the buttons below:

Luxury watches Made for any Budget,Ferro AGL Watches are Featuring:-Automatic Chronograph Valjoux 7750 Elabore (Decorated).-Quartz Chronograph With Ronda  5040 B,-Automatic 3 hands with ETA 2824-2 Elabore (Decorated).Breaking News!We are now introducing a 3rd model with Swiss Valjoux 7750 Movement. One of the best Swiss Automatic Chronograph Movements of history used by top Swiss Watch Brands that retail up to $6000 and even higher with some top brands.  Inspired by Vintage Aircraft, Ferro & Co. designed 3 distinctive styles of Pilot Watches that reflect the aesthetics of 1940's Aviation World.We named these series AGL, which means Above Ground Level that is used in Aviation World.  Hands on review by Tristano from Urban Gentry. story:
Wear my Art

Hello, my name is Alisa, I'm 15, and I have a dream: I want to become a fashion designer. I drew since my childhood. I was a student at a prestigious British school Bedales. Now I'm studying art at the Royal Drawing Club.

Привет, меня зовут  Алиса, мне 15,  и у меня есть мечта: я хочу стать дизайнером одежды. Я рисую с самого детства,  у  меня есть начальная художественная подготовка.  Я была стипендиатом престижной британской школы Bedales. Сейчас я учусь в Royal Drawing Club.

I would really like to get to a summer course at an Art Academy in Florence. The school has Russian teachers who give the knowledge of anatomy and classical drawing which I need to start on my path to become a designer. I am inspired by works of Leonardo da Vinci. One of my favorite books is an album of his graphic works. I dream of visiting places where this great master lived and worked.

Я бы очень хотела попасть на летний курс в Art Academy  во Флоренции.  В школе преподают русские учителя, которые дают знания анатомии и  классического рисунка, необходимые мне, чтобы стать настоящим дизайнером. Кроме того, меня очень вдохновляет творчество  Леонардо да Винчи, моей настольной книгой является альбом его графических работ. Я мечтаю побывать в тех местах, где жил и творил этот великий мастер.
 
I started this company to study art in Florence.

Эту компанию я начала для того чтобы поехать учиться во Флоренцию.

Do you remember how your professional development began, how difficult it was at the beginning of the journey? Probably at that time there were people who supported and helped, those who believed in you at the start. Today I ask you to believe in me and help me make the first steps towards realizing my dream and to collect money for a trip to Florence. To cover all the costs associated with training, I need £ 6,000.

Вы помните, как начиналось ваше профессиональное становление, как трудно было в начале пути?  Наверное, в это время находились люди, которые поддерживали и помогали, те, кто поверил в вас на старте. Cегодня я прошу вас так же поверить в меня и помочь мне сделать первый шаг к осуществлению мечты: собрать деньги на поездку во Флоренцию. Для того чтобы покрыть все расходы,  связанные с обучением, нужно £ 6000.

Dreaming of Florence, I do not sit by idly: I constantly draw, I develop my sketches and models. Today I am proud to present you my first design work: a silk scarf with print in orange-blue tones.

Мечтая о Флоренции, я не сижу, сложа руки: я постоянно рисую, разрабатываю свои эскизы и модели. И сегодня я с гордостью представляю вам мою первую дизайнерскую работу: шелковый платок с принтом в оранжево-синих тонах.

I have made my first wearable piece to be an atlas silk scarf. It will be made in a luxury accessories factory and be a classic 70x70cm size. 

There are two halves to this scarf; the warm, orange toned sky and the cool, wave filled sea.

This scarf is made to be personal. It’s not your average scrunch-it-up-and-go scarf, you can do much more than that. With the aid of the two opposite sides, you can create multiple looks that can fit any occasion and become a statement piece. Due to its universal size, 70 by 70cm, it can be worn on any part of the body and folded in any way. It doesn’t even have to be used as a scarf, but as anything you want!

Платок выполнен на натуральном шелке в классическом размере 70х70 см. Он создан специально для того чтобы подчеркнуть индивидуальность  его обладателя. В зависимости от настроения, костюма и ситуации его можно носить на «холодную» или «теплую» сторону, повязывать как классический шейный платок, бандану или косынку.

My intention with this piece is to make it as personal for you as it is to me. I want you to be able to influence how it’s seen and expressed and be able to feel many things whilst wearing my design.

Based on you suggestions, there will be an affordable version of the scarf made of a mix material – 30% silk, 70% cotton – which looks and feels remarkably close to atlas silk, but yet is very affordable.

У меня есть пробная партия из 25 шелковых платков, которые можно купить прямо сейчас. Также на мои работы можно сделать предзаказ. Платок выпускается в двух вариациях: классической  -- на смешанной ткани (30% шелка и 70% хлопка) и премиальной -- на натуральном атласном шелке.

When I become a famous designer, I will pass this on, helping those who, like me today, need support in pursuit of their creative ideas.

Когда я стану известным дизайнером, я передам эту «эстафету» дальше, помогая тем, кто так же, как я сегодня,  нуждается в поддержке и деятельном участии.

This is a big challenge for me, so I need your help to turn my art into great things for you to wear.  All you need to do is… Wear my Art! 

Buy my scarf! Flaunt it! And don’t forget to check my Instagram and Facebook. The designs that get most likes are the ones I’ll be developing next! 

Все, что вам нужно сделать, это ... Носить мое Искусство!
Купи мой шарф! Выставляй напоказ! И не забудьте проверять мои Instagram и Facebook. Идеи, которые получают большинство симпатий, я буду разрабатывать дальше!

The Impact

I also believe strongly in giving back, so for every scarf sold I am going to donate 10% to a charity which once helped me, when I desperately needed support in funding my education. The charity is called Tsukanov Family Foundation – they help talented but disadvantaged children to get more specialised education. They work with individuals rather than other organizations, which is a rarity.  http://opencharities.org/charities/1148772

Other Ways You Can Help

Please share my page on your Facebook, Instagram, Twitter or any other social media you use :)

I will be happy to receive any support. And so that you don’t get bored, I came up with some amazing rewards for you.

Я буду рада любой поддержке. А чтобы вам не было скучно, мы придумали для вас несколько потрясающих вознаграждений.

story:
ÁIGI was started in 2017 by three watch enthusiasts from Norway.

Since then we have sold thousands of quality battery-powered (quartz) watches.

We have now spent over a year on the development of the ÁIGI automatic dive watches.

We're not going to lie, like a lot of other watch brands, we have found inspiration in some of the most iconic dive watches ever made. But we've also added our details and "ÁIGI-fied" the design through our own vision of what a great dive watch should look like.  And as in all our previous designs, these watches also have a continuous inspiration from Scandinavian nature and minimalism.

But what really stands out most about this project is the quality you get on the watch compared to what you pay for it. An unbeatable price for a high-quality automatic dive watch.

Our profits on these watches are minimal, so why are we doing this? This is a branding stunt on our part. We want to show that we can create high-quality automatic watches and get them out to you watch lovers. This way we can get a foothold in a new segment, which will benefit us in the longer term. So enjoy the best deal ever.

Arctic Ocean

 Northern Lights

  •  Seiko  NH35A automatic movement. 24 jewels, 21.600 bph, date, hacking seconds.
  •  Size: Ø 43MM (not including the crown), thickness: 11MM, lug to lug: 49MM.
  •  Surgical grade 316L steel (both strap and case).
  •  Sapphire glass (scratch proof) with anti-reflective coating on the inside.
  •  Water resistant: 20 ATM / 200 meters.
  •  Swiss Super-LumiNova® BGW9 for the best long-lasting glowing effects.
  •  Bezel: Ceramic 120 click uni-directional.
  •  Strap width: 22MM.
  •  Screw down crown to provide maximum and reliable water resistance.

 

 

ÁIGI Automatic Limited Edition is available in two different colors: 

  • Northern Lights with a green sunburst dial
  • Arctic Ocean with a black wave-pattern dial

Both have white date windows. Both have a brushed finish on the case and strap. We have put a lot of thought into the buckle, so it contains the possibility of micro-adjustment of length so that it fits perfectly and comfortably on your wrist. It also contains double locks to ensure that it does not fall off. 

 

 

Northern Lights in action:

Arctic Ocean in action: 

 

 

If you haven't already decided, here are some more cool photos to convince you:

The watches will be shipped from Norway.

VAT in your country might be added.

For our Norwegian customers: Fraktbeløpet er ikke egentlig for frakt, men er momsen på klokken / The shipping fee is for the Norwegian VAT.

 

Specifications, let's first talk about the very heart of the watch - the movement.

We had some specific qualities we looked for in our dive watches:

  • It had to be automatic.
  • It had to be very affordable so that your price is not too high.
  • It had to be a "workhorse movement". A tried and true workhorse movement is made with a simple/minimalist design that does the job efficiently with as few moving parts as possible, while still being effective at maintaining a track record of being reliable and acceptably accurate.
  • It needed to have a hacking functionality (which means the second-hand stops when setting the time, allowing you to set the time more accurately). 

 

This did not leave us with a large number of choices. With a price range in mind for the finished watch, the good Swiss movements were excluded. Other movements we could have used did not have the hacking feature we wanted. Thus, the Miyota 8215 movement was not an option (Miyota is the supplier we use for all our quartz watches).

Our choice fell on Seiko's NH35A movement. A very robust movement that is reliable and acceptably accurate. It also has hacking functionality and is reasonably priced.

 

Water Resistance

When it came to the water resistance, there were no other alternatives for us than a minimum of 20 ATMs, which corresponds to the pressure in still water at a depth of 200 meters. Of course, it is possible to increase to 30 or 50 ATM, but it would only increase the price for you as a customer without really having so much practical significance for most of you.

 

Glass / Crystal

We have used a scratch-resistant sapphire glass with AR (anti-reflective) coating on all our watches. So, on our first dive watch, we had no other choice than to choose the best. On these watches we use a  scratch-resistant sapphire glass with a blue anti-reflection coating on the inside. The reason we want to have the coating on the inside is that the coating can be scratched if it is attached to the outside. It does not provide as much reflection protection when used on the inside but still does the job more than adequately.

 

The Steel

All our watches are made with quality 316L surgical-grade stainless steel for increased durability and rust resistance. It's truly made to last.

 

The Bezel

Analog diving watches will often feature a rotating bezel, that allows for easier reading of the elapsed time of under one hour from a specific point. As usual, we wanted the best that can be achieved with a reasonable price. The choice then fell on a 120-click one-way bezel. The reason that the bezel on dive watches is one-way is for safety reasons. If it could rotate both ways, you could accidentally set the bezel so that you think you have a longer time underwater than you actually have.

 

Strap and buckle

The strap is in a brushed steel finish and made of the same quality steel 316L as the watch case, see explanation under the "The Steel". For the buckle, we wanted a comfortable solution when you wear it, while also wanting a mechanism that minimizes the risk of it accidentally slipping up. The possibility of micro-adjustments of the size makes it very easy to find the correct size, making it fit perfectly on your wrist.
story_txt:
ÁIGI was started in 2017 by three watch enthusiasts from Norway.Since then we have sold thousands of quality battery-powered (quartz) watches.We have now spent over a year on the development of the ÁIGI automatic dive watches.We're not going to lie, like a lot of other watch brands, we have found inspiration in some of the most iconic dive watches ever made. But we've also added our details and "ÁIGI-fied" the design through our own vision of what a great dive watch should look like.  And as in all our previous designs, these watches also have a continuous inspiration from Scandinavian nature and minimalism.But what really stands out most about this project is the quality you get on the watch compared to what you pay for it. An unbeatable price for a high-quality automatic dive watch.Our profits on these watches are minimal, so why are we doing this? This is a branding stunt on our part. We want to show that we can create high-quality automatic watches and get them out to you watch lovers. This way we can get a foothold in a new segment, which will benefit us in the longer term. So enjoy the best deal ever.Arctic Ocean Northern Lights

 Seiko  NH35A automatic movement. 24 jewels, 21.600 bph, date, hacking seconds.
 Size: Ø 43MM (not including the crown), thickness: 11MM, lug to lug: 49MM.
 Surgical grade 316L steel (both strap and case).
 Sapphire glass (scratch proof) with anti-reflective coating on the inside.
 Water resistant: 20 ATM / 200 meters.


 Swiss Super-LumiNova® BGW9 for the best long-lasting glowing effects.
 Bezel: Ceramic 120 click uni-directional.

 Strap width: 22MM.
 Screw down crown to provide maximum and reliable water resistance.
  ÁIGI Automatic Limited Edition is available in two different colors:

Arctic Ocean with a black wave-pattern dial

story:
.............=^. .^=................................



..............................................................................................................................................


..............................................................................................................................................

Short Summary


ACCESSORIZE YOUR CAUSE FOR WOMEN AND GIRLS is a fundraising effort to establish "The Truck with a Cause", driving with a purpose to empower the lives of women worldwide. 

This truck will consist of a “cornucopia of fashion accessories”, which seek to empower women by supporting other women artisans and designers from around the world, that produce creative fashion accessories for purchase in order to improve family and local economies. Fashion accessories will include, handmade jewelry, scarves, hats and handbags. This Cause will seek to eliminate the effects of Female Oppression and increase the number of empowered women and girls internationally and further impacting communities worldwide.


“…studies found that when women [internationally] hold assets or gain incomes, family money is more likely to be spent on nutrition, medicine, and housing, and consequently children are healthier” (Half the Sky: Turning Oppression Into Opportunity For Women Worldwide” 2009).


With your help, you will empower women to continue to do what they've found value in, and thus discovered value in themselves. Many women in countries that do not find value in women, are often fighting an uphill battle to generate extra household income, and in many cases shun for attempting. Whether this violates cultural norms, or not, women are venturing out to develop their own income. GIRL POWER!!! WOMEN POWER!!! Considering the various levels of oppression women experience daily, from sex slavery, to sex trafficking, to female genital mutilation, to public humiliation and abuse, women that dare to beat these odds, SHOULD be supported at every given opportunity. Due to many micro-loan programs, many women in societies such as these are taking full advantage of these programs and are successfully caring for their families in a way they would not have ever imagined. ACCESSORIZE YOUR CAUSE FOR WOMEN AND GIRLS seeks to empower women in this way. The only difference is that women that create their products will have the opportunity to sell them internationally and gain a steady partner whose entire mission is wrapped in female empowerment, ABAM The Fashion Accessories Truck.




What We Need & What You Get

ABAM is seeking to raise a minimum of $10,000 for the purpose of purchasing and establishing the mobile accessories truck. ABAM Fashion Accessories Truck will purchase female-made accessories that fit the vision of ABAM, and sell them internationally through social media, online sales and of course The ABAM Truck with a Cause; all for the purpose of contributing back to growing economies of communities and families through the support of female entrepreneurial efforts around the globe. The fundraising goal of $10,000 is the approximate amount of funding needed to (1)purchase the truck {a used food truck}, (2)renovate the inside and outside of the truck, (3)purchase the products from the women artisans and then get this baby on the road!!! The ABAM Fashion Accessories Truck will participate in the American Association of Mobile Retailers for continued support from other experienced mobile retailers. They're a great group of women too!!!


With your one time contribution, it will become the gift that keeps on giving to ABAM and the mission at hand...but for now we have some pretty awesome goodies for your initial gift giving...a t-shirt for our gold members, an ABAM fountain pen for our platinum members and signature ABAM flip flops for our certified diamond members...more details are listed below!!!


All funds generated from this campaign will go to the establishment of the ABAM Fashion Accessories Truck- This show must go on and set to hit the road Spring 2014...look us up if you're in Los Angeles:-)



The Impact

With ABAM’s commitment to support female suppliers and artisans, market to women and engage women through various means of empowerment, ABAM Fashion Accessories truck will:


·  Ensure that 100% of new products sold are created by women and acquired through fair trade principles

·  Ensure that 10% of the profits earned are donated to non-profit organizations whose mission it to fight female oppression and support female entrepreneurship

·  Ensure ABAM Fashion Accessories Truck signature products (i.e. ABAM Flip Flops) commit a percentage of the proceeds to fighting female oppression


ABAM is committed to continuous advocacy and raising awareness of the oppression women experience worldwide. In addition, ABAM commits to ongoing contributions to innovative programs that help women advance in their entrepreneurial endeavors.


With a career in social welfare and business administration, I believe my contribution to this campaign will establish a great starting point for women that want to expand their accessories' business internationally. The ABAM fashion accessories truck will help to expose these women and their fantastic accessories throughout the Los Angeles region, and internationally through the world wide web. We will only partner with organizations that support Fair Trade importing principles, to ensure the efficacy of best business practices with these great women. Some businesses we plan to partner with include  Sharing the Dream, Beyond Beauty, Global Mamas, Seyva Handmade, and Songa Designs International.




Other Ways You Can Help


So after you make your financial contribution or until you're able to make your financial contribution, please share this campaign with your friends, partners, significant others, wives, husbands, all other family members, baby sitters, pet sitters, local farmers, colleagues, neighbors.......and anyone else you can think of :-) Send them the link and please urge them to contribute what you've contributed and even more!!!! Remember this issue is so much bigger than us, yet this is an opportunity to make a difference. Please check out the Indegogo share tools for the most efficient ways to share...Thanks so much for all your support and taking the time to read this campaign. You are the best....and with your help ABAM will be the best too!

story:
To Start Off

We are a group of passionate young adults who came together with a single dream and are now working very hard to make it come true. We are all friends from Montreal and we all share the dream to make MDC bigger than it is now. We want to make our clothing known world wide and be suited for anyone and everyone!

We started off with 5,000$ to get our website, web hosting, clothing made and shipped to us, some new equipment, and spend hours upon hours writing business plans and working to make everything as perfect as we can. As you may know 5,000$ gets you somewhere but not super far. We are lucky we even got to start with that but we wish to take it to the next level! This company will change our lives forever but not only that help the economy all around the world slowly making it a better place. We have huge goals.

We are not just another clothing store. We have unique high quality clothing and also are a social online community. We will be doing reviews on products, restaurants, clubs etc. and we will also be doing tutorials for makeup, hair, food, drinks and will also be doing vlogs to keep in touch with our followers! We have our main brand MDC but also sub brands to describe styles for example MDC Riot Essence is a punk rock grungy look. this is just one of our looks of course. It may seem like a lot but we are very organized and have this all displayed in an innovative way.

 

What We Need & What You Get

We need about 100,000$ to 160,000$ to get this fully running and perfectly set. The reason for this is because of all the expenses and trying to make this as great as we possibly can! the money will be used for the following.

  • Web hosting and domain name (high speed and top stats)
  • Storage. We wish to rent out a warehouse to hold our stock since we are starting online. It will be much easier to order a bunch of stock at once and store it and ship it out than it would be to have a small stock, get new orders, have them made, etc etc...
  • Creating, Designing, and Fabricating all the cloths.
  • Having the items shipped to us here in Canada from our factories out east. Shipping from China is not cheap especially when ordering in large amounts. We may also be having our clothing made in India and Italy
  • Advertising with Google Ads, Facebook Ads, Business Cards, And Promotions.
  • We later wish to purchase a building for our main office, studio, some storage, etc. This will help us with organization and have a proper main office for customer service, shipping and editing. We will also be doing our videos and photo shoots here. This won't be included in the amount donated here. we wish to save up from our work to put a 30,000$ down payment on the building in the future.
  • And finally the boutique. We wish to have stores all over north america and then world wide but first starting in montreal. This may come in the future after business is going well with the online site. We need to grow in order to get to our bigger goals!

 

When you donate we will thank you personally and depending on how much you donate there will be nice rewards for you since you are helping us grow.

If we do not reach our exact goal however, that will not stop us! we will keep going no matter what to make our dreams come true. What ever we make we will put all into the company and keep on pushing through! We won't let you guys down! :)

 

The Importance of MDC

As you know we only started out with 5,000$. We worked hours upon hours at minimum wage jobs saving all the money we could get until we finally reached 5,00$ and said let's start with this. We still work so hard to bring in money but our first milestone was 5,000$. So this all means so much to us through our blood sweat and tears we will never give up! there is more of an incentive involved as well. We have tried to get investors with us but no one seems willing to invest in a company that is just starting up and some people just don't have faith. That's where you guys come in and make a difference!

We wish to use our profits to make the business run as pest as it can. Help our selves from a hard life to one that is a little easier and last but not least. Help the world as best as we can. We truly wish to franchise our stores world wide creating jobs for people and helping the economy but in some places around the world we want to actually build farms and homes for people who don't have anything in their country. We truly do want to help people we always did our whole lives but never had the power to. It seems selfish but it really isn't. You can't help anyone if you can't help your self so we wish to create a company that literally is for everyone and make the world a better place one step at a time.

We already have orders coming in of 500$ and more and we are not even open yet!!! that right there shows people like what we are doing already and want to help us. We are truly unique and have real goals for us and the world. We are a legally registered company under Quebec and Canada and that was no easy task.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

So please if you can donate anything you possibly can to help us all make a change. This isn't a charity at all. This is a company of our dreams with good intentions. If you absolutely can not donate we understand but if you still want to help, share this with everyone you know and try to get them to donate! It will be worth it! Indiegogo has it's own sharing tools that help the sharing process so please go ahead and donate or share with everyone you know.

 

Thank you all so much. Let's make it happen!!

Other Ways You Can Help
So please if you can donate anything you possibly can to help us all make a change. This isn't a charity at all. This is a company of our dreams with good intentions. If you absolutely can not donate we understand but if you still want to help, share this with everyone you know and try to get them to donate! It will be worth it! Indiegogo has it's own sharing tools that help the sharing process so please go ahead and donate or share with everyone you know.

story:
The Heat Pad

Heat pads don’t need to be boring.  Ours has an attractive futuristic design on an ultra-thin polycarbonate laminate. We worked hard to perfect and tweak the design of the pads to give instant heat as well as ensuring it would be lightweight and reliable.

The heat pads are designed to be worn with the neoprene belt with lumbar cushion however if you prefer you can simply wear the pad tucked into your undergarments. Wear the Gentleheat pad inside the belt and enjoy the feeling of extra support along with the relaxing warmth of the pad.The belt also has a little pocket in which to hold the electronic controller to keep everything tidy. The rechargeable controller holds enough charge for hours of continuous use.

 

The Background

This innovation was created by Dr Andy Barr – an electronics engineer whose home is in Ireland.  After 25 years of electronic product development for other people this product represents his dream for personal success.  This product is a team effort but it is very much his “baby”.

Having been frustrated with chemical heat wraps that could not be controlled or turned off, he decided to create an affordable electronic solution.  He wanted this to be a better alternative for the many people worldwide who rely upon heat wraps on a regular basis. 

 

The Impact

This product has the potential to affect the lives of millions of people by delivering better heat therapy for a lower cost than any of the top selling brand chemical alternatives.

Why waste money on a chemical heat wrap that claims to deliver 8 hours of heat but actually spends 6 hours heating up and cooling down. 

Is it not much better to get 20 hours of continuous heat – regulated at whatever temperature you choose – and have the freedom to turn it off and save whatever is left to use the next time you need it.

Gentleheat puts you in complete control.

Gentleheat has been registered as a company in Northern Ireland where the product was designed and these new heatpads will be manufactured and sold from Northern Ireland.  We are a small company and we want to grow to benefit our local economy.

But this is a product for a global market and on our own we could never properly reach it. That is why we are excited by the enormous potential of Indiegogo to reach our supporters world-wide who can carry the message of this campaign and raise awareness of our product.

 

Get involved

If you contribute to our campaign you will be the first to receive the product and if you then use our product and send us feedback we will reward that too with free gifts and incentives. 

We want your help to not only reach the world but to give them the best product we possibly can.

 

Spread the word

Help us get the word out by sharing this campaign online and help us turn up the heat!
story_txt:
The Heat Pad
Heat pads don’t need to be boring.  Ours has an attractive futuristic design on an ultra-thin polycarbonate laminate. We worked hard to perfect and tweak the design of the pads to give instant heat as well as ensuring it would be lightweight and reliable.
The heat pads are designed to be worn with the neoprene belt with lumbar cushion however if you prefer you can simply wear the pad tucked into your undergarments. Wear the Gentleheat pad inside the belt and enjoy the feeling of extra support along with the relaxing warmth of the pad.The belt also has a little pocket in which to hold the electronic controller to keep everything tidy. The rechargeable controller holds enough charge for hours of continuous use.
 

The Background
This innovation was created by Dr Andy Barr – an electronics engineer whose home is in Ireland.  After 25 years of electronic product development for other people this product represents his dream for personal success.  This product is a team effort but it is very much his “baby”.
Having been frustrated with chemical heat wraps that could not be controlled or turned off, he decided to create an affordable electronic solution.  He wanted this to be a better alternative for the many people worldwide who rely upon heat wraps on a regular basis. 
 
The Impact
This product has the potential to affect the lives of millions of people by delivering better heat therapy for a lower cost than any of the top selling brand chemical alternatives.
Why waste money on a chemical heat wrap that claims to deliver 8 hours of heat but actually spends 6 hours heating up and cooling down. 
Is it not much better to get 20 hours of continuous heat – regulated at whatever temperature you choose – and have the freedom to turn it off and save whatever is left to use the next time you need it.
Gentleheat puts you in complete control.
Gentleheat has been registered as a company in Northern Ireland where the product was designed and these new heatpads will be manufactured and sold from Northern Ireland.  We are a small company and we want to grow to benefit our local economy.
But this is a product for a global market and on our own we could never properly reach it. That is why we are excited by the enormous potential of Indiegogo to reach our supporters world-wide who can carry the message of this campaign and raise awareness of our product.
 
Get involved
If you contribute to our campaign you will be the first to receive the product and if you then use our product and send us feedback we will reward that too with free gifts and incentives. 
We want your help to not only reach the world but to give them the best product we possibly can.
 

Spread the word
Help us get the word out by sharing this campaign online and help us turn up the heat!

story:
NOW AVAILABLE IN OUR ONLINE STORE!!!


Hi guys! Thank you for checking out our project!

A Little About Me (Susan Coffey)

I have been modeling and putting together a body of work for almost 5 years. I have worked with over 100 photographers and have reached goals in my modeling career that I never thought would happen. I am grateful for the immense support that I have received and hope to produce some unique projects/products for my fans.

 

What We're Doing

A lot of fans have asked me where they can get posters of my work. Well, now is your chance! I’d like to print up special posters for my fans so that everyone who wants one can have one. Printing isn’t cheap, so I need your help! If we reach our goal, we’ll be able to produce a LIMITED EDITION poster for my awesome supporters.

If all goes well, I’d like to release more print work for my fans. Most of my work is digital so I’d love to be able to give everyone more high quality prints. This way people who want to display my work will be able to do so and then their friends can see it too!

We need to raise enough money to print the posters. Our funding goal is basically the exact minimum amount we need to make this happen. For that reason we’re doing an all-or-nothing campaign.

IF WE DON’T REACH OUR GOAL WE CAN’T PRINT ANYTHING!

 

Poster

This is the first poster we will be releasing. If this goes well, more projects will be on their way so help us reach our goal!

*Small logos and artistic graphics may be added to the final product.


Rewards For Our Backers

We came up with a bunch of cool reward packages that will only be offered as part of this campaign so act fast! Even if you can only contribute $1, every little bit helps! Every backer will receive exclusive behind-the-scenes email updates from the poster photo shoot and other poster related activities. It will be things I won't post anywhere else!

Instax Mini Polaroids - Part of the "On The Set" package and above, a randomly selected 100% unique autographed polaroid can be yours! 

 

Every reward level below (except the Poster and Fan levels) will ONLY be offered during this campaign so DON'T MISS OUT!

*Each level includes all perks from previous levels.

Shipping 

Domestic shipping (within the USA) is included with every package. For international shipping (anywhere outside of the USA) PLEASE MANUALLY add $15 when completing your rewards package checkout. We cannot send packages internationally without this being included.

If you forget, we will contact you and you will simply need to add the perk labeled FORGOT INTERNATIONAL SHIPPING.

*International shipping is included in the Personal Video, 1-on-1 Skype and Advertiser levels.


FAQ's

Q: How do I choose my custom messages?

A: We will contact you by email at the conclusion of the campaign regarding your choices for personalized items.

Q: Why is international shipping $15?

A: Unfortunately, we cannot control what it costs to ship internationally. The price of shipping a large poster tube internationally plus the shipping materials required to do so costs us $15. We would actually lose money on international orders if we did not add this. We apologize for any inconvenience and we hope that you understand.

 

Help Us Spread The Word!

Please share this campaign anywhere you can! Post it on social media, in forums, on gaming servers or wherever else you can think of! There are share tools built right into the campaign and after you pledge there are many options for sharing there as well. Please help us out and it would mean a lot to me!

 

Contest - Share This Page And Win!

We’re also going to hold a contest for those who can help us raise the most funding. If you create a profile on Indiegogo and share our campaign with your profile code (it’s very easy to do), you’ll be able to get share points that we can track. If people back the campaign from your share, it will be credited to you. Whoever helps us raise the most funds will win an awesome and unique prize just for you!

If people back the campaign from your share, it will be credited to you. Whoever helps us raise the most funds will win an awesome and unique prize just for you!

story:
Don't settle for 'meh'. Get 'ooooh yeeeeah...' 

I'm a crafty girl who started making jewelry a very long time ago for myself. People have asked me to make pieces for them after seeing a necklace around my neck but I was never terribly excited about the styles I experimented with. I made stuff that was cute but really just 'meh'. 

One day, I came across a photograph of an expertly cut, dazzling sunstone that begged to be laid against the skin of fabulous person. It needed very little embellishment around it aside from liveliness of the woman wearing it.

From the moment I saw the glint of that gemstone, I knew just what I wanted to make: spare designs that don't guild the lily and emphasize the artistry of master gem cutters who enhance the beauty drawn from rock and stone. It's all a marvel that oftentimes gets overlooked because of all the curlycues, wrapped this- and-thats, glass, clay, and danglies. 

Now, I'm amped to get going on a clean, sparkling line of jewelry focused on simple lines, light refracted through or bouncing off amazing gems, and pops of color.  

By the way, the pieces in the photos are nothing compared to what's to come. Stay tuned, cool people. 

What's it gonna take? 

The stuff: 

  • Gem scale and testing kit
  • Magnifying glass to attach to my workstation (some of it is teeny tiny work)
  • 500 feet or more of gold vermeil (18k - 24k wire on sterling or alloy) 
  • Gold vermeil findings from Bali (closures, crimp beads, covers, etc.)
  • Gemstones from Jaipur, India (Have you seen the gorgeous gems that Indian brides wear? Wow! Just wow!)
  • Oregon Sunstone mined and cut in Oregon (a drop of Oregon Sunstone is heaven)
  • Materials for custom displays 
  • Marketing materials
  • Cool packaging 

And it'll take my crafty hand and your generous support!


But where will we find the goods? 

Your support will also help me get my website up and running, a new and improved etsy shop launched, and plans for pop-up shops and trunk shows. 

Share me with everyone! 

You can also lend me a huge hand by passing the link to my Indiegogo campaign as far and wide as possible. 

Big thanks for your consideration! :)

story:
My Story

My name is Kate Fishwick. I have been crafting jewelry for about 10 years now. It all started when I needed to do something creative as therapy after a series of hospital stays. I needed an outlet for my energy and mind.

I am bipolar and on disability. I am very good at living within my means, but there is nothing left over after bills and food for crafting supplies.

The goal for this year was to get a part time job in order to fund crafting and pay for a couple of craft shows that I want to do. I applied recently at a couple of places, but will have to turn down the offers if they come in. I have a hospital stay coming up to see if I do in fact have epilepsy, and then another to change medication around. I don't feel that I can get a part time job, yet, and then turn around and tell them "Oh by the way, I have to be gone for a month." 

For a while I sold my jewelry at craft shows and festivals, and to friends and family. Today I give my jewelry as gifts or donations. I very much love to see people wearing my goods, and the smiles it brings me is well worth everything that goes into my creations. 

Recently I wanted to add a couple of crafts to my portfolio. I want to upcycle gently used clothing into new and fantasy related creations, and add metal working into my jewelry. I would like to attend a few shows this year with some new crafts.

The Impact

Crafting keeps me busy and my mind at ease. I have been out of the crafting loop for about a year now, and am ready to get back to it. I am not looking to make it rich off of my crafts, it brings me great joy to give away or donate my goods. I do like sharing with the world though and this would also allow me to do a couple of festivals this summer.


What I Need & What You Get

My campaign goal is $500. After much research this is how much I have estimated I would need to get the supplies for metal working and used clothing for sewing. The metal working supplies will run about $300 and I figure $200 will get me a great deal of used clothing and beads for use in sewing and jewelry. If the goal is not met, what has been raised will still go toward metalworking supplies and festival fees.

Each level of donation will get you a Kate creation as my friends call them. From earrings to sets. Pictures of what is available are on my Facebook profile. These are pre-made items, but you get to pick what you want. There are some chainmail pieces left which will also be in that album entitled "Donation Perks".


Other Ways You Can Help

If any of you could share this on the social sites that would be awesome and you have my thanks in advance!

story:
There are very few things I find as completely satisfying as the feel, look and versatility of fabric. The ability to take what feels like nothing and make almost anything from it astounds me every time.  My dream is to share this with anyone and everyone who has an interest in sewing.
 
Help me fulfill this dream by taking Mauby's Sewing Patterns to print! 
 
The initial cost of taking my patterns to print will cost more than I am able to provide. With YOUR help I can not only move forward with this step but I can also achieve my dream of sharing my patterns with sewers all over the world!
 

How YOU can Help:

Right now, I have 16 digital patterns.  With your help, this money will cover the costs of converting these digital patterns to print patterns that can be sold in stores.

I have spent the last 4 years planning my sewing pattern business: Studying the market, trying out different ideas for patterns, writing tutorials and teaching private sewing lessons. 

I am ready to move on to this next phase of my business and I am prepared to succeed.  The only thing I need now is your help with the finances to begin. 

Your help will be a gigantic boost to my small and independent company!
                                                                                
In addition to my great appreciation, I have put together a list of some of my most requested handmade items that I will make just for you! Be sure to see this list of goodies and pick what you would most enjoy!
 
Even if I am unable to reach my entire goal, ANY funds I receive will help me to print as many patterns as possible and help me to reach this dream!
 

My Designs:

Here are three of my most popular sewing patterns currently available as PDF/Online versions:

         

The rest of my currently available sewing patterns and designs (including free tutorials) are available on my website: www.maubys.com

Other Ways You Can Help: SPREAD THE WORD!!!!

Sometimes it's just not possible to lend financial support and I understand.  But, you can still help me achieve this dream by spreading the word!

1. Share a Facebook Status: Support Aubrey and Mauby's Sewing Patterns going to print!  Check out her IndieGoGo page and the great perks!! http://www.indiegogo.com/maubys

     - Like my facebook page at http://www.facebook.com/Maubys

2. Share on Twitter: Help Aubrey take Mauby's Sewing Patterns to print & get some great perks for yourself! http://www.indiegogo.com/maubys

     -You can follow me on twitter at http://twitter.com/#!/Maubys

3. Share a Badge on Your Website or Blog: Put these on your blogs, websites, where ever!  There is a small one and a large one! 

Just make sure they link to: http://www.indiegogo.com/maubys

story:
Short Summary

I have a passion to create an interactive and innovative solution to the athletic shoe industry. After struggling with painful flat feet for the majority of my life, I've gone through most solutions available to make my feet feel better. I had huge, unattractive shoes and orthotics that gave me some relief when I wore them, but weren't versatile or durable. I've also had orthtics that were supposed to fit my athletic shoe collection. but sadly only fit a small amount of my shoes, leaving me to choose between foot painor unattractive shoes. I figured that I shouldn't have to choose between the two anymore; therefore, my company Ushu -a play on words that means "your shoe" -was created.

I created my company in hopes of creating a way for me to have comfort and aesthetics when it came to athletic shoes. I decided I to create a machine that individuals could step on, get an accurate reading of their foot issues, have a digital insole created and displayed on a screen, and have the option to design a shoe around the insole. The information would be sent to a major shoe distributor and the shoes would be sent to the customer. This process would find the happy medium between fashion and function. There shouldn't have to be sacrifice for wearing athletic shoes and Ushu plans to eliminate that problem. 

*With your contribution, Ushu can create an interactive website for individuals to design shoes from scratch by combining different components of existing shoes, changing colors, and adding their own artwork. This website will be the second component of the company; when individuals step on the machine, their insoles will be saved inside a database so they can design shoes at home through the website.

**If $70,000+ is collected, I will be able to do a lot more in terms of creating the machine seen in the slides video.  

What We Need & What You Get

The $39,000 I need to raise creates this interactive website. In exchange, I am offering Ushu merchandise. If I don't reach my goal, I can do other important things for my company, especially on the web end. Any contribution does help my cause. 

The Impact

The value in this idea is the innovation. I am creating a new way to buy and create shoes that will be more accurate and help individuals of all ages. Although this is a new concept, I've plenty of expertise in athletic shoes and foot anatomy. I want this machine to be seen around the world and be available for individuals to use in their nearest athletic shoe retailer. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Other than investing, please spread the word through all the internet communication vehicles. Also, use Indiegogo share tools to share this dream with anyone you know. Thank you so much for your support. 

 

HOW IT ALL WORKS 

Here's a description of how'd you use the machine.

1. Remove any footwear on your feet and step on the foot pad

2. The machine scans your feet and displays a 3D image of them on the screen; it then describes any anomalies present

3. The software creates a insole solution against the 3D image of the feet that will add comfort to the feet

4. You are able to either match the insoles to a pre-existing shoe or create a shoe from scratch around the insole

5. If you'd like to make another shoe, simply log onto your account a create one around the insole(s) in the database  

 

***UPDATE: MACHINE OFFICIALLY PATENT PENDING! :-)

story:
**Note: Surveys will be sent at the end of this campaign to collect your shipping information as well as the styles that you'd like! :)

We recently had a successful Ingiegogo campaign for these very sweet polarized bamboo sunglasses. Just enough was raised to meet our minimum order quantity. We've been attempting to raise funds for something big through launching sustainable products like our upcycled billboard wallets and these sunglasses.

The truth is that on the back end of the company, we're developing an e-learning platform for action sports and increasing general human potential. We already have video sessions recorded from professional athletes to adventure based psychotherapists on topics like how to use fear to achieve success to research based methods for increasing your happiness, efficiency, and flow. Seriously awesome stuff.

By grabbing a pair of these sunglasses at a sweet discount on here ($120 retail), you're not just getting hooked up with, what we think are, the best bang for your buck and sweetest wood sunglasses out there, but helping fund something that can change a lot of peoples lives!

So without further ado, check these out, share the page, and grab a pair!

To pre-order your sunglasses, select one of the pledge levels on the right. We will send a survey to select your color(s) of choice after the campaign has finished!

SUNGLASSES FIT FOR YOUR LIFESTYLE.

  • The Perfect Frames :: One size fits all, feather-like light weight hand made from 100% bamboo wood: a highly sustainable, eco-friendly, durable, buoyant (floats on water / water resistant) and hard material with natural anti-fungal and anti-bacterial properties. Also, according to the natural wood grains, every pair is one-of-a-kind just like you. It doesn’t get much better than that.
  • Highly Protective Lenses :: Extreme protection made from impact resistant polycarbonate lenses: 100% UVA / UVB filtering, polarized, inside anti-reflection layer, and scratch resistant layers on the front and back of the lenses for extra durability.
  • Our Guarantee :: We take pride in our work and will fix any manufacturing flaws free of charg

Made with double spring aluminum hinges and a contoured nose piece for form fitting, feather-like comfort.

Epicstoke is a US based outdoor brand that creates high quality one-of-a-kind products from sustainable and recycled materials with a mission to insure that every single product has quite the story to tell that not only fits its new owner, but lives with and elevates who you are.

If you are unfamiliar with us, we previously had a successful Kickstarter campaign  that put us on the spotlight of a few top blogs like Gear Junkie, Korduroy, Thrillist, Heavy.com, 350.org and even got us an e-mail from the Shark Tank producers to be on the show (we're still undecided;)). As well, if you're a bit unsure about how we work, please just read the comments section of our Kickstarter and then feel free to read comment sections of other Kickstarters.

Launching a startup in today's world is not an easy thing to do with the take over of brands by large corporations and people forgetting that some brands like ours is run by two dudes and this is our life. As a result, we not only really care about our products and customers, but you're getting direct access to the creators for what you pay for. We might not be as cheap, but we're real. In a society as connected as we are today, personal touch seems to get disconnected. We're here to put a personality and story behind what you purchase once again. By buying a pair of these, you're not just buying a pair of sunglasses, but helping us spread the stoke and fund the future of human potential learning.

story:
CAMPAIGN UPDATE

On February 20, 2020, we received a letter from lawyers acting on behalf of Lockheed Martin advising us that we had to cease utilising images, videos and the F-35 text on our campaign pilot watch. We have subsequently removed the F-35 text from the dial and caseback of our watches. 

It is most likely that we would be replacing this with text that is more in keeping with our P-Series watch of which this is the first. The sihouette on the caseback will be updated accordingly.

We will be updating all Backers via email of the changes. We sincerely apologise to Lockheed Martin and all our Backers.

We have temporarily suspended taking pledges until we resolve a few design issues.

Building on the success of my first Kickstarter campaign, I am are delighted to be launching my new pilot series of premium quality watches, the P-Series. 

I have always had a fascination for military styled watches. I'm sure I am not alone and that there are many who have the same interest as what I do. I've admired many watches (well, lets be honest who hasn't?). The biggest issue I've had is finding one that fits nicely into my budget, that has a decent movement, is made from quality materials and has a that distinctive military/pilot look and feel to it.

With this watch, I feel that I may just have created that little special piece that ticks the boxes for quality, affordability and military styling.

By operating exclusively online, we are able to sell these exceptional, exquisite watches directly to you at unbelievable prices.

 

IT'S MODERN With its sleek modern styling and hi-tech materials, this pilot watch draws on the best and most interesting details from the past, reinterpreting them into a modern, attractive and fresh shape.

IT'S BOLD This pilot watch design is the embodiment of our vision, to create a range of bold, yet uniquely exquisite watches which are hard wearing, affordable and reliable timepieces.

ITS ICONIC Our goal was to create a military inspired watch, but more importantly we wanted to create a watch which had a timeless appeal, an iconic timepiece which stood out amongst other products. With this pilot watch we believe that we have delivered on our goal. 

 

Crafted from titanium our case is designed to withstand 100m/300ft of water pressure featuring a screw down crown and caseback. Titanium is the go-to material in the aeronautics industry, selected for its lightness, strength, durability and resistance to corrosion. It is the perfect choice for our new watch series.

A highly legible dial and extremely robust custom case with its seductive lines and brushed finishes provides a very contemporary appearance.

 

The dial is reminiscent of an instrument panel with its clean, sleek design comprising a matte black background, contrasting large markers and numbers, smaller sub-dials and subtle branding. This combination offers precise time-telling whilst providing a sense of depth and sophistication.

Superluminova lume on the dial and hands enable excellent reading in darkness.

 

The dial indices and markers watch hands and crown logo are filled with industry-leading Superluminova luminescent pigment. Superluminova lume was chosen for its bright and long-lasting glow.

The range is available in 3 lume pigments:

  • BGW9 (blue glow),
  • C3 (green glow), and
  • Dark Orange (orange glow).

 

By utlising oversized skeletonised hour and minute hands we were able to showcase the sub-dials on the dial.  The utilitarian hands are the ideal width and length which means that their width does not allow them to get lost amongst the dial.  

By utilising custom hands we ensure that the hands extend to reach the hour, minute, and seconds markers with precision. All the hands on the dial are coated in Superluminova luminscent pigment.

 

This pilot watch features a single domed sapphire crystal with anti-reflective coating on the inside. Sapphire crystal is chosen for its brilliant clarity to maximise legibility in any light and for its exceptional scratch resistance. The anti-reflective coating ensures maximum legibility during daylight by reducing glare.

The crystal on this pilot watch is one of the standout features. Its bevelled edge sits up from the case and has a jewel-like appearance. This enhances the overall beauty of the case.

 

The caseback on this pilot watch is one of the standout features of the watch.

Its meticulously detailed with the watch specification beautifully articulated through the use of artwork which has been acid etched into the caseback.

 

The movement is arguably the most pivotal aspect of the watch. High Street / fashion branded watches lean towards quartz movements. At Duzu Watches, all our watches are powered by precision automatic movements.

We made a conscious decision to power this pilot watch with the Japanese made Miyota 9122 premium automatic movement. Miyota is synonymous for producing movements with high precision and durability.

The 26-jewel movement has a hacking-second function and power reserve of 40 hours. You have the choice of either winding manually or letting it self-wind from your wrist's kinetic motion. Having a frequency of 28800 vibrations per hour means you get a very smooth sweeping second hand that ticks eight times in a second.

Key features of this movement include the day, date and month functionality. 

 

This pilot watch has been designed to suit a range of wrist sizes. With our straps we chose a combination of Cordura and leather.

Cordura is built to last. It’s the go-to material for the military for its durability, abrasion resistance and ability to withstand extended outdoor use in extreme conditions with confidence.

Leather on the inside of the strap provides a level of sophistication and eliminates odours often associated with wearing of synthetic materials.

Each of the three pilot watch models has a different leather depending on the luminescent pigment of the selected watch. The colours of the lume and leather are as follows:

  • BGW9 Lume - Grey Leather
  • C3 Lume - Green Leather
  • Dark Orange Lume - Orange Leather

The straps are beautifully finished with double stitching and a custom titanium brushed finished signed buckle. 

 
 
 
 
 
 

ELASTIC WEBBING STRAP - If we hit this goal on Indiegogo Indemand (over-and-above the KS funds raised) we'll include one elastic webbing strap with a brushed and engraved stainless steel buckle and stainless steel hardware. 

At the end of the campaign you will receive an email confirming your colour preference. The colour options are as follows:

(E1) Beige with white pinstripe

(E2) Light Grey with black pinstripe

(E3) Light Grey with white pinstripe

(E4) Khaki Green with yellow pinstripe

(E5) Khaki Green with white pinstripe

(E6) Khaki Green with red pinstripe

(E7) Black with white pinstripe

 

 

VINTAGE LEATHER STRAP - If we hit this goal on Indiegogo Indemand (over-and-above the KS funds raised) we'll include one vintage leather strap with a brushed and engraved stainless steel buckle. 

At the end of the campaign you will receive an email confirming your colour preference. The colour options are as follows:

(L1) Dark Brown leather strap with white stitching

(L2) Black leather strap with white stitching

(L3) Red/Brown leather strap with white stitching

(L4) Black leather strap with orange stitching

(L5) Dark Brown leather strap with orange stitching

 

The watch is designed in Australia but is being manufactured in Asia. Throughout the production and quality control phases, we will keep all our backers informed as to the status via email, our Facebook page and Instagram.

Note: Manufacturing has already commenced based on the successful Kickstarter campaign. All orders placed with Indiegogo InDemand are pre-orders that will be fullfilled within the Kickstarter timeframe.

 

Each of our watches is beautifully presented in a custom watch roll with a canvas outer lining and genuine suede inner lining. Each is divided in five compartments, four being for watches and one for straps. 

Our watch rolls are beautiful and practical. Unlike conventional packaging, our watch rolls can be used as a travel case when you need to take more than one watch on a trip. The packaging will include:

  • Number of watches depending on your pledge
  • One watch roll/travel case
  • Warranty Card
  • Stretch goal straps (depending on stretch goal/s achieved)

 

Hi, I’m Wayne McCay, founder and designer of Duzu Watches. Duzu Watches is an Australian based watch design studio. 

Our core philosophy is to create watches for the Urban Warrior with a sense of adventure, tool watches that are equally at home in the boardroom, wilderness or the ocean.

Since our launch in 2017, we have been focused on bringing a range affordable high quality watches to people who ordinarily would not be able to afford them.

- Wayne

 

Every pilot watch comes with a two (2) year warranty against manufacturing material defects. We will, within twenty four (24) months from the date of purchase, repair or replace the movement of your watch free of charge if the movement proves to be defective in material or workmanship under normal use.

The warranty does not cover damage arising from normal wear, scratches, accidents or misuse, or from any alteration, service or repair performed by any party other than Duzu Watches.

 

The watch ships from Australia to anywhere worldwide. You'll need to confirm any import duties you may be required to pay with your local customs office.

All shipping includes tracking and insurance.

 

Every project has associated risks. We are not immune to these. Manufacturing any item takes a lot of work, and sometimes things do not always go according to plan, with unexpected hiccups along the way. We have gone to great lengths to mitigate as many risks as possible that are within our control with the aim of delivering the product to you within the prescribed timeframe. For this reason we have aligned ourselves with a reputable manufacturer who prides themselves on keeping their customers informed without making unrealistic promises.

We will ensure that we keep our customers up-to-date during the production process. This will be done via regular updates.

Should any delays occur along the way with regards to production, we will be as transparent as possible to ensure that our backers are fully informed.
