story:
Gela's Story

When Gela Wesh was thirteen, she discovered a fiery passion for fashion design. That was it for her: she had found her path in life, and there was no doubt in her mind that she was going to pursue it with all the vigor and force she could muster. Kurdish-born, though, she was up against daunting odds, her homeland torn apart by war. She developed into a creative and inquisitive young woman, learning the value that she took from it personally, each design a therapy session and of itself, and when she was 10, she relocated to Switzerland with her family.

 

Early in her design career, long before she had gone professional, Gela found herself drawn to feathers – symbols for beauty and freedom, both values near and dear to her heart. As she accrued technical skills and honed her ability to create, she continued to embrace feathers, and when she debuted her collection "Celebrate" in 2013, feathers were prominent in two of the dresses.

The Gela Wesh Label

Simultaneous to her first collection launch, the Gela Wesh label came into being. A label standing for high-end apparel and emblematic of all of Gela's strength, skills, and personality, the Gela Wesh label was ostensibly a product of Zurich, Switzerland, although all the locations in which Gela had grown up figured squarely into the brand messaging as well, pieces of Iraq evident in the details and in Gela's vision, the inspiration hailing from there as well.

 

Principles & Vision

Through her fashion design, Gela has dared to stand up for her principles, refusing to compromise on her vision every step of the way. She believes strongly in fashion's power to shape and direct the world, and resolving to respect this power, she has held tight to her commitment to offering unique, thoughtful, and meaningful designs, focusing on strong women like herself and doing everything that she can to breathe fresh life into haute couture. To date, several of her designs have made appearances on world-class red carpets, including at the Golden Globes, the Academy Awards, and New York Fashion Week, where she showcased eight of her designs in September 2019.

Her Artistry

Gela has used a variety of materials for her apparel, including tulle, lace, satin, and real feathers, and her work includes both ready-to-wear collections and custom-tailored designs. Time and again, it is intricacy that has defined her designs – and yet it is an intricacy that is never overbearing, even deceptively simple at a glance. Rather than mass-producing or outsourcing her work, she puts a great deal of time and energy into every one of her designs, her team crafting every piece by hand right alongside her.

 

Plans for the Future

Looking toward the future, Gela plans to bring the Gela Wesh label to fashion exhibitions in Milan and Paris and start production on a new line of dresses. She has built up a backlog of ideas, all of which she is ready to bring to life, and she is eager to introduce her designs to a wider audience and step out onto the world stage. After the positive reception with which her designs were met at the Golden Globes and the Oscars, she is ready to continue to push forward and navigate whatever challenges may arise as she builds her label up to reach its full potential.

Our Fundraising Goal

To make all this happen, of course, we could use some outside help. We are turning to you for this. Our goal through this campaign is to raise $30,000, which will cover the costs of the Paris exhibition, the Milan exhibition, and new dress production. All your contributions bring us a little closer to reaching our goal.

 

To say thanks, we are offering some limited-edition rewards, including sketches and postcards signed by Gela Wesh herself.

 

Contribute now and play an active role in foster the Gela Wesh label's long-term growth!

 

Good for the Planet

As exciting as the Gela Wesh label is on its surface, Gela believes in going beyond appearances. That is why Gela has resolved to use "waste product" feathers in our designs. These are feathers that would simply end up in a landfill otherwise, and we are proud to find a purpose for them, affording them new glory – on some of the most elegant stages in the world.

Risks & Challenges

The Gela Wesh label has been operational since 2013, and we foresee no major challenges in the near future. If any logistical issues do arise and cause a delay in our reward deliveries, we will be sure to keep all our contributors in the loop. We will also send all our contributors regular updates regarding our appearances in Paris and Milan, remaining transparent throughout this entire process. You can count on Gela Wesh and everyone here at the Gela Wesh label to follow through on our promises.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Beyond making a monetary contribution to this campaign, you can show your support for Gela Wesh by sharing a link to this campaign on Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, and any other social media platforms you use. Spread the word far and wide, letting all your friends and family know about what we are doing and what our plans are for the future. Know someone who is into repurposing materials? Someone who appreciates groundbreaking fashion design? Make sure that they are aware of the Gela Wesh label!

 

The Gela Wesh label is worn by celebrities and famous personalities throughout the world.

 

We appreciate all your support, both monetary and non-monetary, and we thank you for taking the time to read about what we are doing.

Don't forget to follow us on Instagram @gela.wesh and Facebook at facebook.com/gela-wesh!

 

Reward Sales Copy

Principles & Vision
Through her fashion design, Gela has dared to stand up for her principles, refusing to compromise on her vision every step of the way. She believes strongly in fashion's power to shape and direct the world, and resolving to respect this power, she has held tight to her commitment to offering unique, thoughtful, and meaningful designs, focusing on strong women like herself and doing everything that she can to breathe fresh life into haute couture. To date, several of her designs have made appearances on world-class red carpets, including at the Golden Globes, the Academy Awards, and New York Fashion Week, where she showcased eight of her designs in September 2019.

Her Artistry
Gela has used a variety of materials for her apparel, including tulle, lace, satin, and real feathers, and her work includes both ready-to-wear collections and custom-tailored designs. Time and again, it is intricacy that has defined her designs – and yet it is an intricacy that is never overbearing, even deceptively simple at a glance. Rather than mass-producing or outsourcing her work, she puts a great deal of time and energy into every one of her designs, her team crafting every piece by hand right alongside her.
 
Plans for the Future
Looking toward the future, Gela plans to bring the Gela Wesh label to fashion exhibitions in Milan and Paris and start production on a new line of dresses. She has built up a backlog of ideas, all of which she is ready to bring to life, and she is eager to introduce her designs to a wider audience and step out onto the world stage. After the positive reception with which her designs were met at the Golden Globes and the Oscars, she is ready to continue to push forward and navigate whatever challenges may arise as she builds her label up to reach its full potential.

Our Fundraising Goal
To make all this happen, of course, we could use some outside help. We are turning to you for this. Our goal through this campaign is to raise $30,000, which will cover the costs of the Paris exhibition, the Milan exhibition, and new dress production. All your contributions bring us a little closer to reaching our goal.
 
To say thanks, we are offering some limited-edition rewards, including sketches and postcards signed by Gela Wesh herself.
 
Contribute now and play an active role in foster the Gela Wesh label's long-term growth!
 
Good for the Planet
As exciting as the Gela Wesh label is on its surface, Gela believes in going beyond appearances. That is why Gela has resolved to use "waste product" feathers in our designs. These are feathers that would simply end up in a landfill otherwise, and we are proud to find a purpose for them, affording them new glory – on some of the most elegant stages in the world.

Risks & Challenges
The Gela Wesh label has been operational since 2013, and we foresee no major challenges in the near future. If any logistical issues do arise and cause a delay in our reward deliveries, we will be sure to keep all our contributors in the loop. We will also send all our contributors regular updates regarding our appearances in Paris and Milan, remaining transparent throughout this entire process. You can count on Gela Wesh and everyone here at the Gela Wesh label to follow through on our promises.
 
Other Ways You Can Help
Beyond making a monetary contribution to this campaign, you can show your support for Gela Wesh by sharing a link to this campaign on Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, and any other social media platforms you use. Spread the word far and wide, letting all your friends and family know about what we are doing and what our plans are for the future. Know someone who is into repurposing materials? Someone who appreciates groundbreaking fashion design? Make sure that they are aware of the Gela Wesh label!
 
The Gela Wesh label is worn by celebrities and famous personalities throughout the world.





 
We appreciate all your support, both monetary and non-monetary, and we thank you for taking the time to read about what we are doing.

Don't forget to follow us on Instagram @gela.wesh and Facebook at facebook.com/gela-wesh!
 
Reward Sales Copy

story:
As brothers, we've shared a lot growing up, including the dream of one day owning a real working Dick Tracy watch.

Not a toy or a smartwatch, but a high quality Dick Tracy watch that does three things: looks cool, tells time, and makes the call.  But, even after twenty five years of searching and waiting, it had yet to come true.  So, we made it ourselves!

 

 

 

Our design aims to capture the iconic look of the original Dick Tracy watch.

Designed by Nick Mathis (that's me!) with Autodesk's Fusion 360, the look and feel was iterated dozens of times right here in my own workshop using the Nomad 883 desktop CNC machine by Carbide3D.com and 3D printing from Shapeways.com.  The result is a blend of its iconic first comic strip appearance with the proper weight and comfort of a high quality timepiece that looks great with jeans or a suit.

 

 

This is not just a real Dick Tracy watch, it's the official one.

It wasn't enough for us to make the Dick Tracy watch real—we made it official.  By partnering with Tribune Content Agency, we developed a worldwide exclusively licensed timepiece that proudly represents the historic Dick Tracy brand.

 

 

Even Dick Tracy himself wears our watch!

The Dick Tracy team, Joe Staton and Mike Curtis, loved our 2016 model so much they drew it into the official Dick Tracy comic strip!  Now THAT'S official!

 

 

Longio Watch Company carefully crafts our design into a high quality timepiece.

Just like our popular 2016 models, the master watchmakers at Longio will continue to make the timepieces for our 2018 models with the same care and materials expected of a high quality dress watch.

 

 

Elite Manufacturing engineers and manufactures the Bluetooth speakerphone module.

Then, in 2017, we found the perfect engineering and manufacturing partner at Elite Manufacturing in Salem, NH to bring the watch to life.

Founded in 1986 by one of the originators of the SIM/SIP DRAM Module, Elite has decades of experience with designing and manufacturing microelectronic circuit assemblies right in the New Hampshire facility with their Tier 1 cutting-edge machinery. These geniuses (and Dick Tracy fans!) built an insanely compact speakerphone module that performs flawlessly with a clear sound on both ends of the call, battery life that lasts all day, and all the necessary functionality expected of a Bluetooth speakerphone wearable.

 

All the necessary details (plus a few extras) bring this historic watch to life.

Making the Dick Tracy watch real meant focusing on looking cool, telling time, and making calls.  But, we worked with our engineers to ensure our watch includes all the necessary features and specifications that make it useful and fun, too!

 

 

Choose from one of two strap lengths (regular or long) by measuring your wrist.

Want to know which strap length to choose?  Simply wrap a piece string or paper strip around your wrist, mark the intersection, then measure it on a ruler.  Likewise, you can use a flexible tape measure, if you have one.  If your wrist measures between 6.5" to 8.25", you can wear a regular.  If your wrist is 8" to 9.75", you may want to choose long.

 

 

After the success of our 2016 models, we're ready to take it to the next level.

In 2016, we made a collectible Dick Tracy timepiece to celebrate 70 years since its first comic strip appearance.  We've shipped them all over the world to hundreds of Dick Tracy watch fans just like us.  Thanks to their incredible support, we were able to fund the engineering for our 2018 models!

 

 

We need to raise $30,000 to manufacture our dream watch.

Manufacturing in low volume can make a product too expensive for the buyers and high volume manufacturing (to lower the retail price) is often too expensive for the makers.  This problem often keeps people from making great products like the Dick Tracy watch and can only be solved in two ways: hire experienced engineers to balance cost with quality (check!) and raise enough funds to manufacture in large volume (gulp!).

Backing this project makes it possible to manufacture a limited edition run of 1000 watches. Each timepiece itself will be made by Longio and all Bluetooth modules will be manufactured and assembled into the watches by Elite Manufacturing.  Once complete, Nick and Charlie will personally quality assure, polish, package, and ship each watch right to your door.

Together, if we reach our goal, we will finally make the world's first real working Dick Tracy watch!

 

 

We've got some great perks to share with you!

Partnering with the kind folks at Loot Crate, The Penman Hat Co., and artist Joe Staton, we've put together some amazing perks to thank you for your support!  Check them out in the perks section and choose your favorites!

 

 

We like to get things done on time.

And that's why we make ourselves a handy timeline.  Check out our milestone for completing Dick Tracy | The Official Watch 2018.

 

 

Our team of experienced professionals are excited to bring this watch to life.

Every successful project is a team effort and ours is no exception.  In addition to our experience with product design, project management, marketing, and shipping, our partners each add decades of experience to ensure a timely and quality completion of Dick Tracy | The Official Watch.

 

 

 

RISKS & CHALLENGES

We've got a great team to help us manage challenges and opportunities during manufacturing.

As with any hardware product, challenges and opportunities may arise during the manufacturing phase that can delay production.  If this happens, we have an incredible team to help ensure a timely and quality completion of Dick Tracy | The Official Watch LE2018.

If you have any questions or concerns, always feel free to reach out to us through this Indiegogo campaign or through our website at www.dicktracy.watch.

 

OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP

We know that some people just can't contribute, but you can still help!

Spread the word  with Indiegogo's share tools (below).

Improvise songs about it on public transit.

Tell your favorite blogs and newspapers.

Tell your friends!

story:
Trekka Designs was created with the goal to make an adventure travel gear company that is focused on great design.  Our pants combine the best of fashion and function to make the perfect all-around pant that feels amazing on the trail and look amazing on a night out.

 

We invented a high-strength neodymium magnetic button that slides apart for more comfort. When your feel pressure on your waistband in certain situation like sitting, the button slides apart or un-pops itself and but when you stand or are in a more relaxed position it automatically reconnects. Don’t worry it doesn’t come undone when hiking or walking around town.

 

Featuring only YKK zippers Only. 

Everyone wants to know that their valuables are safe in their pockets, no-one likes it when their phone slides out when sitting down, especially if your in a public place like an airplane. We wanted the functionality of cargo pants, so we placed two hidden zipper pockets directly behind the main front pockets. This keeps the weight higher on the hips, and eliminates objects swinging while you walk and since they zip closed, you can keep your fist full of Pesos or phone secure, while still using the front pockets for everyday use.

 

 

Most travel or outdoor pants go with a durable water repellent (DWR) additive and show Fancy pictures or video of Wine splashing off the clothing leaving the clothing pristine. 

While it looks amazing at first, the DWR doesn’t protect against everything and becomes ineffective after a few washes. Anything oil-based will cause stains: oil, grease, ketchup, sriracha and most sauces. We believe there is a better solution.

 

The key to the best adventure travel pant is the best material. 4-way stretch is a must, so we started there to give maximum stretch in all directions so you never feel restrained and always feel completely free.

 

We also added antimicrobial technology to these bad boys which inhibits the growth of odor producing and stain causing microorganisms. If you’re anything like our founder Nick is, and have only one pair of pants for a 6 month trip, you will want these pants to help keep the stank away. 

 

Sweat and moisture can always be an issue, whether you are hiking the trails or in a hot sticky jungles of Cambodia, no matter what you are doing we made sure this material is moisture-wicking, breathable, and quick-drying. Our moisture control technology absorbs and moves moisture away from the body, which ensures faster drying times over cotton and providing exceptional comfort.

 

Our goal is to design these pants so they can pack as light as possible. Belts can take up a ton of space, so we designed these to give you the choice to wear a belt or not. Thanks to the magnetic button the front looks clean with no conventional button showing and looking like an eyesore. However sometimes you need to make sure your pants won’t fall down. We added a drawstring on the inside of the pants that can be used if needed, but not be seen to keep these looking sharp.

Don’t worry, these threads won’t expose you unintentionally... We’ve also hidden a drawstring on the inside of the waist if you need to secure these better for any reason.

 

Just in case a magnetic button and 4-way stretch material wasn’t comfortable enough, we gusseted the crotch to get rid of any bunching and pinching when sitting down. These are designed to be as comfy as sweat pants.

 

We wanted to remove the gimmicky and clunky features most hiking pants offer, but we still have some quality in the details that adds benefits. This is why we added some silicon inside the waistband to help reduce any twisting or sagging throughout the day, as well as keep your shirt tucked in better if that is your style.

 

Hey, my name is Chris Loizeaux… I was born in Chattanooga, TN and after 15 years of living all over the US, I made my way back to Chattanooga in 2000. I grew up on road trips, camping/backpacking, skateboarding & skin diving in the FL Keys. 

I’ve spent the better part of the past 18 years as a designer & creative director for companies and in early 2015, I accidentally started a fly fishing shop here in Chattanooga, which I ran for almost 4 years of good times… Towards the end of 2018 we closed down due to some “unforeseen circumstances”, but that gave me a chance to get back to my passion of design and product development. I’ve been fortunate to explore 45 out of the 50 states and fly fish on some amazing water, with even more amazing people… 

As the product curator for my retail shop, I’ve been searching for the perfect pant for myself and my customers, and when it comes to the ones on the market, I’ve seen them all... but I’d yet to see the pair of pants that I actually wanted, until I drew them on a sketch pad with my business partner, Nick.

 

My name is Nick Rader and I love to travel, backpack and do adventure sports.  I also love buying camping gear and researching what to buy and geeking out on all the specs before trying to find the perfect piece of gear.

My first trip out of the country unsupervised was right out of high school to go snowboarding in Switzerland.  Ever since then I’ve been hooked and go as much as I can.  So far I’ve been lucky enough to bum around the world a few times and to date have been to 62 Countries, even North Korea.

In 2011 I spent 6 months driving a motorcycle from South Africa to Norway and only had 1 pair of pants.  I also had one pair of underwear, but we don’t need to get into that.  I had 62 liters worth of space and had to carry camping equipment, plus tools and spare parts for the bike.  Needless to say I didn’t get to pack lots of clothes. During that trip I pretty much had on outfit that had to be able to do everything.  It had to handle 100+ degree head, and freezing temperatures.  It had to be able to climb kilimanjaro and look awesome cutting a sick rug at the club.  The clothes I took on that trip fell short on all accounts, they were ugly as sin and not even that good from a technical aspect.

Years later I did another 6 month trip on that motorcycle with my wife in eastern Europe and the Balkans.  I did a better job packing for that one, but I still couldn't get a pair of pants or shorts that really did a great job looking good, keeping my essentials secure and being super comfortable.

However it did get me thinking that there are no good adventure travel pants on the market and someone needs to make them.  So why not us.

 

How it Started

The two of us met like most people do, completely by accident and randomness. Chris agreed to do a joint venture with a motorcycle magazine to do a fly fishing tour showing off his stores fly fishing excursions. Four guys were on the motorcycle tour and Nick happened to one of those guys who was tagging along because they had an extra bike since the leader of the magazine tour was his friend.

What was suppose to be a week of riding motorcycles and fly fishing turned into a week of drinking beers in a cabin while it rained cats and dogs all day everyday. It turns out that was the best possible outcome. After a few days of drinking beer and talking about random stuff, we started talking about gear and ended up sketching up a pair of shorts that we thought would be perfect for adventure and traveling.

When we got back from the trip we hit the ground running, and Trekka was born.

 

Risks and challenges

We’ve been in contact with our factory for the past 9 months of the development process & they’ve done work for much larger brands than ours… We are confident in all the materials we’ve sourced, the factory’s quality of work and their production timeline, once we give them the go-ahead. The unknown is element in this process is if we experience any importing delays, though we’ve done our best to mitigate any foreseeable issues - from our EPA certification to our RN number, we’re legit!

story:
Update : We are now releasing new colored bracelets every 100 Facebook shares on our campaign (up to 1,000). These colors will be chooseable at the end of the campaign

Charging cables and having a sufficiently charged phone have become essential tools in our lives, this bracelet is the solution to forgetting your charger which leaves you without juice in your devices. Not only does it look great, it is always on hand (pardon the pun) to help you out with a reliable means of charging your phone. Available for all phone types, Micro-USB, iPhone and Type-c bracelets available

Tech Brief

1. High strength, genuine leather cables with 18k gold plated ends

2. Quick charging which beats the original Apple cable. ( We have tested 1.6A with success ) while Micro-Usb we're also aiming for

3. All our products have lifetime warranty, you won't ever need to purchase another cable

4.One size fits most wrists

 

Chargelet Bracelet

A handy solution for charging your device on the go. You no longer have to worry about leaving your charging cable behind and running out of juice when you're in an emergency. 

Wearable devices are increasingly used as tools designed to track your health, but a new entrant into the category has a far more practical mission: charging your devices.

The Chargelet bracelet charging cable might just look like a stylish piece of eye candy but it has a much more practical use. A water resistant bracelet which an onlooker won't realise isn't only a fashion accessory.

The product is self explanatory, it is easy to attach to your wrist with one hand and easy to undo, while offering protection to each end of the cable so it doesn't pick up damage over time, the gold plated ends are also scratch resistant.

What we do

We at MidasGold.com are a small startup in the fashion and jewelry industry, purveyors of unique designer gold jewelry and accessories. We specialize in sourcing the latest trends in urban fashions and street culture. Now we would like to add practicality to our range of jewelry.

Our latest product requires some more investment than we're used to, we'd love to be able to bring our product out to the masses but we have a slightly obstacle in the way of that, financing. 

What separates us from other campaigns, we have the business experience meaning we already have factories, suppliers and other connections which we have had prior business with meaning there won't be any surprises or set backs, we have already created molds and samples for the products but we are here to fund the remaining costs of production, We have passed all the crucial steps in bringing this product to market such as industry design, engineering, product development and two rounds of prototyping to bring a flawless product to market.

The $5,000 will allow us to order a larger initial quantity which will bring the average price down for the customer, something that we'd have to charge the customer $60 we would be able to drop down to $35 which is much more reasonable.

 

Benefits :

  • No longer run outa juice on the go, wherever theres a USB slot, theres some charge
  • Stylish and fashionable
  • Sleek and weightless
  • Fast charging 
  • Doubles as protection for the charging ends, won't get scuffed
  • Safe way to carry the charger on you without damaging it
  • Still cheaper than some chargers AND leather bracelets on the market, without the capabilities!

What We Need & What You Get

Our breakdown is $2,000 remaining for the mold, we paid 75% upfront with the deadline for the remaining 25% coming up and the leftover $3,000+ will be going towards buying a larger quantity in one go which will allow us to bring new colors and new designs to the market.

To thank contributors for believing in us we will be releasing a unique color that is only available to contributors and will not be released again, we will also be giving a significant discount to contributors to buy a bracelet from us

To finish off

We didn't want to release this fundraising campaign before ironing out every point of the production process.

We have all our contracts in place with our manufacturer for exclusivity, delivery time, manufacturing costs and product quality.
story_txt:
Update : We are now releasing new colored bracelets every 100 Facebook shares on our campaign (up to 1,000). These colors will be chooseable at the end of the campaign
Charging cables and having a sufficiently charged phone have become essential tools in our lives, this bracelet is the solution to forgetting your charger which leaves you without juice in your devices. Not only does it look great, it is always on hand (pardon the pun) to help you out with a reliable means of charging your phone. Available for all phone types, Micro-USB, iPhone and Type-c bracelets available
Tech Brief
1. High strength, genuine leather cables with 18k gold plated ends
2. Quick charging which beats the original Apple cable. ( We have tested 1.6A with success ) while Micro-Usb we're also aiming for
3. All our products have lifetime warranty, you won't ever need to purchase another cable
4.One size fits most wrists
 
Chargelet Bracelet
A handy solution for charging your device on the go. You no longer have to worry about leaving your charging cable behind and running out of juice when you're in an emergency. 
Wearable devices are increasingly used as tools designed to track your health, but a new entrant into the category has a far more practical mission: charging your devices.
The Chargelet bracelet charging cable might just look like a stylish piece of eye candy but it has a much more practical use. A water resistant bracelet which an onlooker won't realise isn't only a fashion accessory.
The product is self explanatory, it is easy to attach to your wrist with one hand and easy to undo, while offering protection to each end of the cable so it doesn't pick up damage over time, the gold plated ends are also scratch resistant.
What we do
We at MidasGold.com are a small startup in the fashion and jewelry industry, purveyors of unique designer gold jewelry and accessories. We specialize in sourcing the latest trends in urban fashions and street culture. Now we would like to add practicality to our range of jewelry.
Our latest product requires some more investment than we're used to, we'd love to be able to bring our product out to the masses but we have a slightly obstacle in the way of that, financing. 
What separates us from other campaigns, we have the business experience meaning we already have factories, suppliers and other connections which we have had prior business with meaning there won't be any surprises or set backs, we have already created molds and samples for the products but we are here to fund the remaining costs of production, We have passed all the crucial steps in bringing this product to market such as industry design, engineering, product development and two rounds of prototyping to bring a flawless product to market.
The $5,000 will allow us to order a larger initial quantity which will bring the average price down for the customer, something that we'd have to charge the customer $60 we would be able to drop down to $35 which is much more reasonable.

 


Benefits :

No longer run outa juice on the go, wherever theres a USB slot, theres some charge
Stylish and fashionable
Sleek and weightless
Fast charging 
Doubles as protection for the charging ends, won't get scuffed
Safe way to carry the charger on you without damaging it
Still cheaper than some chargers AND leather bracelets on the market, without the capabilities!

What We Need & What You Get

Our breakdown is $2,000 remaining for the mold, we paid 75% upfront with the deadline for the remaining 25% coming up and the leftover $3,000+ will be going towards buying a larger quantity in one go which will allow us to bring new colors and new designs to the market.
To thank contributors for believing in us we will be releasing a unique color that is only available to contributors and will not be released again, we will also be giving a significant discount to contributors to buy a bracelet from us
To finish off

We didn't want to release this fundraising campaign before ironing out every point of the production process.
We have all our contracts in place with our manufacturer for exclusivity, delivery time, manufacturing costs and product quality.

story:
You can now find us at  ARTEMISWILDJEWELS.COM

Artemis Wild Synopsis:

Artemis Wild is on a mission to empower you to radiate from the inside out. We are bringing back the ancient art of adornment with reusable face and body jewels and sparkle products that support you in showing up strong and radiant within yourself.

If you have met either of Artemis Wild’s founders, Abby Wolff or Lakshmi Dady, you have probably experienced our passion for life and our desire to help people be the fullest expression of themselves. Artemis Wild is two women’s journey to remind people that they are brilliant, honored, beautiful and emboldened to show up wholeheartedly. It’s our way of carrying on the great poet Hafiz’s words:

“I wish I could show you when you are lonely or in darkness the astonishing light of your own being.” - Hafiz of Shiraz

Since Artemis Wild’s inception 9 months ago, we have been self-funded. In this time, we worked with the best engineers and adhesive specialists in the business and innovated reusable face and body jewelry on hypoallergenic, medical-grade adhesive. Our product is unlike anything existing on the market because of the strength of our adhesive and our intentional designs and messaging. 

 

Ask:

After a summer sales tour in seven states, at six music festivals, countless events, and boutiques across the Western United States, we know we have an incredibly unique product that appeals to people from all walks and ages of life.  In order to get these gorgeous jewel masks in the hands and hearts of as many people as possible, we need your help. 

We are ready to up-level our scale and impact. With $30,000 we will purchase the minimum quantity of adhesive, at $14,000. The remaining $16,000, will pay for business development including manufacturing, distribution, and web development. 

Just like it’s founders, this campaign is all in. We have to reach our entire goal in order to receive any of the funds. We are counting on you to help us actualize the Artemis Wild dream and spread dazzling experiences for the greatest good. 

Each of our perks was intentionally created to have more value than retail pricing, therefore you benefit more by supporting Artemis Wild than if you were to purchase the same items elsewhere. Talk about a win-win! Each pack is designed to elevate your mood, bring you joy, and create opportunities for connection with others.

We hope you take the opportunity to experience our unique perks. We even have custom perks, such as, a personalized affirmation video all about your greatness, a bespoke marketing consultation with Abby, Integral Life Coaching with Lakshmi, or an opportunity to make us do something ridiculous via truth or dare. 

 

Impact

Supporting this campaign will not only empower two burgeoning female entrepreneurs but also support women’s empowerment on a larger scale. We believe that empowered women empower women, which is why Artemis Wild donates 1% of sales to uplifting women’s empowerment causes. We call it 1% for Empowerment. 

 

Empowered people, empower women

Experience the art of adornment, intentional glamour and self-empowerment.

No matter what perk you purchase, we are so grateful for your support. Every donation counts. 

Please spread the Artemis Wild movement further by sharing this Indiegogo page on your social media platforms and texting it to your friends and family.

Welcome to the Wild Woman Sisterhood, where all are welcome.

 

Stay Wild,

Abby & Lakshmi 

Please note: Apple pay is not working, do not check out using that feature. We are working with Indiegogo to correct this.

story:
Collective Tee - the world's first wearable blog

Letting you spread the message and connect with those around you using the humble t-shirt.  

You choose how you spread and share the message behind each t-shirt. 

Collective Tee is a Melbourne based brand creating a unique way for you to connect with people around you using the humble t-shirt by creating the world's first wearable blog.  

Our aim is to create a unique garment that will enable our fans to become t-shirt bloggers and connect with those around them by letting them choose how they spread the message behind each t-shirt.  

With the message printed on the inside and the graphic describing the message on the outside, you are free to share the printed message behind each t-shirt and connect with those around you.  

Only you know the what's written so you choose what you share.

How is Collective Tee different: 

  • We first start with a message for the blog post - not just any message, but a message which engages the listener and lends itself to being told time and time again. 
  • We then get the blog post written by one of our talented writers.
  • We then send the blog post to an up and coming designer, who can be located anywhere around the world (read about our designers below).
  • The blog post becomes the inspiration for that designer to create a kick-arse design.
  • The blog post is printed on the inside of the back of the t-shirt (so only you, the wearer, know the message) and the graphic gets printed on the front of the t-shirt.
  • This simple process results in a t-shirt unique to Collective Tee. 
  • The wearer wears their t-shirt, gets compliments, starts conversations about the message and connects with those around them. 
  • As the message starts spreading you become part of the Tee Collective. 

More about Collective Tee

  • After this Indiegogo campaign Collective Tee will only be available on our website and even then only to subscribers. 
  • A new issue will be created every 6 weeks and sent to our subscribers in the mail. 
  • To ensure that our designs remain fresh, each issue will be designed by a different designer.
  • Our first few issues have been designed by designers in New York, Italy and Indonesia (read about some of designers below) and we have more designs from up and coming designers located in Australia, the UK and the rest of the world in the pipeline.  

Exclusive Indiegogo Offer

Issues 1, 2 and 3 will only be available exclusively as perks here on Indiegogo. 

Your contribution to Collective Tee will help us make Collective Tee a reality.  Your contribution will be used to: 

  • Enable us to find more exciting, fresh, up and coming designers from around the world.
  • Develop an awesome website which will enable us to connect you with other Collective Tee fans.
  • Produce more Collective Tees which are screen printed right here in Melbourne and help keep our local Melbourne businesses going.  

Issue 1 - YOLO - You Only Live Once

Issue 1 was designed by Italian designer Sasa Ciabatti (aka spazio C), an up and coming Italian graphic designer and artist with a keen eye for cool colour combinations and fun illustrations.  

This perk is available in Heather Grey and Arctic White and in a choice of t-shirts or tank top.  

Issue 2 - Hollande's Timbuktu Tagine Tragedy

Issue 2 was designed by Simon Greiner, an Australian designer originally from Sydney but now based in Brooklyn, New York.  We first noticed Simon when his design was on the front cover of the New Yorker.  That design won New Yorker's 2013 Eustace Tilley contest, where Eustace was depicted as an aloof Brooklyn hipster.  We are very excited to have worked so closely with Simon in creating Issue 2 for Collective Tee.  

This perk is available in Burgundy t-shirts. 

Issue 3 - Nerd is the New Black

Issue 3 is a collaboration between Collective Tee and New York illustrator and graphic designer David Olenick.  His work combines simple designs with a deadpan delivery.  His ingenious renderings of puns and character flaws give voice to cute critters and inanimate objects.  His designs have been produced by the likes of Threadless and GAP and now, Collective Tee. 

We think that once you have read the story printed behind Issue 3 you will be as tickled as we are with David's work.  

This perk is available in Kelly Green and Bright Royal Blue t-shirts. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Can't contribute but love our idea? (We know we love it too.) 

  • Help spread the word by sharing our campaign with the Indiegogo share tools.
  • Visit us at www.collectivetee.com to stay updated.  

Thank you for being part of Collective Tee's journey. 

Frequently asked questions

1.  How will I choose the size of my t-shirt perk?

Once the Indiegogo campaign is done we will send around a questionnaire to all Collective Tee contributors and you will be able to choose the size of your perk then.

2.  How will I know if my perk will fit?

With the questionnaire above we will include a detailed sizing chart which we are sure will help us get the right size perk out to you with that perfect fit.

3.  I want to give my perk as a Christmas present. Can this be done?

We do have a limited number of sample Collective Tees printed and ready to go so if you are in the Early Bird group and we have your sizes available we will try our best to get your perk to you as soon as the Indiegogo campaign is finished.  Unfortunately we cannot guarantee this.  

What we can do is provide you with a customised Collective Tee Christmas card which you can send/give to your friends or loved ones so that they know that you have bought them this awesome gift and that the gift is being made especially for them. 

4.  What kind of t-shirts have you used?

We researched, trialed and tested heaps of available t-shirts and we selected the softest cotton t-shirt we could find that held its shape after numerous tests, like being washed numerous times and being wrestled to the ground by a bear (ok by one of our models who is as big as a bear but pretty much the same thing).  We then got feedback from our trial t-shirt wearers and we are confident that you will be as thrilled as we are with the t-shirt we have chosen.   We are confident that any Collective Tee you choose will become your favourite t-shirt. 

5.  I want to take part in the Full Collective Tee Blogger's Experience perk but how will I know which issue I will create?  

We will work with these contributors as they come in on a first-come first-serve basis. We are lucky that we have enough amazing new designers to go round.  We will also work with the contributors' work load and free time to ensure that creating their Collective Tee will be a truly enjoyable experience.  

6.  I want to take part in the Full Collective Tee Blogger's Experience perk but I am not located in Melbourne. How will this work? 

You don't have to be in Melbourne to get the Full Collective Tee Blogger's Experience.  With Skype, emails and other online tools we can easily communicate with you and ensure that you will be fully involved and able to take part in the Full Collective Tee Blogger's Experience.  The majority of our artists, designers, writers and even our web designer and web builder are located outside of Melbourne.  So we are certain that your physical location will not affect how you will enjoy the Full Collective Tee Experience.  

7.   Can I choose a different colour for my t-shirt perk than the ones shown above?  

We have worked closely with our designers to decide on which colours work best with the design.  Other considerations such as what colours are on trend and what colours will look good for years to come have also been taken into account.  For these reasons, the above colours are the only ones that will be offered as perks on Indiegogo. 

8.  How do I add international postage for orders outside Australia?

There are two ways you can do this.  

  • The preferred option is for you to choose your perk and then manually change your total contribution to include an additional $10 for postage. 
  • If you have already completed your perk transaction, the second option is to complete a separate transaction with the $10 international postage perk.

story:
Wrist MC

Wrist MC is a bracelet style cellphone holder, with included protective cellphone case, that gives smartphone users the capability of accessing and storing their phone on their wrist. It grants the user increased mobility and reduces the hassle of constantly moving, storing, or un-holstering their cell phones. The unit is fashionable, and will be offered in a variety of colors and designs. The Wrist MC is an assembly of 2 connecting parts, the band (bracelet) and the cellphone case. Our goal for Wrist MC is to offer it for ALL smartphone brands.

Currently supported Smartphones:

  • Apple iPhone 4/4s & 5/5s
  • Samsung Galaxy S3 & S4
  • Motorola Droid Razr HD
  • Motorola Moto X
  • HTC ONE
  • LG Nexus 4
***Other models could be added if there's enough interest.

New Age Nerd Technology (N.A.N. Tech.)

We are a product innovation company that develops, manufactures, and retails
consumer products and accessories. We are a small team of nerds, engineers, and designers. We represent the new, stylish, & intelligent ways of life. "And after showing you something new today, we'll show you some new tomorrow!"

We want the success of this campaign to officially launch a new era of wearable tech. Our goal is to provide the public with the best ways to utilize the current technology as well as pioneer future technologies. Once funded, we can start to provide the world with the best and most stylish ways of wearing their smartphones, and continue from there.


What We Need & What You Get

Our goal is to raise $10,000 in 35 days while popularizing the idea of wearing Wrist MC. This initial fundraising will give us the opportunity to continue to produce Wrist MC for the masses. The revenue raised will be used to buy materials and tools to manufacture Wrist MCs for customers as well as marketing materials and legal fees. This campaign also provides a vehicle to properly and affordably market our products & company.

To reach our goal, we are offering multiple perks for individuals, groups, retail buyers, and 1 very special person. We are selling the initial collections of Wrist MC, to be made to each supporters liking.

Even if we do not meet our goal, we will still provide Wrist MCs to our supporters. Any support will enable us to continue changing the world with our products.

As a large token of our appreciation of you support, all supporters will be officially listed as a founder of the Wrist MC product line. The Wikipedia article for Wrist MC will list all of its Indiegogo contributors as a founder. In the future we will continue to show our appreciation by sending discounted or free products, founders only specials, free "N.A.N. Tech. Founder" t-shirts, and more. You are the very beginnings of something wonderful and great!!!

Also, for those who present valuable spin-off products could get licensing & royalty opportunities. We are looking for knowledgeable, ambitious, enthusiastic, & uniquely innovative people to collaborate with.

The impact of Wrist MC going viral will change the direction of mobile technology and knowing that you made it happen should make you proud and empowered. The success of this campaign will be another success story to motivate other independent inventors & entrepreneurs to do as we did. When Wrist MC is on the wrist of millions of people worldwide, and you see your friends, and family, and strangers wearing it,  your day should brighten because YOU literally changed the world!!!

Show your support, Show some love, and get involved.

What We Need & What You Get
Our goal is to raise $10,000 in 35 days while popularizing the idea of wearing Wrist MC. This initial fundraising will give us the opportunity to continue to produce Wrist MC for the masses. The revenue raised will be used to buy materials and tools to manufacture Wrist MCs for customers as well as marketing materials and legal fees. This campaign also provides a vehicle to properly and affordably market our products & company. 
To reach our goal, we are offering multiple perks for individuals, groups, retail buyers, and 1 very special person. We are selling the initial collections of Wrist MC, to be made to each supporters liking.
Even if we do not meet our goal, we will still provide Wrist MCs to our supporters. Any support will enable us to continue changing the world with our products.
As a large token of our appreciation of you support, all supporters will be officially listed as a founder of the Wrist MC product line. The Wikipedia article for Wrist MC will list all of its Indiegogo contributors as a founder. In the future we will continue to show our appreciation by sending discounted or free products, founders only specials, free "N.A.N. Tech. Founder" t-shirts, and more. You are the very beginnings of something wonderful and great!!!
Also, for those who present valuable spin-off products could get licensing & royalty opportunities. We are looking for knowledgeable, ambitious, enthusiastic, & uniquely innovative people to collaborate with. 
The impact of Wrist MC going viral will change the direction of mobile technology and knowing that you made it happen should make you proud and empowered. The success of this campaign will be another success story to motivate other independent inventors & entrepreneurs to do as we did. When Wrist MC is on the wrist of millions of people worldwide, and you see your friends, and family, and strangers wearing it,  your day should brighten because YOU literally changed the world!!!
Show your support, Show some love, and get involved.
